1.01.S10udanav_u:uv_1.1_0-1: stīnamiddhaṁ vinodyeha saṁpraharṣya ca mānasam / śṛṇutemaṁ pravakṣyāmi udānaṁ jinabhāṣitam //
1.01.uv-kg1#1: || rgyal bas ched du brjod gsuṅs pa || bdag gis rab tu bśad par bya || gñid daṅ rmugs pa rnams sol la || yid la dga’ ba bskyed de ñon ||

1.02.S10udanav_u:uv_1.2_0-1: evam uktaṁ bhagavatā sarvābhijñena tāyinā / anukampakenarṣiṇā śarīrāntimadhāriṇā //
1.02.uv-kg1#2: thams cad mkhyen pa skyob pa po || thub pa rjes su thugs brtse ba || sku yi tha ma ’dzin pa yi || bcom ldan ’das kyis ’di skad gsuṅs ||

1.03.S10udanav_u:uv_1.3_0-1: anityā bata saṁskārā utpādavyadharmiṇaḥ // utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṁ vyupaśamaḥ sukham //
1.03.uv-kg1#3: kye ma ’du byed rnams mi rtag || skye źiṅ ’jig pa’i chos can yin || skyes nas ’jig par ’gyur ba ste || de dag ñe bar źi ba bde ||

1.04.S10udanav_u:uv_1.4_0-1: ko nu harṣaḥ ka ānanda evaṁ prajvalite sati / andhakāraṁ praviṣṭāḥ stha pradīpaṁ na gaveṣatha //
1.04.uv-kg1#4: de ltar rab tu ’bar ba la || ci źig dgar yod mgur ci yod || mun pa’i naṅ źugs gnas pa dag || ci phyir sgron ma tshol mi byed ||

1.05.S10udanav_u:uv_1.5_0-1: yānīmāny apaviddhāni vikṣiptāni diśo diśam /kāpotavarṇāny asthīni tāni dṛṣṭveha kā ratiḥ //
1.05.uv-kg1#5: rus pa thi ba’i mdog ’dra ba || bor ba gaṅ yin ’di dag ni || phyogs daṅ phyogs su rnam ’thor ba || de mthoṅ ’di la ci źig dga’ ||

1.06.S10udanav_u:uv_1.6_0-1: yām eva prathamāṁ rātriṁ garbhe vasati mānavaḥ /aviṣṭhitaḥ sa vrajati gataś ca na nivartate //
1.06.uv-kg1#6: gaṅ gi nub mo kho na nas || mṅal du daṅ por ’jug pa’i mi || de ni sdod med ’gro ’gyur źiṅ || soṅ ba las kyaṅ ldog pa med ||

1.07.S10udanav_u:uv_1.7_0-1: sāyam eke na dṛśyante kālyaṁ dṛṣṭā mahājanāḥ / kālyaṁ caike na dṛṣṭante sāyaṁ dṛṣṭā mahājanāḥ //
1.07.uv-kg1#7: sṅa dro skye bo maṅ mthoṅ ba || phyi dro kha cig mthoṅ mi ’gyur || phyi dro skye bo maṅ mthoṅ ba || sṅa dro kha cig mthoṅ mi ’gyur ||

1.08.S10udanav_u:uv_1.8_0-1: tatra ko viśvasen martyo daharo 'smīti jīvite / daharāpi mriyante hi narā nāryaś ca-n-ekaśaḥ //
1.08.uv-kg1#8: skyes pa bud med maṅ po daṅ || darala bab pa’aṅ ’chi ’gyur na || de la mi ’di gźon źes te || gźon pa’i gdeṅ drod ci źig-yod ||

1.09.S10udanav_u:uv_1.9_0-1: garbha eke vinaśyante tathaike sūtikākule / parisṛptās tathā hy eke tathaike paridhāvinaḥ //
1.09.uv-kg1#9: kha cig mṅal du ’chi bar ’gyur || de bźin kha cig btsas pa’i sar || de bźin kha cig gos tsam na || de bźin kha cig-yoṅs rgyug na ||

1.1.S10udanav_u:uv_1.10_0-1: ye ca vṛddhā ye ca dahrā ye ca madhyamapuruṣāḥ /anupūrvaṁ pravrajanti phalaṁ pakvaṁ va bandhanāt //
1.1.uv-kg1#10: la la rgan daṅ la la gźon || la la dar la bab pa’i mi || rim gyis rab tu ’gro ’gyur te || ’bras bu smin pa ltuṅ ba bźin ||

1.11.S10udanav_u:uv_1.11_0-1: yathā phalānāṁ pakvānāṁ nityaṁ patanato bhayam / evaṁ jātasya martyasya nityaṁ maraṇato bhayam //
1.11.uv-kg1#11: dper ’bras bu smin pa rnams || ltuṅ bas rtag tu ’jigs pa ltar || de bźin skyes par gyur pa’i mi || rtag tu ’chi bas ’jigs par ’gyur ||

1.12.S10udanav_u:uv_1.12_0-1: yathāpi kumbhakāreṇa mṛttikābhājanaṁ kṛtam / sarvaṁ bhedanaparyantam evaṁ martyasya jīvitam //
1.12.uv-kg1#12: dper na rdza ma’i mkhan po yis || ’jim pa las ni snod byas pa || thams cad tha mar ’jig pa ltar || mi rnams srog kyaṅ de bźin no ||

1.13.S10udanav_u:uv_1.13_0-1: yathāpi tantre vitate yad yad utaṁ samupyate / alpaṁ bhavati vātavyam evaṁ martyasya jīvitam //
1.13.uv-kg1#13: dper na thags ni brkyaṅ ba la || spun ni gaṅ daṅ gaṅ bcug pa’i || spun gyis rtiṅ la gtug pa ltar || mi rnams srog kyaṅ de bźin no ||

1.14.S10udanav_u:uv_1.14_0-1: yathāpi va . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . ghatano bhavati evaṁ martyasya jīvitam //
1.14.uv-kg1#14: dper na ṅes par bsad pa dag || gom pa gaṅ daṅ gaṅ bor bas || gsad sa’i druṅ du bsñen pa ltar || mi rnams srog kyaṅ de bźin no ||

1.15.S10udanav_u:uv_1.15_0-1: yathā nadī pārvatīyā gacchate na nivartate / evam āyur manuṣyāṇāṁ gacchate na nivartate //
1.15.uv-kg1#15: chu kluṅ drag tu ’bab pa’i rgyun || ldog pa med pa ji lta bar || de bźin mi yi tshe ’gro ba || slar ni ldog par ’gyur ba med ||

1.16.S10udanav_u:uv_1.16_0-1: kisaraṁ ca parittaṁ ca tac ca duḥkhena saṁyutam / udake daṇḍarājīva kṣipram eva vinaśyati //
1.16.uv-kg1#16: dga’ ba ñid daṅ thuṅ ba daṅ || de yaṅ sdug bsṅal ldan pa dag || myur ba kho nar ’jig ’gyur te || chu la dbyug gus bris pa bźin ||

1.17.S10udanav_u:uv_1.17_0-1: yathā daṇḍena gopālo gāḥ prāpayati gocaram / evaṁ rogair jarāmṛtyuḥ āyuḥ prāpayate nṛṇām //
1.17.uv-kg1#17: dper na phyugs rdzi dbyug thogs kyis || phyugs rnams gnas su phyin byed ltar || de bźin nad daṅ rga ba yis || mi rnams ’chi bdag druṅ du skyel ||

1.18.S10udanav_u:uv_1.18_0-1: atiyānti hy ahorātrā jīvitaṁ coparudhyate / āyuḥ kṣīyati martyānāṁ kunadīṣu yathaudakam //
1.18.uv-kg1#18: chu bran gyi ni chu lta bur || ñin daṅ mtshan mo ’das pa yis || mi rnams tshe yaṅ zad ’gyur źiṅ || srog kyaṅ ñe bar ’jig par ’gyur ||

1.19.S10udanav_u:uv_1.19_0-1: dīrghā jāgarato rātrir dīrghaṁ śrāntasya yojanam / dīrgho bālasya saṁsāraḥ saddharmam avijānataḥ //
1.19.uv-kg1#19: mel tse byed la mtshan mo riṅ || lam gyis dub la rgyaṅ grags riṅ || dam chos rnam par mi śes pa’i || byis pa rnams la ’khor ba riṅ ||

1.2.S10udanav_u:uv_1.20_0-1: putro me 'sti dhanaṁ me 'stīty evaṁ bālo vihanyate / ātmaiva hy ātmano nāsti kasya putraḥ kuto dhanam //
1.2.uv-kg1#20: bdag la bu yod de bźin du || nor yod ces pas byis pa brlag || phyi rol naṅ na bdag med na || su yi bu yin ci źig nor ||

1.21.S10udanav_u:uv_1.21_0-1: anekāni sahasrāṇi naranārīśatāni ca / bhogāṁ vai samudānīya vaśaṁ gacchanti mṛtyunaḥ //
1.21.uv-kg1#21: skyes pa bud med rnams kyi rigs || brgya daṅ stoṅ phrag maṅ po daṅ || loṅs spyod legs par bsgrubs pa yaṅ || ’chi bdag dbaṅ du ’gro bar ’gyur ||

1.22.S10udanav_u:uv_1.22_0-1: sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ / saṁyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṁ hi jīvitam //
1.22.uv-kg1#22: bsags pa kun gyi mtha’ zad ciṅ || bslaṅ pa’i mtha’ ni ’gyel bar ’gyur || phrad pa’i mtha’ ni ’bral ba ste || gson pa’i mtha’ ni ’chi ba yin ||

1.23.S10udanav_u:uv_1.23_0-1: sarve satvā mariṣyanti maraṇāntaṁ hi jīvitam / yathākarma gamiṣyanti puṇyapāpaphalopagāḥ //
1.23.uv-kg1#23: gson mtha’ ’chi ba yin pas na || sems can thams cad ’chi ’gyur źiṅ || dge sdig ’bras bur ñer ’gro ba’i || ji bźin las kyi rjes su ’braṅ ||

1.25.S10udanav_u:uv_1.25_0-1: naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṁ vivaraṁ praviśya / na vidyate 'sau pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṁ na prasaheta mṛtyuḥ //
1.25.uv-kg1#25: gaṅ du gnas kyaṅ ’chi bas mi tshugs pa’i || sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te || bar snaṅ la med rgya mtsho’i naṅ na med || ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu źugs na’aṅ min ||

1.26.S10udanav_u:uv_1.26_0-1: ye ceha bhūtā bhaviṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve gamiṣyanti prahāya deham / tāṁ sarvahāniṁ kuśalo viditvā dharme sthito brahmacaryaṁ careta //
1.26.uv-kg1#26: byuṅ daṅ ’byuṅ bar ’gyur ba ji sñed pa || kun gyis lus ’di btaṅ nas ’gro ba daṅ || de kun ’jig par mkhas pas rtogs gyis te || chos la gnas kyis tshaṅs par spyad pa spyod ||

1.27.S10udanav_u:uv_1.27_0-1: jīrṇaṁ ca dṛṣṭveha tathaiva rogiṇaṁ mṛtaṁ ca dṛṣṭvā vyapayātacetasam /jahau sa dhīro gṛhabandhanāni kāmā hi lokasya na supraheyāḥ /
1.27.uv-kg1#27: rga ba mthoṅ źiṅ nad gyis sdug bsṅal daṅ || sems daṅ bral ba’i si ba mthoṅ nas ni || brtan pas brtson ra ’dra ba’i khyim spaṅs kyi || ’jig rten phal pas ’dod spaṅ nus re skan ||

1.28.S10udanav_u:uv_1.28_0-1: jīryanti vai rājarathāḥ sucitrā hy atho śarīram api jarām upaiti / satāṁ tu dharmo na jarām upaiti santo hi taṁ satsu nivedayanti //
1.28.uv-kg1#28: rgyal po’i śiṅ rta śin tu bkra ba’aṅ ’jig || de bźin lus kyaṅ ñe bar rga bar ’gyur || dam pa rnams kyi chos ’di dam pa ste || mi mchog gźan rtogs byed ciṅ rga mi ’gyur ||

1.29.S10udanav_u:uv_1.29_0-1: dhik tvām astu jare grāmye virūpakaraṇī hy asi / tathā manoramaṁ bimbaṁ jarayā hy abhimarditam //
1.29.uv-kg1#29: rga ba khyod ni blun źiṅ ṅan || khyod ni mi rigs byed pa ste || yid du ’oṅ ba’i gzugs ’di yaṅ || khyod kyis mṅon par bcom par gyur ||

1.3.S10udanav_u:uv_1.30_0-1: yo 'pi varṣaśataṁ jīvet so 'pi mṛtyuparāyaṇaḥ / anu hy enaṁ jarā hanti vyādhir vā yadi vāntakaḥ //
1.3.uv-kg1#30: gaṅ źig lo ni brgyar ’tsho ba || de yaṅ ’chi ba dag ñid kyis khrid || ’di dag rga bar ’gyur ba ’am || yaṅ na na ba’am ’chi bas ’joms ||

1.31.S10udanav_u:uv_1.31_0-1: sadā vrajanti hy anivartamānā divā ca rātrau ca vilujyamānāḥ / matsyā ivātīva hi tapyamānā duḥkhena jātīmaraṇena yuktāḥ //
1.31.uv-kg1#31: rtag tu ldog pa med par ’gro ’gyur źiṅ || ñin daṅ mtshan du rab tu ’jig pa daṅ || skye daṅ ’chi ba’i sdug bsṅal daṅ ldan pa || chu tshan naṅ du gduṅs pa’i ña daṅ ’dra ||

1.32.S10udanav_u:uv_1.32_0-1: āyur divā ca rātrau ca caratas tiṣṭhatas tathā / nadīnāṁ vā yathā sroto gacchate na nivartate //
1.32.uv-kg1#32: tshe ’di ñin daṅ mtshan mo daṅ || ’gro ba daṅ ni ’dug pa na || chu kluṅ chen po’i rgyun bźin du || phyir mi ldog par ’gro bar ’gyur ||

1.33.S10udanav_u:uv_1.33_0-1: yeṣāṁ rātridivāpāye hy āyur alpataraṁ bhavet / alpodake va matsyānāṁ kā nu teṣāṁ ratir bhavet //
1.33.uv-kg1#33: chu chuṅ naṅ gi ña lta bur || gaṅ źig ñin mtshan ’da’ ba yis || tshe ’di śin tu thuṅ ’gyur na || de la dga’ bar byar ci yod ||

1.34.S10udanav_u:uv_1.34_0-1: parijīrṇam idaṁ rūpaṁ roganīḍaṁ prabhaṅguram / bhetsyate pūty asaṁdehaṁ maraṇāntaṁ hi jīvitam //
1.34.uv-kg1#34: gson mtha’ ’chi ba yin pa’i phyir || lus ’di yoṅs su rga ba daṅ || nad kyi tshaṅ ’di myur ’jig ciṅ || snag gi tshogs kyaṅ ’jig par ’gyur ||

1.35.S10udanav_u:uv_1.35_0-1: aciraṁ bata kāyo 'yaṁ pṛthivīm adhiśeṣyate / śunyo vyapetavijñāno nirastaṁ vā kaḍaṅgaram //
1.35.uv-kg1#35: kye ma lus ’di mi thogs par || stoṅ źiṅ rnam śes daṅ bral nas || dur khrod bor ba’i mgal dum ltar || sa yi steṅ du ’gyel bar ’gyur ||

1.38.S10udanav_u:uv_1.38_0-1: iha varṣaṁ kariṣyāmi hemantaṁ grīṣmam eva ca / bālo vicintayaty evam antarāyaṁ na paśyati //
1.38.uv-kg1#38: dgun ka daṅ ni dpyid ka daṅ || dbyar ka ’di dag bya’o źes || byis pa rnam par sems byed pas || bar chad mthoṅ bar ma gyur to ||

1.39.S10udanav_u:uv_1.39_0-1: taṁ putrapaśusaṁmattaṁ vyāsaktamanasaṁ naram / suptaṁ grāmaṁ mahaughaiva mṛtyur ādāya gacchati //
1.39.uv-kg1#39: bu daṅ nor phyugs ’byor pa la || mi yi yid ni rnam chags pa || ’di bdag gis ni blaṅs nas ’gro || ñal groṅ chu bos ’das pa bźin ||

1.4.S10udanav_u:uv_1.40_0-1: na santi putrās trāṇāya na pitā nāpi bāndhavāḥ / antakenābhibhūtasya na hi trāṇā bhavanti te //
1.4.uv-kg1#40: ’chi ba’i dus la bab pa na || bu rnams skyabs su mi ’gyur źiṅ || pha yaṅ ma yin gñen ’dun min || khyod la skyabs su ’gyur ba med ||

1.41.S10udanav_u:uv_1.41_0-1: idaṁ kṛtaṁ me kartavyam idaṁ kṛtvā bhaviṣyati / ity evaṁ spondato martyāṁ jarā mṛtyuś ca mardati //
1.41.uv-kg1#41: ’di ni bya ba byas zin don ’di bya || de dag byas nas bdag gis ’di bya źes || de ltar mi ni yoṅs su śom pa na || rga daṅ nad bcas ’chi bas mṅon du bcom ||

1.42.S10udanav_u:uv_1.42_0-1: tasmāt sadā dhyānaratāḥ samāhitā hy ātāpino jātijarāntadarśinaḥ / māraṁ sasainyaṁ hy abhibhūya bhikṣavo bhaveta jātīmaraṇasya pāragāḥ //
1.42.uv-kg1#42: de ltar rtag tu tiṅ ’dzin la dga’ mñam par źog || brtson pa skyed la skye daṅ rga ba’i mtha’ ma ltos || bdud rnams sde daṅ bcas pa mṅon par zil non la || dge sloṅ dag go skye śi’i pha rol ’gro bar gyis ||

2.01.S10udanav_u:uv_2.1_0-1: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṁ saṁkalpāt kāma jāyase / na tvāṁ saṁkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi //
2.01.uv-kg2#43: || kun rtog las ni ’dod skyes pas || ’dod pa’i rtsa bar śes gyis te || khyod ni kun rtog ma byed daṅ || des na khyod la ’byuṅ mi ’gyur ||

2.02.S10udanav_u:uv_2.2_0-1: kāmebhyo jāyate śokaḥ kāmebhyo jāyate bhayam / kāmebhyo vipramuktānāṁ nāsti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
2.02.uv-kg2#44: ’dod pa rnams las mya ṅan skyes || ’dod pa rnams las ’jigs pa ’byuṅ || ’dod pa dag ni rnam spaṅs na || mya ṅan med ciṅ ’jigs pa med ||

2.03.S10udanav_u:uv_2.3_0-1: ratibhyo jāyate śoko ratibhyo jāyate bhayam / ratibhyo vipramuktānāṁ nāsti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
2.03.uv-kg2#45: dga’ ba rnams las mya ṅan skyes || dga’ ba rnams las ’jigs pa ’byuṅ || dga’ ba dag ni rnam spaṅs na || mya ṅan med ciṅ ’jigs pa med ||

2.04.S10udanav_u:uv_2.4_0-1: madhurāgrā vipāke tu kaṭukā hy abhinanditāḥ / kāmā dahanti vai bālān ulkevāmuñcataḥ karam //
2.04.uv-kg2#46: ’dod dga’i rnam smin sdug bsṅal te || daṅ po mṅar la ’bras bu tsha || me sgron lag nas ma bor ba || mjug tu byis pa sreg byed bźin ||

2.05.S10udanav_u:uv_2.5_0-1: na tad dṛḍhaṁ bandhanam āhur āryā yad āyasaṁ dāravaṁ balbajaṁ vā / saṁraktacittasya hi mandabuddheḥ putreṣu dāreṣu ca yā avekṣā //
2.05.uv-kg2#47: nor bu’i rna cha bu daṅ bu mo la || yoṅs su chags sems gaṅ yin la ltos na || lcags śiṅ gres ma las byas chiṅ ma gaṅ || de dag dam po min źes ’phags pa gsuṅ ||

2.06.S10udanav_u:uv_2.6_0-1: etad dṛḍhaṁ bandhanam āhur āryāḥ samantataḥ susthiraṁ duṣpramokṣam / etad api cchitvā tu parivrajanti hy anapekṣiṇaḥ kāmasukhaṁ prahāya //
2.06.uv-kg2#48: ’dod pa’i chiṅ ma gaṅ yin de lhod kyaṅ || rab tu dgrol bar dka’ źes ’phags pa gsuṅ || brtan rnams ’dod pa’i bde la mi lta bar || de dag gtubs nas myur du ’gro bar byed ||

2.07.S10udanav_u:uv_2.7_0-1: na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṁkalparāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ / tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathaiva loke athātra dhīrā vinayanti cchandam //
2.07.uv-kg2#49: ’jig rten sna tshogs gaṅ de ’dod min gyi || skyes bu’i kun rtog ’dod chags ’dod pa yin || ’jig rten sna tshogs de bźin gnas kyaṅ ni || ’on kyaṅ brten rnams ’di la ’dun pa ’dul ||

2.08.S10udanav_u:uv_2.8_0-1: na santi nityā manujeṣu kāmāḥ santi tv anityāḥ kāmino yatra baddhāḥ / tāṁs tu prahāya hy apunarbhavāya hy anāgataṁ mṛtyudheyaṁ vadāmi //
2.08.uv-kg2#50: mi rnams la ni rtag pa’i ’dod pa med || ’dod can gaṅ la chags demi rtag pas || yaṅ srid med phyir sems kyis rab spoṅs la || ’chi ba’i gnas mi ’gyur bar byos śes gsuṅs ||

2.09.S10udanav_u:uv_2.9_0-1: chandajāto hy avasrāvī manasānāvilo bhavet / kāmeṣu tv apratibaddhacitta ūrdvasroto nirucyate //
2.09.uv-kg2#51: ’dun pa skyes śiṅ zad par mi byed dam || sems la skyon med pa daṅ dran pa daṅ || ’dod pa rnams la so sor ma chags gaṅ || de ni goṅ du ’pho pa yin źes gsuṅs ||

2.1.S10udanav_u:uv_2.10_0-1: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṁ stokaṁ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe / karmāro rajatasyaiva nirdhamen malam ātmanaḥ //
2.1.uv-kg2#52: mgar ba yis ni dṅul bźin du || blo gros ldan pas rim pa bźin || skad cig skad cig cuṅ zad tsam || raṅ gi dri ma bsal bar bya ||

2.11.S10udanav_u:uv_2.11_0-1: rathakāra iva carmaṇaḥ parikartann upānaham / yad yaj jahāti kāmānāṁ tat tat saṁpadyate sukham //
2.11.uv-kg2#53: lham mkhan gyis ni ko ba dag || yoṅs su sbyaṅs nas lham byed ltar || ’dod pa gaṅ daṅ gaṅ spaṅs pa || de de bde ba phun sum ldan ||

2.12.S10udanav_u:uv_2.12_0-1: sarvaṁ cet sukham iccheta sarvakāmāṁ parityajet / sarvakāmaparityāgī hy atyantaṁ sukham edhate //
2.12.uv-kg2#54: gal te bde ba kun ’dod na || ’dod pa thams cad yoṅs su spoṅs || ’dod pa thams cad yoṅs spaṅs pas || mchog tu bde ba thob par ’gyur ||

2.13.S10udanav_u:uv_2.13_0-1: yāvat kāmān anusaraṁ na tṛptiṁ manaso 'dhyagāt /. tato nivṛttiṁ pratipaśyamānās te vai tṛptāḥ prajñayā ye sutṛptāḥ //
2.13.uv-kg2#55: ji srid ’dod pa’i rjes ’braṅ ba || de srid bar du ṅoms mi ’gyur || de las gaṅ dag śes rab kyis || ldog byed de dag tshim pa thob ||

2.14.S10udanav_u:uv_2.14_0-1: śreyasī prajñayā tṛptir na hi kāmair vitṛpyate / prajñayā puruṣaṁ tṛptaṁ tṛṣṇā na kurute vaśam //
2.14.uv-kg2#56: ’dod pas ṅoms par mi ’gyur bas || śes rab kyis ni ṅoms pa skyid || śes rab kyis ni ṅoms pa’i mi || srid pa’i dbaṅ du mi ’gyur ro ||

2.15.S10udanav_u:uv_2.15_0-1: gṛddhā hi kāmeṣu narāḥ pramattā hy adharme bata te ratāḥ / antarāyaṁ na te paśyanty alpake jīvite sati //
2.15.uv-kg2#57: ’dod la chags pa’i mi gaṅ yin|| de dag kye ma chos min dga’ || chuṅ zad gson por ’dug pa na || bar chad mthoṅ bar mi ’gyur ro ||

2.16.S10udanav_u:uv_2.16_0-1: durmedhasaṁ hanti bhogo na tv ihātmagaveṣiṇam / durmedhā bhogatṛṣnābhir hanty ātmānam atho parān //
2.16.uv-kg2#58: blo ṅan loṅs spyod kyis bcom pas || pha rol tshol bar mi byed ciṅ || bsam brlag ’dod la sred pa yis || bdag daṅ gźan yaṅ phuṅ bar byed ||

2.17.S10udanav_u:uv_2.17_0-1: na karṣāpaṇavarṣeṇa tṛptiḥ kāmair hi vidyate / alpāsvādasukhāḥ kāṁā iti vijñāya paṇḍitaḥ //
2.17.uv-kg2#59: kar śa pa na’i char bab kyaṅ || ’dod pa rnams kyis ṅoms mi ’gyur || ’dod pa mnog chuṅ ñes maṅ bar || mkhas pa rnams kyis khoṅ du chud ||

2.18.S10udanav_u:uv_2.18_0-1: api divyeṣu kāmeṣu sa ratiṁ nādhigacchati / tṛṣṇākṣayarato bhavati buddhānāṁ śrāvakaḥ sadā //
2.18.uv-kg2#60: lha yi ’dod pa rnams la yaṅ || lhag par dga’ bar mi ’gyur te || rdzogs saṅs rgyas daṅ ñan thos rnams || sred pa zad pas dgyes par ’gyur ||

2.19.S10udanav_u:uv_2.19_0-1: parvato 'pi suvarṇasya samo himavatā bhavet / vittaṁ taṁ nālam ekasya etaj jñātvā samaṁ caret //
2.19.uv-kg2#61: gaṅs can daṅ ni mñam pa yi || gser gyi ri bo yod gyur kyaṅ || nor des gcig kyaṅ mi tshim par || rtogs par gyis la legs par spyod ||

2.2.S10udanav_u:uv_2.20_0-1: duḥkaṁ hi yo veda yato nidānaṁ kāmeṣu jantu sa kathaṁ rameta / upadhiṁ hi loke śalyam iti matvā tasyaiva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet //
2.2.uv-kg2#62: gaṅ dag sdug bsṅal de yi rgyu śes pa || de dag nam yaṅ ’dod la dga’ mi ’gyur || ’jig rten dag na zug rṅa’i rgyur śes nas || de dag gdul phyir bstan pa slob par byed ||

3.01.S10udanav_u:uv_3.1_0-1: vitarkapramathitasya jantunas tīvrarāgasya śubhānudarśinaḥ / bhūyas tṛṣṇā pravardhate gāḍhaṁ hy eṣa karoti bandhanam //
3.01.uv-kg3#63: || lus can ram par rtog pas rab bcom pa || ’dod chags mi bzad gtsaṅ bar rjes lta bas || ’dod chags phyir źiṅ rab tu ’phel ’gyur te || raṅ gi ’chiṅ ba de yis dam por byed ||

3.02.S10udanav_u:uv_3.2_0-1: vitarkavyupaśame tu yo rato hy aśubhāṁ bhāvayate sadā smṛtaḥ / tṛṣṇā hy eṣa prahāsyate sa tu khalu pūtikaroti bandhanam //
3.02.uv-kg3#64: gaṅ dag rnam rtog ñe bar źi dga’ źiṅ || mi sdug sgom pa rtag tu dran byed de || de yi sred pa rab tu spaṅs pa yis || raṅ gi ’chiṅ bde dag rul bar byed ||

3.03.S10udanav_u:uv_3.3_0-1: kāma andha jāla prakṣiptās tṛṣṇayā ācchāditāḥ prajāḥ / pramattā bandhane baddhā matsyavat kupinā mukhe /
3.03.uv-kg3#65: ’dod pa mun nag ’dra bas g-yogs || sred pa’i dgab pas bkab pa daṅ || bag med ’chiṅ bas bciṅs pa dag || tshed mar chud pa’i ña daṅ ’dra ||

3.03a.S10udanav_u:uv_3.3_2: jarā maraṇam āyānti vatsaḥ kṣīrapaka;iva mātaram //
3.03a.uv-kg3#66cd: rgaṅ de ’chi ba’i rjes su ’gro ’gyur te || ma druṅ nu źo ’dod pa’i be’u daṅ ’dra ||

3.04.S10udanav_u:uv_3.4_0: manujasya pramatta cāriṇas tṛṣṇā vardhati mālutā iva hi / [māluteva hi]
3.04.uv-kg3#66ab: skyes bu bag med rab tu spyod byed pa || ’khri śiṅ bźin du sred pa ’phel ’gyur źiṅ ||

3.04a.S10udanav_u:uv_3.4_1: sa hi saṃsarate punaḥ punaḥ phalam icchann iva vānaro vane //
3.04a.uv-kg3#67cd: de yis yaṅ daṅ yaṅ du ’khor bar ’khyams || tshal naṅ ’bras bu ’dod pa’i spre’u daṅ mtshuṅs ||

3.05.S10udanav_u:uv_3.5_0: saritāni vai snehitāni vai saumanasyāni bhavanti jantunaḥ /
3.05.uv-kg3#67ab: mi dag dran par byed daṅ chags byed daṅ || yid bde ba la rtog par byed pa dag ||

3.05a.S10udanav_u:uv_3.5_1: ye sātasitāḥ sukha eṣiṇas te vai jāti jarā upagā narāḥ //
3.05a.uv-kg3#68ab: mi gaṅ rtag tu bde ba ’dod byed pa || skye daṅ rga bar ñe bar ’gro ’gyur źiṅ ||

3.06.S10udanav_u:uv_3.6_0: tṛṣṇābhir upaskṛtāḥ prajāḥ paridhāvanti śaśā va vāgurām /
3.06.uv-kg3#68cd: skye dgu sred pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar || rgya naṅ ri bod yoṅs su rgyug pa bźin ||

3.06a.S10udanav_u:uv_3.6_1: samyojanaiḥ saṅga saktā duhkham yānti punaḥ punaś cira rātram //
3.06a.uv-kg3#69cd: kun sbyor ro la dga’ ba’i byis pa rnams || yaṅ daṅ yaṅ du sdug bsṅal thob par ’gyur ||

3.07.S10udanav_u:uv_3.7_0: tṛṣṇayā grathitāḥ sattvā rakta cittā bhavā bhave / [satvā]
3.07.uv-kg3#69ab: sred pa rnams kyis mdud pa’i sems can dag || srid daṅ srid min dag la sems chags śiṅ ||

3.07a.S10udanav_u:uv_3.7_1-2: te yoga yukta māreṇa hy ayoga kṣemiṇo janāḥ / jarā maraṇam āyānti yogā hi duratikramāḥ //
3.07a.uv-kg3#70: skye bo grub daṅ bde rnams daṅ bral źiṅ || bdud kyi sbyor ba dag daṅ ldan pa de || rga daṅ ’chi ba’i rjes su ’gro ’gyur te || ma druṅ nu źo ’dod pa’i be’u daṅ ’dra ||

3.08.S10udanav_u:uv_3.8_0-1: yas tu tṛṣṇāṁ prahāyeha vītatṛṣṇo bhavābhave / tṛṣṇayā vibhavad bhikṣur anicchuḥ parinirvṛtaḥ //
3.08.uv-kg3#71: ’di na sred pa de ’dra spoṅ byed pa || srid daṅ srid min dag la sred bral źiṅ || dge sloṅ srid pa zil gyis gnon byed pa || lhag ma med par yoṅs su mya ṅan ’da’ ||

3.09.S10udanav_u:uv_3.9_0-1: ya etāṁ sahate grāmyāṁ tṛṣṇāṁ loke sudustyajām / śokās tasya nivardhante hy avavṛṣṭā bīraṇā yathā //
3.09.uv-kg3#72: gaṅ źig ’jig rten spaṅ dka’ ba’i || sred pa’i bud med ’dis bkol ba || de yi mya ṅan ’phel ’gyur te || rtswa la char pa bab pa bźin ||

3.1.S10udanav_u:uv_3.10_0-1: yas tv etāṁ tyajate grāmyāṁ tṛṣṇāṁ loke sudustyajām / śokās tasya nivartante udabindur iva puṣkarāt //
3.1.uv-kg3#73: gaṅ źig ’jig rten spaṅ dka’ ba’i || sred pa’i bud med ’di spoṅ ba || de yi mya ṅan ldog ’gyur te || pad ma las ni chu thigs bźin ||

3.11.S10udanav_u:uv_3.11_0-1: tad vai vadāmi bhadram vo yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ / tṛṣṇām samūlam khanata uśīra arthī iva bīraṇām /
3.11.uv-kg3#74: de phyir ji sñed ’dir lhags pa || khyed la smra yis khyed bde śig || u śir phyir ni rtswa bźin du || sred pa rtswar bcas druṅs nas phyuṅ ||

3.11a.S10udanav_u:uv_3.11_2: tṛṣṇāyāḥ khāta mūlāyā na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
3.11a.uv-kg3#75cd: sred pa druṅs nas phyuṅ śig daṅ || mya ṅan med ciṅ ’jigs pa med ||

3.12.S10udanav_u:uv_3.12_0: tṛṣṇā dvitīyaḥ puruṣo dīrgham adhvānam āśayā /
3.12.uv-kg3#75ab: skyes bu sred pa daṅ ’grogs na || yun riṅ dus su ’khyam ’gyur bas ||

3.12a.S10udanav_u:uv_3.12_1-2: tṛṣṇāyāḥ khāta mūlāyā na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
3.12a.uv-kg3#76: yaṅ daṅ yaṅ du ñer len ciṅ || yaṅ daṅ yaṅ du mṅal du ’jug || gnas skabs ’gyur daṅ gźan ’gyur bas || sems can ’oṅ daṅ ’gro bar byed ||

3.13.S10udanav_u:uv_3.13_0-1: tāṁ tu tṛṣṇāṁ prahāyeha vītatṛṣṇo bhavābhave / nāsau punaḥ saṁsarate tṛṣṇā hy asya na vidyate //
3.13.uv-kg3#77: ’dir ni spaṅ dka’i sred pa de || spoṅs la sa bon chod cig daṅ || de la sred pa med ’gyur źiṅ || de ni yaṅ du ’khor mi ’gyur ||

3.14.S10udanav_u:uv_3.14_0-2: yayā devā manuṣyāś ca sitās tiṣṭhanti hārthikāḥ /tarataitāṁ viṣaktikāṁ kṣaṇo vo mā hy upatyagāt / kṣaṇātītā hi śocante narakeṣu samarpitāḥ //
3.14.uv-kg3#78: dal ’byor chud ni ma gzan par || gaṅ gis lha daṅ mi rnams su || don gñer bciṅs nas ’jog byed pa || yul la sred pa de las rgol || sems can dmyal bar skyes na yaṅ || dal ’byor thal bas ’gyod par ’oṅ ||

3.15.S10udanav_u:uv_3.15_0-1: tṛṣṇā hi hetuḥ saritā viṣaktikā gaṇḍasya nityaṁ visṛteha jālinī / latāṁ pipāsām apanīya sarvaśo nivartate duḥkham idaṁ punaḥ punaḥ //
3.15.uv-kg3#79: gaṅ phyir srid mtsho rgyur gyur pa || yul la sred pa ’bras kyi gźi || ’khri śiṅ dra bas khebs byed pa || gduṅ bar byed pa ma btul na || sdug bsṅal ’di ni yaṅ daṅ yaṅ || rnam pa kun du ldog mi ’gyur ||

3.16.S10udanav_u:uv_3.16_0-1: yathāpi mūlair anupadrutaiḥ sadā chinno 'pi vṛkṣaḥ punar eva jāyate / evaṁ hi tṛṣṇānuśayair anuddhṛtair nivartate duḥkham idaṁ punaḥ punaḥ //
3.16.uv-kg3#80: dper na ljon śiṅ rtsa nas ma bton na || bcad kyaṅ phyir źiṅ skye ba kho nar zad || de bźin sred pa’i phra rgyas ma bton na || yaṅ daṅ yaṅ du sdug bsṅal ’di mi ldog ||

3.17.S10udanav_u:uv_3.17_0-1: yathāpi śalyo dṛḍham ātmanā kṛtas tam eva hanyād balasā tv adhiṣṭhitaḥ / tathā tv ihādhyātmasamutthitā latās tṛṣṇā vadhāyopanayanti prāṇinām //
3.17.uv-kg3#81: dper bdag ñid kyis ni byas pa’i mtshon || de yis rkun po’i mthu yis bdag gsod ltar || de bźin naṅ gi sems las byuṅ ba yi || sred pas lus can ñe bar gsod par byed ||

3.18.S10udanav_u:uv_3.18_0-1: etad ādīnavaṁ jñātvā tṛṣṇā duḥkhasya saṁbhavam / vītatṛṣṇo hy anādānaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet /
3.18.uv-kg3#82: de ltar sred las sdug bsṅal dag||’byuṅ ba’i ñes dmigs śes gyis te || sred spoṅs ñe bar len med daṅ || dran ldan dge sloṅ kun tu rgyus ||

4.01.S10udanav_u:uv_4.1_0-1: apramādo hy amṛtapadaṁ pramādo mṛtyunaḥ padam /apramattā na mriyante ye pramattāḥ sadā mṛtāḥ //
4.01.uv-kg4#83: || bag yod ’chi med gnas yin te || bag med pa ni ’chi ba’i gnas || bag yod ’chi bar mi ’gyur te || bag med pa ni rtag tu ’chi ||

4.02.S10udanav_u:uv_4.2_0-1: etāṁ viśeṣatāṁ jñātvā hy apramādasya paṇḍitaḥ / apramādaṁ pramudyeta nityam āryaḥ svagocaram //
4.02.uv-kg4#84: de yi khyad par de rig pas || mkhas pa rnams ni bag daṅ bcas || bag yod pa la rab dga’ ba || ’phags pa’i spyod yul dga’ ba yin ||

4.03.S10udanav_u:uv_4.3_0-1: apramattāḥ sātatikā nityaṁ dṛḍhaparākramāḥ /spṛśanti dhīrā nirvāṇaṁ yogakṣemam anuttaram //
4.03.uv-kg4#85: de la rgyun du bsgoms pa daṅ || rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan pa’i || brtan pas grub pa de bla med pa || mya ṅan ’das la reg pa yin ||

4.04.S10udanav_u:uv_4.4_0-2: pramādam apramādena yadā nudati paṇḍitaḥ / prajñāprāsādam āruhya tv aśokaḥ śokinīṁ prajām / parvatasthaiva bhūmisthāṁ dhīro bālān avekṣate //
4.04.uv-kg4#86: gaṅ tshe mkhas pas bag yod pas || bag med bcom pa de yi tshe || śes rab khaṅ bzaṅs steṅ ’dzegs nas || mya ṅan med pas gduṅ bcas daṅ || brtan rnams ri bo’i spo dag las || sa steṅs byis pa rnams la blta ||

4.05.S10udanav_u:uv_4.5_0-1: utthānenāpramādena saṁyamena damena ca / dvīpaṁ karoti medhāvī tam ogho nābhimardati //
4.05.uv-kg4#87: brtson ’grus daṅ ni bag yod daṅ || yaṅ dag sdom daṅ dul ba yis || mkhas pas gliṅ du byas nas ni || chu bo chen po mṅon du zlog ||

4.06.S10udanav_u:uv_4.6_0-1: utthānavataḥ smṛtātmanaḥ śubhacittasya niśāmyacāriṇaḥ / saṁyatasya hi dharmajīvino hy apramattasya yaśo 'bhivardhate //
4.06.uv-kg4#88: brtson ’grus ldan źiṅ dran daṅ ldan pa daṅ || spyod pa gtsaṅ źiṅ brtags nas byed pa daṅ || yaṅ dag sdom daṅ chos kyis ’tsho ba daṅ || bag yod rnams kyi grags pa mṅon par ’phel ||

4.07.S10udanav_u:uv_4.7_0-1: adhicetasi mā pramadyata pratataṁ maunapadeṣu śikṣata / śokā na bhavanti tāyino hy upaśāntasya sadā smṛtātmanaḥ //
4.07.uv-kg4#89: lhag pa’i sems la bag bya ste || thub pa’i thub gźi rnams la bslab || ñer źi rtag tu dran ldan pa’i || skyoṅ ba mya ṅan med pa yin ||

4.08.S10udanav_u:uv_4.8_0-1: hīnāṁ dharmāṁ na seveta pramādena na saṁvaset / mithyādṛṣṭiṁ na roceta na bhavel lokavardhanaḥ //
4.08.uv-kg4#90: dman pa’i chos la mi rten ciṅ || bag med pa la bsñen mi bya || log ṅa ra lta la ’dod med daṅ || ’jig rten ’phel bar mi bya’o ||

4.09.S10udanav_u:uv_4.9_0-1: samyagdṛṣṭir adhīmātrā laukikī yasya vidyate / api jātisahasrāṇi nāsau gacchati durgatim //
4.09.uv-kg4#91: ’jig rten pa yi yaṅ dag lta || chen po su la yod gyur pa || de ni tshe rabs stoṅ du yaṅ || ṅan ’gror ’gro bar mi ’gyur ro ||

4.1.S10udanav_u:uv_4.10_0-1: pramādam anuvartante bālā durmedhaso janāḥ / apramādaṁ tu medhāvī dhanaṁ śreṣṭhīva rakṣati //
4.1.uv-kg4#92: bag med pa la sbyoṅ byed pa || skye bo byis pa bsam brlag yin || tshoṅ dpon nor rnams sruṅ ba ltar || mkhas pa pag daṅ ldan par bya ||

4.11.S10udanav_u:uv_4.11_1: apramattaḥ sadā dhyāyī prāpnute hy āsrava kṣayam //
4.11.uv-kg4#93cd: rtag tu bag yod sems byed pa || zag pa zad pa thob par ’gyur ||

4.12.S10udanav_u:uv_4.12_0: pramādam na anuyujyeta na kāma rati saṃstavam /
4.12.uv-kg4#93ab: bag med pa la mi sbyor źiṅ || ’dod la dga’ ba mi sogs daṅ ||

4.13.S10udanav_u:uv_4.13_0-1: nāyaṁ pramādakālaḥ syād aprāpte hy āsravakṣaye / māraḥ pramattam anveti siṁhaṁ vā mṛgramātṛkā //
4.13.uv-kg4#94: zag pa zad pa ma thob kyaṅ || dus ’dir bag med mi bya ste || ri dgas ma yin seṅ ge ltar || bag med pa dag bsad par ’gyur ||

4.14.S10udanav_u:uv_4.14_0-1: sthānāni catvāri naraḥ pramatta āpadyate yaḥ paradārasevī / apuṇyalābhaṁ hy anikāmaśayyāṁ nindāṁ tṛtīyaṁ narakaṁ caturtham //
4.14.uv-kg4#95: bag med pha rol bud med sten byed pa’i || mi gaṅ yid la gnas skabs ’di bźi ’byuṅ || bsod nams mi ’thob bde par mi ñal daṅ || gsum pa smad ’gyur bźi pa dmyal bar ’gyur ||

4.15.S10udanav_u:uv_4.15_0-1: apuṇyalābhaṁ ca gatiṁ ca pāpikāṁ bhītasya bhītābhir athālpikāṁ ratim /nindāṁ ca paśyaṁ nṛpateś ca daṇḍaṁ parasya dārāṇi vivarjayeta // [i] apuṇyalābhaś ca gatiś ca pāpikā bhītasya bhītābhir athālpikā ratiḥ /rājā ca daṇḍaṁ gurukaṁ dadāti kāyasya bhedād narakeṣu pacyate // [ii]
4.15.uv-kg4#96: bsod nams ma thob sdig pa’i ’gro ba daṅ || ’jigs daṅ bag tsha lhan cig bde ba chuṅ || rgyal po’i chad pa chen pos gcod ’gyur źiṅ || lus źig sems can dmyal ba rnams su ’tshed ||

4.16.S10udanav_u:uv_4.16_0-1: pratiyatyeva tat kuryād yaj jāned dhitam ātmanaḥ / na śākaṭikacintābhir mandaṁ dhīraḥ parākramet //
4.16.uv-kg4#97: gaṅ zig bdag bde lta ’dod pa || des ni goṅ ma bźin du bya || byis pa’i śiṅ rta bźin ’gyur bas || brtan pas brtson ’grus źan mi bya ||

4.17.S10udanav_u:uv_4.17_0-1: yathā śākaṭiko mārgaṁ samaṁ hitvā mahāpatham / viṣamaṁ mārgam āgamya cchinnākṣaḥ śocate bhṛśam //
4.17.uv-kg4#98: dper na byis pa’i śiṅ rta dag || lam chen bzaṅ po bor nas su || lam ṅan dag tu ’gro byed pas || mig chag sems khoṅs chud pa ltar ||

4.18.S10udanav_u:uv_4.18_0-1: evaṁ dharmād apakramya hy adharmam anuvartya ca / bālo mṛtyuvaśaṁ prāptac chinnākṣa iva śocate //
4.18.uv-kg4#99: de bźin ni spaṅs nas kyaṅ || chos min rjes su ’jug byed pa’i || byis pa ’chi bdag dbaṅ ’gro źiṅ || mig chag bźin du bcom pa thob ||

4.19.S10udanav_u:uv_4.19_0-2: yat kṛtyaṁ tad apaviddham akṛtyaṁ kriyate punaḥ / uddhatānāṁ pramattānāṁ teṣāṁ vardhanti āsravāḥ / āsravās teṣu vardhante ārāt te hy āsravakṣayāt //
4.19.uv-kg4#100: gaṅ źig bya ba rnam spaṅs nas || mi bya ba dag byed pa daṅ || bag med pa yis rlom byed pa || de dag rnams kyi zag pa ’phel || gaṅ gis zag pa ’phel ’gyur ba || de yi zag med rgyaṅ ma na ||

4.2.S10udanav_u:uv_4.20_0-2: yeṣāṁ tu susamārabdhā nityaṁ kāyagatā smṛtiḥ / akṛtyaṁ te na kurvanti kṛtye sātatyakāriṇaḥ / smṛtānāṁ saṁprajānānām astaṁ gacchanti āsravāḥ //
4.2.uv-kg4#101: gaṅ źig lus gtogs dran pa dag || rtag tu legs par brtsams pa daṅ || bya ba ma yin mi byed ciṅ || rgyun du bya ba byed pa daṅ || dran daṅ śes bźin ldan pa de’i || thag pa rnams ni zad par ’gyur || gaṅ gi za pa zad gyur pa || des ni zag med thob par ’gyur ||

4.21.S10udanav_u:uv_4.21_0-2: na tāvatā dharmadharo yāvatā bahu bhāṣate / yas tv ihālpam api śrutvā dharmaṁ kāyena vai spṛśet / sa vai dharmadharo bhavati yo dharme na pramādyate //
4.21.uv-kg4#102: ji tsam maṅ du smra byed la || de dag dam chos ’dzin ma yin || gaṅ dag ’di na thos ñuṅ yaṅ || lus kyis chos dag mṅon sum byas || gaṅ dag chos la bag byed pa || de dag dam chos ’dzin pa yin ||

4.22.S10udanav_u:uv_4.22_0-1: subahv apīha sahitaṁ bhāṣamāṇo na tatkaro bhavati naraḥ pramattaḥ / gopaiva gāḥ saṁgaṇayaṁ pareṣāṁ na bhāgavāṁ cchrāmaṇyārthasya bhavati //
4.22.uv-kg4#103: gal te rigs bcas maṅ du smras kyaṅ ni || bag med mi dag de ltar byed mi ’gyur || dper na phyug rdziṅ gźan gyi phyugs bgraṅs ltar || de dag dge sbyoṅ skal ba thob ma yin ||

4.23.S10udanav_u:uv_4.23_0-1: alpam api cet sahitaṁ bhāṣamāṇo dharmasya bhavati hy anudharmacārī / rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca tathaiva mohaṁ prahāya bhāgī śrāmaṇyārthasya bhavati //
4.23.uv-kg4#104: gal te rigs bcas ñuṅ du smra byed kyaṅ || chos kyi rjes su chos la spyod pa daṅ || ’dod chags źe sdaṅ gti mug spoṅ byed pa || de dag dge sbyoṅ skal ba thob pa yin ||

4.24.S10udanav_u:uv_4.24_0-1: apramādaṁ praśaṁsanti pramādo garhitaḥ sadā / apramādena maghavāṁ devānāṁ śreṣṭhatāṁ gataḥ //
4.24.uv-kg4#105: bag yod bsṅags brjod byed ciṅ || rtag tu bag med la smod pas || bag yod mchod sbyin brgya pa yaṅ || lha rnams naṅ na gtso bor gyur ||

4.25.S10udanav_u:uv_4.25_0-1: apramādaṁ praśaṁsanti sadā kṛtyeṣu paṇḍitāḥ / apramatto hy ubhāv arthāv atigṛhṇāti paṇḍitaḥ //
4.25.uv-kg4#106: bya ba byas ruṅ ma byas ruṅ || mkhas pa bag yod bsṅags pa brjod || bag daṅ chas pa’i mkhas pa yis || don gñis rab tu len par byed ||

4.26.S10udanav_u:uv_4.26_0-1: dṛṣṭadhārmika eko 'rthas tathānyaḥ sāmparāyikaḥ / arthābhisamayād dhīraḥ paṇḍito hi nirucyate //
4.26.uv-kg4#107: tshe ’di’i don ni gaṅ yin daṅ || phyi ma’i don ni gaṅ yin pa || de dag brtan pas rtogs pas na || mkhas pa źes ni brjod pa yin ||

4.27.S10udanav_u:uv_4.27_0-1: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ / durgād uddharate tmānaṁ paṅkasannaiva kuñjaraḥ //
4.27.uv-kg4#108: dge sloṅ bag yod la dga’ źiṅ || bag med pa la ’jigs lta bas || bdag ñid ṅan ’gro las ’drel te || ’dam rdzab las ni glaṅ chen bźin ||

4.28.S10udanav_u:uv_4.28_0-1: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ / dhunāti pāpakāṁ dharmāṁ patrāṇīva hi mārutaḥ //
4.28.uv-kg4#109: dge sloṅ bag yod la dga’ źiṅ || bag med pa la ’jigs lta bas || sdig pa’i chos rnams sprug par byed || rluṅ gis ljon śiṅ lo ma bźin ||

4.29.S10udanav_u:uv_4.29_0-1: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ / saṁyojanam aṇusthūlaṁ dahann agnir iva gacchati //
4.29.uv-kg4#110: dge sloṅ bag yod la dga’ źiṅ || bag med pa la ’jigs lta bas || kun tu sbyor ba phra sbom dag || me yis bsregs pa bźin du ’gro ||

4.3.S10udanav_u:uv_4.30_0-1: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ / spṛśati hy anupūrveṇa sarvasaṁyojanakṣayam //
4.3.uv-kg4#111: dge sloṅ bag yod la dga’ źiṅ || bag med pa la ’jigs lta bas || kun tu sbyor ba kun zad pa || rim gyis ñams su myoṅ bar ’gyur ||

4.31.S10udanav_u:uv_4.31_0-1: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ / pratividhyate padaṁ śāntaṁ saṁskāropaśamaṁ sukham //
4.31.uv-kg4#112: dge sloṅ bag yod la dga’ źiṅ || bag med pa la ’jigs lta bas || ’du byed ñer źi źi ba yi || źi ba’i go ’phaṅ so sor rtogs ||

4.32.S10udanav_u:uv_4.32_0-1: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ / abhavyaḥ parihāṇāya nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike //
4.32.uv-kg4#113: dge sloṅ bag yod la dga’ źiṅ || bag med pa la ’jigs lta ba || mya ṅan ’das daṅ ñe ba’i phyir || yoṅs su ñams ’gyur mi srid do ||

4.33.S10udanav_u:uv_4.33_0-1: uttiṣṭata vyāyamata dṛḍhaṁ śikṣata śāntaye / asmṛtiś ca pramādaś caivānutthānam asaṁyamaḥ //
4.33.uv-kg4#115: źi phyir bslab pa la rten daṅ || rtsol ba daṅ ni brtson ’grus skyed || mi dran pa daṅ bag med daṅ || brtson ’grus chuṅ daṅ kun sdom med ||

4.34.S10udanav_u:uv_4.34_0-1: nidrā tandrīr anāyoga ete śikṣāntarāyikāḥ / tad aṅgaṁ pratibudhyadhvaṁ smṛtir māntaradhīyata //
4.34.uv-kg4#116: gñid daṅ sñom daṅ g-yeṅ ba ste || ’di dag bslab pa’i bar chad pas || khyed kyis yan lag de rtogs la || dran pa chud ni ma gzan cig ||

4.35.S10udanav_u:uv_4.35_0-1: uttiṣṭhen na pramādyeta dharmaṁ sucaritaṁ caret / dharmacārī sukhaṁ śete hy asmiṁ loke paratra ca //
4.35.uv-kg4#114: brtson ’grus ldan źiṅ bag yod daṅ || chos spyad legs par spyod byed pa || ’jig rten ’di daṅ pha rol du || chos spyad pas ni bde ba ’thob ||

4.36.S10udanav_u:uv_4.36_0-1: apramādaratā bhavata suśīlā bhavata bhikṣavaḥ / susamāhitasaṁkalpāḥ svacittam anurakṣata //
4.36.uv-kg4#117: dge sloṅ tshul khrims bzaṅ ba daṅ || bag yod pa la dga’ ba yis || kun rtog legs par mñam źog ste || rag gi sems ni rjes su sruṅs ||

4.37.S10udanav_u:uv_4.37_0-1: ārabhadhvaṁ niṣkramadhvaṁ yujyadhvaṁ buddhaśāsane / dhunidhvaṁ mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṁ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
4.37.uv-kg4#118: brtsam par bya źiṅ dbyuṅ bar bya || saṅs rgyas bstan la ’jug par bya || ’dam bu’i khyim la glaṅ chen bźin || ’chi bdag sde ni gźom par bya ||

4.38.S10udanav_u:uv_4.38_0-1: yo hy asmiṁ dharmavinaye tv apramatto bhaviṣyati / prahāya jātisaṁsāraṁ duḥkhasyāntaṁ sa yāsyati //
4.38.uv-kg4#119: gaṅ źig chos ’dul ’di ñid la || bag daṅ ldan par spyod byed pa || skye ba’i ’khor ba rab spaṅs nas || sdug bsṅal tha mar byed par ’gyur ||

5.01.S10udanav_u:uv_5.1_0-1: priyebhyo jāyate śokaḥ priyebhyo jāyate bhayam / priyebhyo vipramuktānāṁ nāsti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
5.01.uv-kg5#120: || sdug pa rnams las mya ṅan skye || sdug pa rnams las ’jigs pa skye || sdug pa dag ni rnam spaṅs na || mya ṅan med ciṅ ’jigs pa med ||

5.02.S10udanav_u:uv_5.2_0-1: priyebhyo jāyate śokaḥ priyebhyo jāyate bhayam / priyāṇām anyathībhāvād unmādam api gacchati //
5.02.uv-kg5#121: sdug gu ma las mya ṅan skye || sdug las sdug bsṅal sdug las ’jigs || sdug gu ma dag gźan gyur na || yi mug ’gyur ba thob par byed ||

5.03.S10udanav_u:uv_5.3_0-1: śokā hi ye vai paridevitaṁ ca duḥkhaṁ ca lokasya hi naikarūpam / priyaṁ pratītyeha tad asti sarvaṁ priye 'sati syān na kathaṁ cid etat //
5.03.uv-kg5#122: ’jig rten sdug bsṅal rnam pa du ma daṅ || mya ṅan smre sṅags ’don pa ji sñed pa || de dag sdug pa dag las rten te ’byuṅ || sdug pa spaṅs na de dag yod mi ’gyur ||

5.04.S10udanav_u:uv_5.4_0-1: tasmād dhi te sukhitā vītaśokā yeṣāṁ priyaṁ nāsti kathaṁ cid eva / tasmād aśokaṁ padam eṣamāṇaḥ priyaṁ na kurvīta hi jīvaloke //
5.04.uv-kg5#123: gaṅ phyir ’jig rten ’ga’ na’aṅ sdug med pa || gaṅ yin de dag bde źiṅ mya ṅan med|| de bas gduṅ med rdul bral don gñer bas || nam yaṅ sdug par byed pa mi bya’o ||

5.05.S10udanav_u:uv_5.5_0-1: mā priyaiḥ saṁgamo jātu mā ca syād apriyaiḥ sadā /priyāṇām adarśanaṁ duḥkham apriyāṇāṁ ca darśanam //
5.05.uv-kg5#124: sdug pa ma mthoṅ sdug bsṅal la || mi sdug mthoṅ na’aṅ de bźin pas || nam yaṅ sdug daṅ phrad mi bya || mi sdug daṅ yaṅ phrad mi bya ||

5.06.S10udanav_u:uv_5.6_0-1: priyāṇāṁ ca vinābhāvād apriyāṇāṁ ca saṁgramāt / tīvra utpadyate śoko jīryante yena mānavāḥ //
5.06.uv-kg5#125: sdug pa daṅ ni bye bral daṅ || mi sdug ba daṅ phrad pa yis || gaṅ gis mi dag rgas byed pa’i || mya ṅan mi bzad skye bar ’gyur ||

5.07.S10udanav_u:uv_5.7_0-1: priyaṁ mṛtaṁ kālagataṁ jñātayaḥ sahitāḥ sthitāḥ / śocanti dīrgham adhvānaṁ duḥkho hi priyasaṁgamaḥ //
5.07.uv-kg5#126: sdug pa śi bar gyur pa na || gñen ’dun mdza’ bśes maṅ po dag || yun riṅ dus su mya ṅan daṅ || sdug daṅ bral bas sdug bsṅal ’gyur ||

5.08.S10udanav_u:uv_5.8_0-1: tasmāt priyaṁ na kurvīta priyabhāvo hi pāpakaḥ / granthās teṣāṁ na vidyante yeṣāṁ nāsti priyāpriyam //
5.08.uv-kg5#127: gaṅ la sdug daṅ sdug min med || de la mdud pa yod min pas || de ltas sdug ñin sdig can la || sdug par byed pa mi bya’o ||

5.09.S10udanav_u:uv_5.9_0-1: ayoge yujya cātmānaṁ yoge cāyujya sarvadā / arthaṁ hitvā priyagrāhī spṛhayaty arthayogine //
5.09.uv-kg5#128: sdug la bltas te don btaṅ nas || bde sbyor rnams la mi ’jug ciṅ || bdag ñid mi bde’i sbyor ldan dag || bde sbyoṅ don ldan rnams la smon ||

5.1.S10udanav_u:uv_5.10_0-1: priyarūpasātagrathitā devakāyāḥ pṛthaksthitāḥ / āghādinaḥ paridyūnā mṛtyurājavaśaṁ gatāḥ //
5.1.uv-kg5#129: gzugs sdug bde bas bsdams pa dag || lha mi so so’i ris dag tu || sdig pa byed ciṅ yoṅs ñams nas || rga daṅ ’chi ba’i dbaṅ du ’gro ||

5.11.S10udanav_u:uv_5.11_0-1: ye vai divā ca rātrau caivāpramattāḥ priyaṁ jahati nityam / te vai khananti tv aghamūlaṁ mṛtyu-r-āmiṣaṁ durativartyam //
5.11.uv-kg5#130: gaṅ źig ñin daṅ mtshan rnams su || bag yod gzugs sdug spoṅ byed pa || des ni spaṅ dka’ bdud zas daṅ || sdig pa’i rtsa ba’aṅ druṅs nas phyuṅ ||

5.12.S10udanav_u:uv_5.12_0-1: asādhu sādhurūpeṇa priyarūpeṇa cāpriyam / duḥkhaṁ sukhyasya rūpeṇa pramattān abhimardati //
5.12.uv-kg5#131: legs min legs par tshul daṅ ni || sdug min sdug pa’i tshul gyis daṅ || sdug bsṅal bde ba’i tshul gyis su || bag med rnams ni mṅon du ’joms ||

5.13.S10udanav_u:uv_5.13_0-1: ātmānaṁ cet priyaṁ vidyān nainaṁ pāpena yojayet / na hy etat sulabhaṁ bhavati sukhaṁ duṣkṛtakāriṇā //
5.13.uv-kg5#132: gal te bdag la dga’ byed na || ñes par byed pas bde ba dag || bde blag kho nar mi ’thob pas || ’di ni sdug la gźug mi bya ||

5.14.S10udanav_u:uv_5.14_0-1: ātmānaṁ cet priyaṁ vidyān nainaṁ pāpena yojayet / etad dhi sulabhaṁ bhavati sukhaṁ sukṛtakāriṇā //
5.14.uv-kg5#133: gal te bdag la dga’ byed na || legs par byed pas bde ba dag || bde blag kho nar thob ’gyur bas || ’di ni sdig la gźug mi bya ||

5.15.S10udanav_u:uv_5.15_0-1: ātmānam cet priyam vidyād rakṣed enam surakṣitam / yathā pratyanta nagaram gambhīra parikham dṛḍham /
5.15.uv-kg5#134: dper na dgon pa’i groṅ khyer dag || brtan pa’i ’obs kyis bskor ba ltar || gal te bdag la dga’ byed na || ’di ni bsruṅ bas legs par bsruṅ ||

5.15a.uv-kg5#135bc: thun gsum gaṅ yaṅ ruṅ ba la || mkhas pas mel tse bya ba yis ||

5.16.S10udanav_u:uv_5.16_0: ātmānam cet priyam vidyād gopayet tam sugopitam /
5.16.uv-kg5#135ad: gal te bdag la dga’ byed na || ’di ni sba bas legs par sba ||

5.16a.S10udanav_u:uv_5.16_1: yathā pratyanta nagaram guptam antar bahisthiram / [antar bahiḥ sthiram]
5.16a.uv-kg5#136ab: dper na dgon pa’i groṅ khyer dag || phyi naṅ sruṅ bar byed pa ltar ||

5.17.S10udanav_u:uv_5.17_0-1: evam gopayata ātmānam kṣaṇo vo mā hy upatyagāt / kṣaṇa atītā hi śocante narakeṣu samarpitāḥ //
5.17.uv-kg5#136cdef: dal ’byor chud ni mi zos pa || de ltar bdag ni bsruṅ bar bya || sems can dmyal bar skye na yaṅ || dal ’byor thal bas ’gyod par ’oṅ ||

5.18.S10udanav_u:uv_5.18_0-1: sarvā diśas tv anuparigamya cetasā naivādhyagāt priyataram ātmanaḥ kva cit /evaṁ priyaḥ pṛthagātmā pareṣāṁ tasmān na hiṁsyāt param ātmakāraṇam //
5.18.uv-kg5#137: phyogs rnams kun du sems kyis yoṅs brtags kyaṅ || bdag las ches sdug ’ga’ yaṅ ma mthoṅ ba || de ltar so sor gźan la’aṅ raṅ sdug pas || de phyir bdag dgas gźan la gnod mi bya ||

5.19.S10udanav_u:uv_5.19_0-1: sarve daṇḍasya bibhyanti sarveṣāṁ jīvitaṁ priyam / ātmānam upamāṁ kṛtvā naiva hanyān na ghātayet //
5.19.uv-kg5#138: thams cad la yaṅ srog ’di sdug || thams cad chad pas ’jigs pa na || raṅ gi ñams las dpag gyis te || brtseg par mi bya gsad mi bya ||

5.2.S10udanav_u:uv_5.20_0-1: cirapravāsinaṁ yadvad dūrataḥ svastināgatam / jñātayaḥ suhṛdo mitrāś cābhinandanti āgatam //
5.2.uv-kg5#139: rgyaṅ thag bcad par spyugs pa’i mi || riṅ nas ne źo med ’oṅs na || gñen bśes mdza’ bo lhags nas su || a la la źes mṅon par dga’ ||

5.21.S10udanav_u:uv_5.21_0-1: kṛtapuṇyaṁ tathā martyam asmāl lokāt paraṁ gatam / puṇyāny evābhinandanti priyaṁ jñātim ivāgatam //
5.21.uv-kg5#140: de bźin bsod nams byas pa’i mi || ’jig rten ’di nas pha rol tu || phyin tshe ñin bźin bsod nams dag || ’oṅs nas mṅon par dga’ par byed ||

5.22.S10udanav_u:uv_5.22_0-1: tasmāt kuruta puṇyānāṁ nicayaṁ sāmparāyikam / puṇyāni paraloke hi pratiṣṭhā prāṇināṁ hi sā //
5.22.uv-kg5#141: de bas ’jig rten pha rol gyi || ched du bsod nams bsags par gyis || bsod nams ’jig rten pha rol tu || lus can rnams kyi gnas su ’gyur ||

5.23.S10udanav_u:uv_5.23_0-1: puṇyaṁ devāḥ praśaṁsanti samacaryāṁ ca yaś caret / iha cānindito bhavati pretya svarge ca modate //
5.23.uv-kg5#142: gaṅ źig legs spyad spyod byed pa’i || dge la lha rnams stoṅ par byed || ’di na’aṅ smad par mi ’gyur la || mtho ris su yaṅ dga’ ba ’thob ||

5.24.S10udanav_u:uv_5.24_0-1: dharmasthaṁ śīlasaṁpannaṁ hrīmantaṁ satyavādinam / ātmanaḥ kārakaṁ santaṁ taṁ janaḥ kurute priyam //
5.24.uv-kg5#143: chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs || ṅo tsha śes śiṅ bden par smra || raṅ gi bya ba byed pa la || skye bo gźan rnams dga’ bar byed ||

5.25.S10udanav_u:uv_5.25_0-1: pareṣāṁ ca priyo bhavati hy ātmārthaṁ kriyate 'pi ca / dṛṣte ca dharme prāśaṁsyaḥ sāmparāye ca sadgatiḥ //
5.25.uv-kg5#144: raṅ gi don ni byed pa la || ’di ltar gźan rnams dga’ ’gyur źiṅ || mthoṅ ba’i chos la bsṅags pa daṅ || pha rol tu yaṅ bde ’gror ’gyur ||

5.26.S10udanav_u:uv_5.26_0-1: avavadetānuśāsīta cāsabhyāc ca nivārayet / asatāṁ na priyo bhavati satāṁ bhavati tu priyaḥ //
5.26.uv-kg5#145: gtams na gnaṅ ba’i tshig smra daṅ || mi rigs spyod las zlog pa la || dam pa rnams ni dga’ bar byed || dam pa ma yin dga’ mi ’gyur ||

5.27.S10udanav_u:uv_5.27_0-1: asantaś caiva santaś ca nānā yānti tv itaś cyutāḥ / asanto narakaṁ yānti santaḥ svargaparāyaṇāḥ //
5.27.uv-kg5#146: de bas mchog daṅ mchog min pa || śi ’phos bral bar gyur pa na || dam pa ma yin dmyal bar ’gro || dam pa mtho ris ’gro bar ’gyur ||

6.01.S10udanav_u:uv_6.1_0-1: śīlaṁ rakṣeta medhāvī prārthayaṁ vai sukhatrayam / praśaṁsā vittalābhaṁ ca pretya svarge ca modanam //
6.01.uv-kg6#147: || bsṅags par ’gyur daṅ nor ’thob daṅ || pha rol bde ’gror dga’ ’gyur ba’i || bde pa gsum po don gñer ba’i || mkhas pas tshul khrims bsruṅ bar bya ||

6.02.S10udanav_u:uv_6.2_0-1: sthānāny etāni saṁpaśyaṁ śīlaṁ rakṣeta paṇḍitaḥ / āryo darśanasaṁpannaḥ sa loke labhate śivam //
6.02.uv-kg6#148: ’phags daṅ mthoṅ ba phun tshogs daṅ || ’jig rten źi ba rten ’gyur ba’i || gnas gźan ’di dag mthoṅ ba yis || mkhas pas tshul khrims bsruṅ bar bya ||

6.03.S10udanav_u:uv_6.3_0-1: sukhaṁ śīlasamādānaṁ kāyo na paridahyate / sukhaṁ ca rātrau svapati pratibuddhaś ca nandati //
6.03.uv-kg6#149: lus la yoṅs su gduṅ med par || tshul khrims kyis ni bde ba ’thob || mtshan mo bde bar ñal ba daṅ || sad pa na yaṅ dga’ bar ’gyur ||

6.04.S10udanav_u:uv_6.4_0-1: śīlaṁ yāvaj jarā sādhu śraddhā sādhu pratiṣṭhitā /prajñā narāṇāṁ ratnaṁ vai puṇyaṁ coraiḥ sudurharam //
6.04.uv-kg6#151: rgan pa’i bral tshul khrims dge || dad la rab tu gnas na legs || mi yi rin chen śes rab ste || bsod nams chom pos dbrog par dka’ ||

6.05.S10udanav_u:uv_6.5_0-1: kṛtvā puṇyāni saprajño datvā dānāni śīlavān / iha cātha paratrāsau sukhaṁ samadhigacchati //
6.05.uv-kg6#150: sbyin pa tshul khrims ldan pa dag || mkhas pas byas pa’i bsod nams kyis || ’di ṅaṅ pha rol dag tu yaṅ || rtag tu bde ba ’thob par ’gyur ||

6.06.S10udanav_u:uv_6.6_0-1: śīle pratiṣṭhito bhikṣur indriyaiś ca susaṁvṛtaḥ / bhojane cāpi mātrajño yukto jāgarikāsu ca //
6.06.uv-kg6#152: dge sloṅ tshul khrims la gnas śiṅ || dbaṅ po rnams kyaṅ bsdams pa daṅ || zas kyi tshod ni rig pa daṅ || mi ñal ba la ’bad pa ste ||

6.07.S10udanav_u:uv_6.7_0-1: viharann evam ātāpī hy ahorātram atandritaḥ / abhavyaḥ parihāṇāya nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike //
6.07.uv-kg6#153: de ltar gnas par brtson pa daṅ || ñin mtshan sñom las mi byed pa || mya ṅan ’das daṅ ne ba’i phyir || yoṅs su ñams ’gyur mi srid do ||

6.08.S10udanav_u:uv_6.8_0-1: śīle pratiṣṭhito bhikṣuś cittaṁ prajñāṁ ca bhāvayet / ātāpī nipako nityaṁ prāpnuyād duḥkhasaṁkṣayam //
6.08.uv-kg6#154: mi ni tshul khrims la gnas nas || sems daṅ śes rab sgom pa la || brtson źiṅ ṅes gnas dge sloṅ gis || sdug bsṅal zad pa thob par ’gyur ||

6.09.S10udanav_u:uv_6.9_0-1: tasmāt satataśīlī syāt samādher anurakṣakaḥ /vipaśyanāyāṁ śikṣec ca saṁprajānapratismṛtaḥ //
6.09.uv-kg6#155: de phyir rtag tu tshul khrims daṅ || tiṅ ’dzin rjes su sruṅ ba daṅ || lhag mthoṅ la ni bslab pa daṅ || śes bźin so sor dran par bya ||

6.1.S10udanav_u:uv_6.10_0-1: sa tu vikṣīnasaṁyogaḥ kṣīṇamāno niraupadhiḥ /kāyasya bhedāt saprajñaḥ saṁkhyān nopaiti nirvṛtaḥ //
6.1.uv-kg6#156: des ni kun sbyor zad byas nas || yid bral lhag ma med ’gyur te || lus źig śes rab ldan pa yis || bgraṅ du med pa’i mya ṅan ’das ||

6.11.S10udanav_u:uv_6.11_0-1: śīlaṁ samādhiḥ prajñā ca yasya hy ete subhāvitāḥ /so 'tyantaniṣṭho vimalas tv aśokaḥ kṣīṇasaṁbhavaḥ //
6.11.uv-kg6#157: gaṅ źig tshul khrims tiṅ ’dzin daṅ || śes rab ’di gsum legs bsgoms te || śin tu dri med mthar phyin ciṅ || gduṅ med yaṅ srid zad gyur daṅ ||

6.12.S10udanav_u:uv_6.12_0-1: saṅgāt pramukto hy asita ājñātāvī niraupadhiḥ /atikramya māraviṣayam ādityo vā virocate //
6.12.uv-kg6#158: chags pa’i ’chiṅ las rnam grol źiṅ || lus spaṅs śes rab ldan pa daṅ || bdud kyi yul las ’das pa daṅ || ñi ma bźin du lam me ’bar ||

6.13.S10udanav_u:uv_6.13_0-1: uddhatasya pramattasya bhikṣuṇo bahirātmanaḥ /śīlaṁ samādhiḥ prajñā ca pāripūriṁ na gacchati //
6.13.uv-kg6#159: dge sloṅ phyi daṅ naṅ ñid la || bag med rlom par byed pa yi || tshul khrims tiṅ ’dzin śes rab rnams || yoṅs su rdzogs par mi ’gyur ro ||

6.14.S10udanav_u:uv_6.14_0-1: channam evābhivarṣati vivṛtaṁ nābhivarṣati / tasmād dhi cchannaṁ vivared evaṁ taṁ nābhivarṣati //
6.14.uv-kg6#160: sprin gyis khebs las char ’bab ciṅ || nam thaṅ ba las char mi ’bab || de bas khebs pa sol cig daṅ || ’di ltar char pa ’bab mi ’gyur ||

6.15.S10udanav_u:uv_6.15_0-1: etad dhi dṛṣṭvā śikṣeta sadā śīleṣu paṇḍitaḥ / nirvāṇagamanaṁ mārgaṁ kṣipram eva viśodhayet //
6.15.uv-kg6#161: de ltar rtag tu mthoṅ ba daṅ || dge sloṅ tshul khrims sdom pa yi || mya ṅan ’das par ’gro ba’i lam || myur ba kho nar rnam par ’dag ||

6.16.S10udanav_u:uv_6.16_0-1: na puṣpagandhaḥ prativātam eti na vāhnijāt tagarac candanād vā / satāṁ tu gandhaḥ prativātam eti sarvā diśaḥ satpuruṣaḥ pravāti //
6.16.uv-kg6#162: me tog dri ni rdzi phyogs min mi ’gro || rtsa ba rgya spos tsan dan rnams kyaṅ min || dam pa’i dri ni rdzi phyogs mi ’gro ste || phyogs rnams kun du mi mchog dri yis khyab ||

6.17.S10udanav_u:uv_6.17_0-1: tagarāc candanāc cāpi vārṣikāyās tathotpalāt / etebhyo gandhajātebhyaḥ śīlagandhas tv anuttaraḥ //
6.17.uv-kg6#163: rgya spos daṅ ni tsan dan daṅ || ud pa la daṅ ma li ka || spos kyi rigs ni ’di dag pas || tshul khrims dri bzuṅ phul du phyin ||

6.18.S10udanav_u:uv_6.18_0-1: alpamātro hy ayaṁ gandho yo 'yaṁ tagaracandanāt / yas tu śīlavatāṁ gandho vāti deveṣv apīha saḥ //
6.18.uv-kg6#164: rgya spos tsan dan gaṅ yin pa’i || dri bsuṅ ’di ni chuṅ ṅu ma || tshul khrims ldan pa’i dri bsuṅ gaṅ || des ni ’di daṅ mtho ris khyab ||

6.19.S10udanav_u:uv_6.19_0-1: teṣāṁ viśuddhaśīlānām apramādavihāriṇām / samyagājñāvimuktānāṁ māro mārgaṁ na vindati //
6.19.uv-kg6#165: de ltar bag yod gnas bya źiṅ || tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya || yaṅ dag śes pas rnam grol na || bdud kyi lam ni rñed mi ’gyur ||

6.20.S10udanav_u:uv_6.20_0-1: eṣa kṣema gamo mārga;eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye / pratipannakāḥ prahāsyanti dhyāyino māra bandhanam //
6.20.uv-kg6#166: ’di ni bde bar ’gro lam ste || rnam par dag byed lam ’di la || rab tu źugs te bsgoms nas kyaṅ || bdud kyi ’chiṅ ba spaṅ bar gyis ||

7.01.S10udanav_u:uv_7.1_0-1: kāyapradoṣaṁ rakṣeta syāt kāyena susaṁvṛtaḥ / kāyaduścaritaṁ hitvā kāyena sukṛtaṁ caret //
7.01.uv-kg7#167: || lus kyi nes par spyod spaṅs śiṅ || lus kyi legs spyad spyad pa’i phyir || lus kyi ñes chen las bsruṅs na || lus ni bsdam pa byas par ’gyur ||

7.02.S10udanav_u:uv_7.2_0-1: vācaḥ pradoṣaṁ rakṣeta vacasā saṁvṛto bhavet / vāco duścaritaṁ hitvā vācā sucaritaṁ caret //
7.02.uv-kg7#168: ṅag gi ñes par spyad spaṅs śiṅ || ṅag gi legs spyad spyad pa’i phyir || ṅag gi ñes chen las bsruṅs || ṅag ni bsdam pa byas par ’gyur ||

7.03.S10udanav_u:uv_7.3_0-1: manaḥpradoṣaṁ rakṣeta manasā saṁvṛto bhavet / manoduścaritaṁ hitvā manaḥsucaritaṁ caret //
7.03.uv-kg7#169: yid kyi ñes par spyod spaṅs śiṅ || yid kyi legs spyad spyad pa’i phyir || yid kyi ñes chen las bsruṅs na || yid ni bsdam pa byas par ’gyur ||

7.04.S10udanav_u:uv_7.4_0-1: kāyaduścaritaṁ hitvā vacoduścaritāni ca / manoduścaritaṁ hitvā yac cānyad doṣasaṁhitaṁ //
7.04.uv-kg7#170: lus kyi ñes par spyod spaṅ śiṅ || ṅag gi ñes par spyod pa spaṅ || yid kyi ñes par spyod spaṅ źiṅ || skyon gźan ldan pa gaṅ yin spaṅ ||

7.05.S10udanav_u:uv_7.5_0-1: kāyena kuśalaṁ kuryād vacasā kuśalaṁ bahu / manasā kuśalaṁ kuryād apramāṇaṁ niraupadhim //
7.05.uv-kg7#171: lus kyi dge ba rnams bya źiṅ || ṅag gi dge ba phal chen bya || yid kyi dge ba rnams bya źiṅ || tshad med bźi daṅ ldan par bya ||

7.06.S10udanav_u:uv_7.6_0-1: kāyena kuśalaṁ kṛtvā vacasā cetasāpi ca / iha cātha paratrāsau sukhaṁ samadhigacchati //
7.06.uv-kg7#172: lus kyi dge ba rnams bya źiṅ || ṅag daṅ yid kyis byas na ni || ’di daṅ pha rol dag tu yaṅ || rtag tu bde ba thob par ’gyur ||

7.07.S10udanav_u:uv_7.7_0-1: ahiṁsakā vai munayo nityaṁ kāyena saṁvṛtāḥ / te yānti hy acyutaṁ sthānaṁ yatra gatvā na śocati //
7.07.uv-kg7#173: rtag tu lus ni bsdams pa’i phyir || thub pa ’tshe ba med pa yin || de ni ’chi med gnas ’gro źiṅ || gaṅ du soṅ na’aṅ mya ṅan med ||

7.08.S10udanav_u:uv_7.8_0-1: ahiṁsakā vai munayo nityaṁ vācā susaṁvṛtāḥ / te yānti hy acyutaṁ sthānaṁ yatra gatvā na śocati //
7.08.uv-kg7#174: rtag tu ṅag ni bsdams pa’i phyir || thub pa ’tshe ba med pa yin || de ni ’chi med gnas ’gro źiṅ || gaṅ du soṅ na’aṅ mya ṅan med ||

7.09.S10udanav_u:uv_7.9_0-1: ahiṁsakā vai munayo manasā nityasaṁvṛtāḥ / te yānti hy acyutaṁ sthānaṁ yatra gatvā na śocati //
7.09.uv-kg7#175: rtag tu yid ni bsdams pa’i phyir || thub pa ’tshe ba med pa yin || de ni ’chi med gnas ’gro źiṅ || gaṅ du soṅ na’aṅ mya ṅan med ||

7.1.S10udanav_u:uv_7.10_0-2: kāyena saṁvṛtā dhīrā dhīrā vācā susaṁvṛtāḥ / manasā saṁvṛtā dhīrā dhīrāḥ sarvatra saṁvṛtāḥ / te yānti hy acyutaṁ sthānaṁ yatra gatvā na śocati //
7.1.uv-kg7#176: brtan pa rnams kyis lus bsdam źiṅ || brtan pa rnams kyis ṅag kyaṅ bsdam || brtan pa rnams kyis yid bsdam źiṅ || brtan pas kun du bsdams byas na || de dag ’chi med gnas ’gro źiṅ || gaṅ du soṅ yaṅ mya ṅan med ||

7.11.S10udanav_u:uv_7.11_0-2: kāyena saṁvaraḥ sādhu sādhu vācā ca saṁvaraḥ / manasā saṁvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṁvaraḥ / sarvatra saṁvṛto bhikṣuḥ sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate //
7.11.uv-kg7#177: lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste || ṅag gi sdom pa legs pa yin || yid kyi sdom pa’aṅ legs pa ste || thams cad du ni bsdams pa legs || kun du bsdams pa’i dge sloṅ ni || sdug bsṅal kun las rnam par ’grol ||

7.12.S10udanav_u:uv_7.12_0-1: vācānurakṣī manasā susaṁvṛtaḥ kāyena caivākuśalaṁ na kuryāt /etāṁ śubhāṁ karmapathāṁ viśodhayann ārādhayen mārgam ṛṣipraveditam //
7.12.uv-kg7#178: ṅag rnams bsruṅ źiṅ yid ni legs bsdams te || lus kyis mi dge ba dag spyad mi bya || las lam gsum po ’di dag rnam sbyaṅs na || draṅ sroṅ gsuṅs pa’i lam ni thob par ’gyur ||

8.01.S10udanav_u:uv_8.1_0-1: abhūtavādī narakān upaiti yaś cānyad apy ācaratīha karma / ubhau hi tau pretya samau niruktau nihīnadharmau manujau paratra //
8.01.uv-kg8#179: || gaṅ dag byas bźin ma byas zer ba daṅ || brdzun du smra ba dmyal bar ’gro bar ’gyur || mi de gñis ka ’dra ba pha rol tu || soṅ nas dman pa’i chos daṅ ldan par ’gyur ||

8.02.S10udanav_u:uv_8.2_0-1: pruṣasya hi jātasya kuṭhārī jāyate mukhe / yayā chinatti hātmānaṁ vācā durbhāṣitaṁ vadan //
8.02.uv-kg8#180: skyes bu skyes pa’i kha nas ni || tshig ṅan smra bar byed pa yi || tshig gi sta re skyes gyur nas || bdag ñid gcod par byed par ’gyur ||

8.03.S10udanav_u:uv_8.3_0-1: yo nindiyāṁ praśaṁsati tān api nindati ye praśaṁsiyāḥ / sa cinoti mukhena taṁ kaliṁ kalinā tena sukhaṁ na vindati //
8.03.uv-kg8#181: gaṅ źig smad ’os skye bo stod byed daṅ || bstod ’os skye bo rnam par smod byed pa || de ni kha yis ’thab khrol kun sogs śiṅ || ’thab khrol can gaṅ des ni bde mi ’thob ||

8.04.S10udanav_u:uv_8.4_0-1: alpamātro hy ayaṁ kalir ya ihākṣeṇa dhanaṁ parājayet / ayam atra mahattaraḥ kalir yaḥ sugateṣu manaḥ pradūṣayet //
8.04.uv-kg8#182: gaṅ ’dir cho los raṅ nor ’pham byed pa || ’thab khrol de ni chuṅ zad tsam du zad || gaṅ źig bde bar gśegs la yid ’khrug pa || de ’dir ’thab khrol śin tu chen po yin ||

8.05.S10udanav_u:uv_8.5_0-1: śataṁ sahasrāṇi nirarbudāni ṣaṭtrimśatiṁ pañca tathārbudāni / yān āryagarhī narakān upaiti vācaṁ manaś ca praṇidhāya pāpakam //
8.05.uv-kg8#183: ṅag yid ’phags pas smad pa’i sdig bsten na || bye ba chu bur can daṅ stoṅ phrag ni || bźi bcu gcig tu chu bar rdol pa yi || sems can dmyal ba rnams su ’gro bar ’gyur ||

8.06.S10udanav_u:uv_8.6_0-1: asataṁ hi vadanti pāpacittā narakaṁ vardhayate vadhāya nityam /anavadyabalas titīkṣate tāṁ manaso hy āvilatāṁ vivarjayitvā //
8.06.uv-kg8#184: sdig pa’i sems kyis ma ñes skyon rjod pa || bdag ñid bsad phyir dmyal ba spel bar zad || stobs ldan ñes med pa dag bzod byed ciṅ || de la sems kyaṅ ’khrug par mi byed do ||

8.07.S10udanav_u:uv_8.7_0-1: yaḥ śāsanaṁ hy arhatām āryāṇāṁ dharmajīvinām / pratikrośati durmedhā dṛṣṭiṁ niḥśritya pāpikām / phalaṁ kaṇṭakaveṇur vā phalaty ātmavadhāya saḥ //
8.07.uv-kg8#185: bsam brlag gaṅ źig sdig can gyi || lta la brten nas ’phags pa ni || dgra bcom chos kyis ’tsho ba daṅ || bstan pa spoṅ bar byed pa dag || smig ma ’bru chags lta bur ni || de ni raṅ gi ’bras bus gsod ||

8.08.S10udanav_u:uv_8.8_0-1: kalyāṇikāṁ vimuñceta naiva muñceta pāpikām / muktā kalyāṇikī śreyo muktā tapati pāpikā //
8.08.uv-kg8#186: tshig bzaṅ kho na smra bya yi || sdig pa can dag smra mi bya || sdig can gduṅ byed smra ba bas || tshig bzaṅ smra bar byed pa ruṅ ||

8.09.S10udanav_u:uv_8.9_0-1: na ca mukte pramuñcet tāṁ muñcamāno hi bādhyate / naivam āryāḥ pramuñcanti muktā bālair hi pāpikā //
8.09.uv-kg8#187: byis pa sdig can smra byed pa || smra ba’i tshe na ’chiṅ ’gyur la || gal te smra na gźan spoṅ ba || de dag ’phags pa mi gsuṅ ṅo ||

8.1.S10udanav_u:uv_8.10_0-1: mukhena saṁyato bhikṣur mandabhāṣī hy anuddhataḥ / arthaṁ dharmaṁ ca deśayati madhuraṁ tasya bhāṣitam //
8.1.uv-kg8#188: dge sloṅ dag ni bsdams pa daṅ || dal bus smra źiṅ rlom pa med || gaṅ źig chos ldan don ston pa || de ni sñan par smra ba yin ||

8.11.S10udanav_u:uv_8.11_0-1: subhāṣitaṁ hy uttamam āhur āryā dharmaṁ vaden nādharmaṁ tad dvitīyam / priyaṁ vaden nāpriyaṁ tat tṛtīyaṁ satyaṁ vaden nāsatyaṁ tac caturtham //
8.11.uv-kg8#189: legs par smra ba mchog ces ’phags pa gsuṅ || sñan smra mi sñan ma yin de gñis pa || bden smra brdzun pa ma yin de gsum pa || chos smra phal pa ma yin bźi pa de’o ||

8.12.S10udanav_u:uv_8.12_0-1: tām eva vācaṁ bhāṣeta yayātmānaṁ na tāpayet / parāṁś ca na vihiṁseta sā hi vāk sādhu bhāṣitā //
8.12.uv-kg8#190: tshig de rnams ni smra bya źiṅ || gaṅ gis bdag kyaṅ mi gduṅ la || pha rol la yaṅ gnod med pa’i || tshig de legs par smra bar bya ||

8.13.S10udanav_u:uv_8.13_0-1: priyodyam eva bhāṣeta yā hi vācābhinanditā / nādadāti yayā pāpaṁ bhāṣamāṇaḥ sadā priyam //
8.13.uv-kg8#191: gaṅ gis mṅon par dga’ ’gyur źiṅ || gaṅ gis sdig pa mi skyed daṅ || smras pas pha rol dga’ ’gyur ba’i || sñan tshig kho na smra bar bya ||

8.14.S10udanav_u:uv_8.14_0-1: satyā syād amṛtā vācā satyavācā hy anuttarā / satyam arthe ca dharme ca vācam āhuḥ pratiṣṭhitām //
8.14.uv-kg8#192: bden pa’i tshig ni bdud rtsi ste || bden pa’i tshig ni bla med yin || don daṅ chos la rab gnas pa|| bden pa yin źes dam pa gsuṅ ||

8.15.S10udanav_u:uv_8.15_0-1: yāṁ buddho bhāṣate vācaṁ kṣemāṁ nirvāṇaprāptaye / duḥkhasyāntakriyāyuktāṁ sā hi vāk sādhu bhāṣitā //
8.15.uv-kg8#193: sdug bsṅal thams cad spaṅ ba’i phyir || saṅs rgyas kyis ni gsuṅs tshig gaṅ || bden pa mya ṅan ’das ’gro ba’i || tshig de bla med pa yin ||

9.01.S10udanav_u:uv_9.1_0-1: ekadharmam atītasya mṛṣāvādasya jantunaḥ / vitīrṇaparalokasya nākāryaṁ pāpam asti yat //
9.01.uv-kg9#194: || chos gcig las ni rab ’das śiṅ || ’jig rten pha rol bcom pa yi || lus can brdzun du smra ba yis || sdig pa mi bya ci yaṅ med ||

9.02.S10udanav_u:uv_9.2_0-1: śreyo hy ayoguḍā bhuktās taptā hy agniśikhopamāḥ / na tu bhuñjīta duḥśīlo rāṣṭrapiṇḍam asaṁyataḥ //
9.02.uv-kg9#195: lcags sgoṅ me lce ’bar ’dra ba || zos par gyur pa ches sla yi || tshul ’chal legs par mi sdom pas || yul ’khor bsod sñoms za mi ruṅ ||

9.03.S10udanav_u:uv_9.3_0-1: sa ced bibheṣi duḥkhasya sa cet te duḥkham apriyam / mā kārṣīḥ pāpakaṁ karma tv āvir vā yadi vā rahaḥ //
9.03.uv-kg9#196: khyod ni sdug bsṅal gyis ’jigs śiṅ || khyod la sdug bsṅal mi sdug na || mṅon sum dag gam lkog tu’aṅ ruṅ || sdig pa can gyi las mi bya ||

9.04.S10udanav_u:uv_9.4_0-1: sa cet pāpāni karmāṇi kariṣyasi karoṣi vā / na te duḥkhāt pramokṣo 'sti hy utplutyāpi palāyataḥ //
9.04.uv-kg9#197: gal te sdig pa’i las byas sam || byed kyaṅ ruṅ ste khyod kyis ni || kog ces laṅs te bros byas kyaṅ || sdug bsṅal las ni thar mi ’gyur ||

9.05.S10udanav_u:uv_9.5_0-1: naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṁ vivaraṁ praviśya / na vidyate 'sau pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṁ na prasaheta karma //
9.05.uv-kg9#198: gaṅ du gnas na las kyis mi tshugs pa’i || sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te || bar snaṅ la med rgya mtsho’i naṅ na med || ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu źugs kyaṅ min ||

9.06.S10udanav_u:uv_9.6_0-1: yat pareṣāṁ vigarheta karma dṛṣṭveha pāpakam / ātmanā tan na kurvīta karmabaddho hi pāpakaḥ //
9.06.uv-kg9#199: pha rol po la brtags nas gaṅ || sdig pa can gyi las mthoṅ ba || de dag bdag gis mi bya ste || sdig byas las ni rjes su ’braṅ ||

9.07.S10udanav_u:uv_9.7_0-2: ye kūṭamānayogena viṣameṇa ca karmaṇā / manuṣyān upahiṁsanti paratopakrameṇa vā /te vai prapātaṁ prapatanti karmabaddhā hi te janāḥ //
9.07.uv-kg9#200: las gaṅ śin tu mi bzad daṅ || zol byed gźal blugs ’chos pa daṅ || mi la ’tshe bar byed pa daṅ || gźan la byed du ’jug pa yi || las de mi yi rjes ’braṅ bas || de yis g-yaṅ sar ltuṅ bar byed ||

9.08.S10udanav_u:uv_9.8_0-1: yat karoti naraḥ karma kalyāṇam atha pāpakam / tasya tasyaiva dāyādo na hi karma praṇaśyati //
9.08.uv-kg9#201: mi yis dge ba’am sdig pa yi || las ni gaṅ daṅ gaṅ byas pa’i || las rnams chud zar mi ’gyur te || de lta de ltar ’bras bur ’gyur ||

9.09.S10udanav_u:uv_9.9_0-1: vilumpate hi puruṣo yāvad asyopakalpate / tato 'nye taṁ vilumpanti sa viloptā vilupyate //
9.09.uv-kg9#202: de yi tshogs pa ji srid par || de srid ’di ni rduṅ bar byed || de la gźan dag rduṅ byed || rduṅ byed de ni brtags par ’gyur ||

9.1.S10udanav_u:uv_9.10_0-1: kurvaṁ hi manyate bālo naitaṁ mām āgamiṣyati / sāmparāye tu jānāti yā gatiḥ pāpakarmaṇām //
9.1.uv-kg9#203: ’di ni bdag rjes mi ’braṅ źes || byis pas ma brtags byas pa yi || sdig pa’i las kyis ’gro ba dag || pha rol tu ni śes par ’gyur ||

9.11.S10udanav_u:uv_9.11_0-1: kurvan hi manyate bālo na etam mām āgamiṣyati / paścāt tu kaṭukam bhavati vipākam pratiṣevataḥ //
9.11.uv-kg9#204abcd: gal te byis pas mi śes par || sdig pa’i las ni byas pa dag || nam źig na ni de ñid kyis || rnam smin tsha ba so sor sten ||

9.12.S10udanav_u:uv_9.12_1: karmabhiḥ svais tu durmedhā hy agni dagdha eva tapyate // [agni dagdhaiva tapyate]
9.12.uv-kg9#204ef: raṅ gi las kyis de’i ’og tu || me yis bsregs pa bzin du gduṅs ||

9.13.S10udanav_u:uv_9.13_0-1: caranti bālā duṣprajñā hy amitrair iva cātmabhiḥ / kurvantaḥ pāpakaṁ karma yad bhavati kaṭukaṁ phalaṁ //
9.13.uv-kg9#205: byis pa śes rab chuṅ du dag || bdag la dgra bźin byed pa yis || gaṅ źig ’bras bu cher ’gyur ba’i || sdig can las ni spyod par byed ||

9.14.S10udanav_u:uv_9.14_0-1: na tat karma kṛtaṁ sādhu yat kṛtvā hy anutapyate / rudann aśrumukho yasya vipākaṁ pratiṣevate //
9.14.uv-kg9#206: gaṅ dag byas pas gduṅ ’gyur źiṅ || mchi mas gdoṅ yo ga du bźin du || rnam smin so sor sten pa yi || las de dag ni ma byas legs ||

9.15.S10udanav_u:uv_9.15_0-1: tat tu karma kṛtaṁ sādhu yat kṛtvā nānutapyate / yasya pratītaḥ sumanā vipākaṁ pratiṣevate //
9.15.uv-kg9#207: gaṅ źig byas na mi gduṅ źiṅ || dga’ źiṅ yid ni bde ba yis || rnam smin so sor sten pa yi || las de dag ni byas na legs ||

9.16.S10udanav_u:uv_9.16_0-1: hasantaḥ pāpakaṁ karma kurvanty ātmasukhaiṣiṇaḥ / rudantas tasya vīpākaṁ prativindanti duḥkhitāḥ //
9.16.uv-kg9#208: bdag ñid bde ba ’dod pa’i phyir || rgod bźin sdig pa’i las byas pa’i || sdig pa’i las de’i rnams smin dag || du bźin ñams su myoṅ bar ’gyur ||

9.17.S10udanav_u:uv_9.17_0-1: na hi pāpakṛtaṁ karma sadyaḥ kṣīram iva mūrchati / dahantad bālam anveti bhasmācchanna ivānalaḥ //
9.17.uv-kg9#209: ṅes par sdig las ’phral du ni || ’o ma lta bur ’gyur mi byed || thal bas g-yogs pa’i me lta bur || des ni byis pa sreg par byed ||

9.18.S10udanav_u:uv_9.18_0-1: na hi pāpa kṛtam karma sadyaḥ śastram iva kṛntati / sāmparāye tu jānāti yā gatiḥ pāpa karmaṇām /
9.18.uv-kg9#210: sdig las ’phrul du ṅes par ni || mtshon bźin gcod par mi byed kyaṅ || sdig pa’i las khyi ’gro ba dag || pha rol tu ni mṅon par ’gyur ||

9.18a.S10udanav_u:uv_9.18_2: paścāt tu kaṭukam bhavati vipākam pratiṣevataḥ //
9.18a.uv-kg9#211ab: gaṅ du de dag rnam smin ni || tsha ba so sor sten pa yi ||

9.18b.S10udanav_u:uv_9.18_1: sāmparāye tu jānāti yā gatiḥ pāpa karmaṇām /
9.18b.uv-kg9#211cd: sdig pa’i las kyi ’gro ba daṅ || pha rol tu ni śes par ’gyur ||

9.19.S10udanav_u:uv_9.19_0-1: ayaso hi malaḥ samutthitaḥ sa tadutthāya tam eva khādati / evaṁ hy aniśāmyacāriṇaṁ svāni karmāṇi nayanti durgatim //
9.19.uv-kg9#212: lcags las g-ya’ ni laṅs gyur pa || laṅs pa des ni de ñid za || de bźin ma brtags byas pa yi || raṅ gi las kyis ṅan ’gror ’gro ||

10.01.S10udanav_u:uv_10.1_0-1: śraddhātha hrīśīlam athāpi dānaṁ dharmā ime satpuruṣapraśastāḥ / etaṁ hi mārgaṁ divyaṁ vadanti etenāsau gacchati devalokam //
10.01.uv-kg10#213: || dad daṅ ṅo tsha tshul khrims sbyin pa ste || chos ’di rnams ni skyes bu dam pas bsṅags || ’di yis lha yi ’jig rten ’gro ’gyur źiṅ || lam ’di ñid kyis lha yul ’gro źes gsuṅs ||

10.02.S10udanav_u:uv_10.2_0-1: na vai kadaryā devalokaṁ vrajanti bālā hi te na praśaṁsanti dānam / śrāddhas tu dānaṁ hy anumodamāno 'py evaṁ hy asau bhavati sukhī paratra //
10.02.uv-kg10#214: ’juṅs rnams lha yi ’jig rten mi ’gro źiṅ || de yis byis pa sbyin pa’i bsṅags mi rjod || brtan rnams sbyin la rjes su yi raṅ ba || des ni de dag gźan du bde ba myoṅ ||

10.03.S10udanav_u:uv_10.3_0-1: śraddhā hi vittaṁ puruṣasya śreṣṭhaṁ dharmaḥ sucīrṇaḥ sukham ādadhāti / satyaṁ hi vai svādutamaṁ rasānāṁ prajñājīvī jīvināṁ śreṣṭha uktaḥ //
10.03.uv-kg10#215: ’di na skyes bu’o nor mchog dad pa ste || ’di na chos la legs spyod bde ba ’thob || bden pa kho na ro bro rnams kyi phul || śes rab kyis ’tsho ’tsho ba’i mchog ces gsuṅs ||

10.04.S10udanav_u:uv_10.4_0-1: śraddhādhano hy arhatāṁ dharmaṁ nirvāṇaprāptaye / śuśruṣur labhate prajñāṁ tatra tatra vicakṣaṇaḥ //
10.04.uv-kg10#216: mya ṅan ’das par ’gro ba yi || dgra bcom chos la dad bskyed de || makasa pas gus par mñan na ni || de daṅ de yi śes rab ’thob ||

10.05.S10udanav_u:uv_10.5_0-1: śraddhayā tarati hy ogham apramādena cārṇavam / vīryeṇa tyajate duḥkhaṁ prajñayā pariśudhyate //
10.05.uv-kg10#217: bag can gyis ni rgya mtsho daṅ || dad pas chu bo rnams las sgrol || brtson ’grus kyis ni sdug bsṅal spoṅ || śes rab kyis ni yaṅ dag ’gyur ||

10.06.uv-kg10#218: dge sloṅ dad pa’i grogs ldan źiṅ || śes rab kyis ni gtams pa daṅ || mya ṅan ’das la mṅon dga’ bas || ’chiṅ ba thams cad gcod par ’gyur ||

10.07.S10udanav_u:uv_10.7_0-1: yasya śraddhā ca śīlaṁ caivāhiṁsā saṁyamo damaḥ /sa vāntadoṣo medhāvī sādhurūpo nirucyate //
10.07.uv-kg10#219: gaṅ gis dad daṅ tshul khrims daṅ || śes rab nid ni legs bsgoms śiṅ || mkhas pa skyon rnams spoṅ ba de’i || legs pa’i daṅ tshul can źes brjod ||

10.08.S10udanav_u:uv_10.8_0-1: śrāddhāḥ śīlena saṁpannas tyāgavāṁ vītamatsaraḥ / vrajate yatra yatraiva tatra tatraiva pūjyate //
10.08.uv-kg10#220: daṅ daṅ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs || gtoṅ ldan ’juṅs pa rnam spaṅs pa || de ni gaṅ daṅ gaṅ soṅ ba || de daṅ der ni mchod par ’gyur ||

10.09.S10udanav_u:uv_10.9_0-1: yo jīvaloke labhate śraddhāṁ prajñāṁ ca paṇḍitaḥ / tad dhi tasya dhanaṁ śreṣṭhaṁ hīnam asyetarad dhanam //
10.09.uv-kg10#221: mkhas gaṅ ’tsho ba’i ’jig rten na || daṅ daṅ śes rab sten byed pa || de dag de yi nor mchog ste || de yi nor gźan phal par zad ||

10.1.S10udanav_u:uv_10.10_0-1: āryāṇāṁ darśanaḥ kāmaḥ saddharmaśravaṇe rataḥ /vinītamātsaryamalaḥ sa vai śrāddho nirucyate //
10.1.uv-kg10#222: ’phags pa lta bar ’dod pa daṅ || dam chos ñan par dga’ ba daṅ || ser sna’i dri ma rnam spaṅs pa || de ni dad pa can zes bya ||

10.11.S10udanav_u:uv_10.11_0-2: śrāddho gṛhṇāti pātheyaṁ puṇyaṁ coraiḥ sudurharam / coraṁ harantaṁ vārayati harantaḥ śramaṇāḥ priyāḥ / śramaṇān āgatāṁ dṛṣṭvā abhinandati paṇḍitāḥ //
10.11.uv-kg10#223: dad pa’i lam rgyags bskur bar || bsod nams chom pos dprog mi nus || chom krun ’phrog par byed pa bzlog || dge sbyoṅ rnams kyis blaṅs nas dga’ || mkhas pa dge sbyoṅ ’oṅs pa la || mṅon par dga’ bar byed ’gyur źiṅ ||

10.12.S10udanav_u:uv_10.12_0-2: dadanty eke yathā śraddhā yathāvibhavato janāḥ / tatra yo durmanā bhavati pareṣāṁ pānabhojane / nāsau divā ca rātrau ca samādhim adhigacchati //
10.12.uv-kg10#224: skyes po rnams ni ci rigs par || dad pa ji bźin sbyin byed cig || gźan gyi zas daṅ skom de la || gaṅ źig-yid ni mi bde ba || des ni ñin daṅ mtshan rnams su || tiṅ ’dzin thob par mi ’gyur ro ||

10.13.S10udanav_u:uv_10.13_0-1: yasya tv ete samucchinnās tālamastakavad dhatāḥ / sa vai divā ca rātrau ca samādhim adhigacchati //
10.13.uv-kg10#225: gaṅ gis ta la’i mgo bcad ltar || de ’dra kun du gcod byed pa || des ni ñin daṅ mtshan rnams su || tiṅ ṅe ’dzin dag thob par ’gyur ||

10.14.S10udanav_u:uv_10.14_0-1: vītaśraddhaṁ na seveta hradaṁ yadvad dhi nirjalam / sa cet khanel labhet tatra vāri kardamagandhikam //
10.14.uv-kg10#226: khron pa skam po ji lta bar || dad pa med pa bsten mi bya || ji ste de la yoṅs bskos kyaṅ || ’dam chu dri ṅa ’byuṅ bar ’gyur ||

10.15.S10udanav_u:uv_10.15_0-1: śrāddhaṁ prājñaṁ tu seveta hradaṁ yadvaj jalārthikaḥ /acchodakaṁ viprasannaṁ śītatoyam anāvilam //
10.15.uv-kg10#227: chu maṅ rnam par dad pa daṅ || bsil bar gyur ciṅ rñog med pa’i || mtsho la chu ’doṅ ji lta bar || śes rab can gyis dad ldan bsten ||

10.16.S10udanav_u:uv_10.16_0-1: nānurakta iti rajyeta hy atra vai dīryate janaḥ /aprasannāṁ varjayitvā prasannān upasevate //
10.16.uv-kg10#228: chags sam ma chags kyaṅ ruṅ ste || de yis thub sku mi ṅes pas || ma dad pa dag spaṅ bar bya || dad pa rnams ni ñe bar bsten ||

11.01.S10udanav_u:uv_11.1_0-1: chindhi srotaḥ parākramya kāmāṁ praṇuda sarvaśaḥ / nāprahāya muniḥ kāmān ekatvam adhigacchati //
11.01.uv-kg11#229: || bram zes ’dod pa rab spaṅ źiṅ || brtson ’grus kyis ni rgyun chod cig || ’dod pa rab tu ma spaṅs par || thub pa gcig gis ma thob bo ||

11.02.S10udanav_u:uv_11.2_0-1: kurvāṇo hi sadā prājño dṛḍham eva parākramet / śithilā khalu pravrajyā hy ādadāti puno rajaḥ //
11.02.uv-kg11#230: kun du rgyu ba źan pa dag || ñon moṅs phyir yaṅ kun sogs pas || brtson ’grus brten po kho na yis || bya ba de ñid byed la rag ||

11.03.S10udanav_u:uv_11.3_0-1: yat kiṁ cic chitilaṁ karma saṁkliṣṭaṁ vāpi yat tapaḥ /apariśuddhaṁ brahmacaryaṁ na tad bhavati mahāphalam //
11.03.uv-kg11#231: źan pa’i las ni ji sñed daṅ || kun nas ñon moṅs dka’ thub daṅ || tshaṅs spyod yoṅs su ma dag de || don chen ’gyur sñam mi byed do ||

11.04.S10udanav_u:uv_11.4_0-1: śaro yathā durgṛhīto hastam evāpakṛntati / śrāmaṇyaṁ duṣparāmṛṣṭaṁ narakān upakarṣati //
11.04.uv-kg11#232: ji ltar mda’ ni gzuṅ ñes pas || lag pa chod par gyur pa ltar || dge sloṅ bsruṅ ba bya ñes daṅ || dmyal bar ñe bar khrid par byed ||

11.05.S10udanav_u:uv_11.5_0-1: śaro yathā sugṛhīto na hastam apakṛntati / śrāmaṇyaṁ suparāmṛṣṭaṁ nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike //
11.05.uv-kg11#233: ji ltar mda’ ni gzuṅ legs pas || lag pa chod par mi ’gyur || ltar|| dge sbyoṅ bsruṅ ba bya legs na ||

11.06.S10udanav_u:uv_11.6_0-1: duṣkaraṁ dustitīkṣaṁ ca śrāmaṇyaṁ mandabuddhinā / bahavas tatra saṁbādhā yatra mando viḍīdati //
11.06.uv-kg11#234: mya ṅan ’das par ñe bar ’dren || dge sbyoṅ rnam par ma śes daṅ || rgal bar dka’ daṅ bzod dka’ daṅ || gaṅ daṅ źan pa ’gyod ’gyur ba’i ||

11.07.S10udanav_u:uv_11.7_0-1: śrāmaṇye carate yas tu svacittam anivārayet / punaḥ punar viṣīdet ca saṁkalpānāṁ vaśaṁ gataḥ //
11.07.uv-kg11#235: sdug bsṅal maṅ po de dag ’byuṅ || yaṅ dṅ yaṅ du ’gyod pa yi || kun rtog dbaṅ du ’gro ba yi || sems ni bzlog pa ma byas par ||

11.08.S10udanav_u:uv_11.8_0-1: duṣpravrajyaṁ durabhiramaṁ duradhyāvasitā gṛhāḥ / duḥkhāsamānasaṁvāsā duḥkāś copacitā bhavāḥ //
11.08.uv-kg11#236: dge sbyoṅ spyod pa ji ltar bya || ñes par rab byuṅ ñes rtsom byed pa dag || sdug bsṅal mñam med sten pa dag || yaṅ srid sdug bsṅal sogs par zad ||

11.09.S10udanav_u:uv_11.9_0-1: kāṣāyakaṇṭhā bahavaḥ pāpadharmā hy asaṁyatāḥ / pāpā hi karmabhiḥ pāpair ito gacchanti durgatim //
11.09.uv-kg11#237: tshem bu ṅur smrig gyon pa daṅ || phal cher yaṅ dag mi sdom źiṅ || sdig pa’i chos can sdig la dga’ || sdig can de dag gan ’gror ’gro ||

11.1.S10udanav_u:uv_11.10_0-1: yo 'sāv atyantaduḥśīlaḥ sālavāṁ mālutā yathā / karoty asau tathāṭmānaṁ yathainaṁ dviṣa-d-icchati //
11.1.uv-kg11#238: sa la’i śiṅ la ’khri śiṅ ltar || gaṅ źig śin tu khrims ’chal te || ji ltar raṅ la dgra bźin du || de ni de ltar byed par ’dod ||

11.11.S10udanav_u:uv_11.11_0-1: sthaviro na tāvatā bhavati yāvatā palitaṁ śiraḥ / paripakvaṁ vayas tasya mohajīrṇaḥ sa ucyate //
11.11.uv-kg11#239: mgo bo skya bor gyur bar du || da duṅ rgan rabs ma chud pa || de ni laṅ tsho gtugs pa ste || de ni rgan blun źes bya’o ||

11.13.S10udanav_u:uv_11.13_0-1: na muṇḍabhāvāc chramaṇo hy avṛtas tv anṛtaṁ vadan / icchālobhasamāpannaḥ śramaṇaḥ kiṁ bhaviṣyati //
11.13.uv-kg11#241: brtul źugs med ciṅ brdzun smra na || mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyoṅ min || rmoṅs pa ’dod la źugs pa dag || ji ga dge sbyoṅ yin nam kye ||

11.14.S10udanav_u:uv_11.14_0-1: na muṇḍa bhāvāt śramaṇo hy avṛtas tv anṛtam vadan / śamitam yena pāpam syād aṇu sthūlam hi sarvaśaḥ /
11.14.uv-kg11#242: brtul źugs med cig brdzun smra na || mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyoṅ min || gaṅ źig sdig pa źi gyur te|| mkhas bas dge sbyoṅ yin par śes ||

11.14a.S10udanav_u:uv_11.14_0-2: na muṇḍa bhāvāt śramaṇo hy avṛtas tv anṛtam vadan / śamitam yena pāpam syād aṇu sthūlam hi sarvaśaḥ / śamitatvāt tu pāpānām śramaṇo hi nirucyate //
11.14a.uv-kg11#243: brtul źugs med ciṅ rdzun smra na || mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyoṅ min || gaṅ dag sdig pa che phra dag || kun la brtags nas byed pa daṅ || sdig pa źi ba de dag ni || dge sbyoṅ nid ces brjod par bya ||

11.15.S10udanav_u:uv_11.15_0-1: brāhmaṇo vāhitaiḥ pāpaiḥ śramaṇaḥ śamitāśubhaḥ /pravrājayitvā tu malān uktaḥ pravrajitas tv iha //
11.15.uv-kg11#244: sdig pa spaṅs pa bram ze ste || źi bar byed pa dge sbyoṅ yin || bdag gi dri ma rab spaṅs pa || des na rab tu byuṅ źes brjod ||

12.01.S10udanav_u:uv_12.1_0-1: āryasatyāni catvāri prajñayā paśyate yadā / eṣa mārgaṁ prajānāti bhavatṛṣṇāpradālanam //
12.01.uv-kg12#245: || gaṅ tshe ’phags pa’i bden pa bźi || śes rab kyis ni mthoṅ ba daṅ || lam ’di rab tu śes pa yis || srid pa’i sred pa rab tu ’dral ||

12.02.S10udanav_u:uv_12.2_0-1: uddhataṁ hi rajo vātair yathā vṛṣṭena śamyati / evaṁ śāmyanti saṁkalpāḥ prajñayā paśyate yadā //
12.02.uv-kg12#246: dper na rluṅ gis rdul bslaṅ ba || char pa bab pas źi byed ltar || gaṅ tshe śes rab kyis mthoṅ ba || de tshe kun rtog źi bar ’gyur ||

12.03.S10udanav_u:uv_12.3_0-1: śreṣṭhā hi prajñā loke 'smiṁ yeyaṁ nirvedhagāminī / yayā samyak prajānāti jātimaraṇasaṁkṣayam //
12.03.uv-kg12#247: gaṅ źig legs par rtogs pa yis || skye śiṅ legs par zad ’gyur źiṅ || ’jig rten ṅes ’byed ’gyur ba yi || śes rab de ni gtso bo yin ||

12.04.S10udanav_u:uv_12.4_0-1: mārgeṣv aṣṭāṅgikaḥ śreṣṭhaś catvāry āryāṇi satyataḥ /śreṣṭho virāgo dharmāṇāṁ cakṣuṣmāṁ dvipadeṣu ca //
12.04.uv-kg12#248: bden pa’i naṅ na bden bźi daṅ || lam naṅ yan lag brgyad pa mchog || rkaṅ gñis naṅ na mig can daṅ || chos kyi naṅ na chags bral mchog ||

12.05.S10udanav_u:uv_12.5_0-1: anityāṁ sarvasaṁskārāṁ prajñayā paśyate yadā / atha nirvidyate duḥkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
12.05.uv-kg12#249: ’du byed thams cad mi rtag par || gaṅ tshe śes rab kyis mthoṅ ba || de tshe sdug bsṅal las yid ’byuṅ || lam ’di rnam par dag par ’gyur ||

12.06.S10udanav_u:uv_12.6_0-1: duḥkhaṁ hi sarvasaṁskārāṁ prajñayā paśyate yadā / atha nirvidyate duḥkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
12.06.uv-kg12#250: ’du byed thams cad sdug bsṅal bar || gaṅ tshe śes rab kyis mthoṅ ba || de tshe sdug bsṅal las yid ’byuṅ || lam ’di rnam par dag par ’gyur ||

12.07.S10udanav_u:uv_12.7_0-1: śunyataḥ sarvasaṁkārāṁ prajñayā paśyate yadā / atha nirvidyate duḥkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
12.07.uv-kg12#251: ’du byed thams cad stoṅ ñid du || gaṅ tshe śes rab kyis mthoṅ ba || de tshe sdug bsṅal las yid ’byuṅ || lam ’di ram par dag par ’gyur ||

12.08.S10udanav_u:uv_12.8_0-1: sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ prajñayā paśyate yadā / atha nirvidyate duḥkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye //
12.08.uv-kg12#252: ’du byed thams cad bdag med par || gaṅ tshe śes rab kyis mthoṅ ba || de tshe sdug bsṅal las yid ’byuṅ || lam ’di rnam par dag par ’gyur ||

12.09.S10udanav_u:uv_12.9_0-1: ākhyāto vo mayā mārgas tv ajñāyai śalya kṛntanaḥ / yuṣmābhir eva karaṇīyam ākhyātāras tathā gatāḥ //
12.09.uv-kg12#253: sred pa’i zug rṅu gcod byed lam || ṅas ni khyed cad rnams la bstan || de bźin gśegs pa ston pa ste || khyed cag rnams kyis bya dgos so ||

12.1.S10udanav_u:uv_12.10_0-1: deśito vo mayā mārgas tṛṣṇāśalyanikṛntanaḥ / yuṣmābhir eva karaṇīyam deṣṭāro hi tathāgatāḥ //
12.1.uv-kg12#254: sred pa’i zug rṅu sel ba’i lam || ṅas ni khyed cag rnams la bstan || de bźin gśegs pa ston pa ste || khyed cag rnams kyis bya dgos so ||

12.11.S10udanav_u:uv_12.11_0-1: eṣo hi mārgo nāsty anyo darśanasya viśuddhaye / pratipannakāḥ prahāsyanti dhyāyino mārabandhanam //
12.11.uv-kg12#255: lta ba rnam par dag byed pa || lam ’di ma gtogs gźan med pas || tiṅ ṅe ’dzin la rab gnas te || bdud kyi ’chiṅ ba spaṅ bar gyis ||

12.12.S10udanav_u:uv_12.12_0-1: eṣo 'ñjaso hy eṣa ca vai parākramas tv ekāyano haṁsapatho yathā hrade / yam adhyagāc chakyamuniḥ samāhitas tam eva cākhyāti gaṇeṣv abhīkṣṇaśaḥ //
12.12.uv-kg12#256: ’di ni draṅ lam ’di ni pha rol gnon || mtsho la dad pa’i sraṅ ltar bgrod pa gcig || śākya thub pas mñam bźag gaṅ rtogs nas || tshogs la yaṅ daṅ yaṅ du bśad pa ’di ||

12.13.S10udanav_u:uv_12.13_0-1: ekāyanaṁ jātijarāntadarśī mārgaṁ vadaty eṣa hitānukampī / etena mārgeṇa hi tīrṇavantas tariṣyate ye prataranti caugham //
12.13.uv-kg12#257: skye śi’i mtha’ rtogs phan mdzad thugs brtse bas || bgrod pa gcis lam rab tu bstan mdzad pa’i || lam ’dis chu bo rnams las sṅon rgal źiṅ || de bźin rgal bar ’gyur źiṅ rgal bar mdzad ||

12.14.S10udanav_u:uv_12.14_0-1: atyantaniṣṭhāya damāya śuddhaye saṁsārajātīmaraṇakṣayāya / anekadhātupratisaṁvidhāya mārgo hy ayaṁ lokavidā prakāśitaḥ //
12.14.uv-kg12#258: śin tu mthar thug gdul bya dag bya daṅ || ’khor ba’i skye śi zad par bya ba daṅ || khams rnams du ma so sor rtogs bya’i phyir || spyan daṅ ldan pas lam ’di rab tu bstan ||

12.15.S10udanav_u:uv_12.15_0-1: gaṅgāgataṁ yadvad apetadoṣaṁ saṁsyandate vāri tu sāgareṇa / tathaiva mārgaḥ sugatapradeśitaḥ saṁsyandate 'yaṁ hy amṛtasya prāptaye //
12.15.uv-kg12#259: ji ltar chu kluṅ gaṅ ga’i chu rgyun źugs || rgya mtsho’i naṅ du ’bab par ’gyur ba ltar || de bźin śes rab yaṅs pas bstan pa’i lam || ’di ni ’chi med thob par bya phyir ’jug ||

12.16.S10udanav_u:uv_12.16_0-1: yo dharmacakraṁ hy ananuśrutaṁ purā prāvartayat sarvabhūtānukampī / taṁ tādṛśaṁ devanarāgrasatvaṁ nityaṁ namasyeta bhavasya pāragam //
12.16.uv-kg12#260: gaṅ źig ’byuṅ po kun la thugs brtse bas || sṅon chad ma thos chos kyi ’khor lo bskor || skyob pa lha daṅ mi rnams ’dul mdzad pa || srid pa’i mthar phyin de la phyag ’tshal lo ||

12.17.S10udanav_u:uv_12.17_0-1: sadā vitarkāṁ kuśalāṁ vitarkayet sadā punaś cākusalāṁ vivarjayet / tato vitarkāṁś ca vicāritāni ca prahāsyate vṛṣṭir ivoddhataṁ rajaḥ //
12.17.uv-kg12#261: rnam rtog dge ba gsum ni brtag bya źiṅ || dge ba ma yin gsum yaṅ rnam par spaṅs || kun nas rdul laṅs char gyis mnan pa ltar || de nas rtog daṅ dpyod bźi bar bya ||

12.18.S10udanav_u:uv_12.18_0-2: sa vai vitarkopaśamena cetasā spṛśeta saṁbodhisukhaṁ hy anuttaram / śubhaṁ samādhiṁ manasā nibandhayed vivekajaṁ bhāvayitvāpramāṇam / pradālayitvā tribhur ālayāṁs trīṁ jahāti bandhāṁ nipakaḥ pratismṛtaḥ //
12.18.uv-kg12#262: de nas sems la rnam rtog ñer źi nas || bla med byaṅ chub bde la reg par ’gyur || tiṅ ’dzin gsum po rnams la yid gtad ciṅ || bden pa las skyes tshad med bsgom par bya || dran ldan mkhas pas mdud pa źi bya źiṅ || gsum po rnams kyis gnas gsum rab tu dral ||

12.19.S10udanav_u:uv_12.19_0-1: prajñāyudho dhyānabalopapetaḥ samāhito dhyānarataḥ smṛtātmā / lokasya buddhvā hy udayavyayaṁ ca vimucyate vedakaḥ sarvato 'sau //
12.19.uv-kg12#263: śes rab mtshon daṅ brtson ’grus stobs daṅ ldan || dran ldan mñam bźag tiṅ ’dzin la dga’ bas || ’jig rten skye daṅ ’jig par rtogs nas ni || kun las rab tu rnam grol de rig-yin || ’jig rten mtha’ ma legs par rtogs gyur nas || ’jig rten mthar son pha rol phyin źes brjod ||

12.2.S10udanav_u:uv_12.20_0-1: sukhaṁ sukhārthī labhate samācaraṁ kīrtiṁ samāpnoti yaśaś ca sarvataḥ / ya āryam aṣṭāṅgikam āñjasaṁ śivaṁ bhāvayati mārgaṁ hy amṛtasya prāptaye //
12.2.uv-kg12#264: gaṅ gis źi ba ’phags lam yan lag brgyad || lam draṅ bsgoms pa des ni bdud rtsi rñed || de ltar spyod pas bde ’dod bde ba ’thob || sñan pa ’thob ciṅ grags pa ’phel bar ’gyur ||

13.01.S10udanav_u:uv_13.1_0-1: phalaṁ vai kadaliṁ hanti phalaṁ veṇuṁ phalaṁ naḍam /satkāraḥ kāpuruṣaṁ hanti svagarbho 'śvatarīṁ yathā //
13.01.uv-kg13#265: || dre’u mo raṅ gi mṅal gyis daṅ || ’dam bu smyig ma ’bras bus daṅ || chu śiṅ ’bras bus phuṅ pa ltar || pho bśal bkur stis phuṅ bar ’gyur ||

13.02.S10udanav_u:uv_13.2_0-1: yāvad eva hy anarthāya jñāto bhavati bāliśaḥ / hanti bālasya śuklāṁśaṁ mūrdhānaṁ cāsya pātayet //
13.02.uv-kg13#266: ji srid blun po mchod byas pa || de srid rab tu brlag par ’gyur || khyis pa’i dkar po’i cha ’grib ciṅ || de yi spyi bo’aṅ ṅes par ñams ||

13.03.S10udanav_u:uv_13.3_0-1: asanto lābham icchanti satkāraṁ caiva bhikṣuṣu / āvāseṣu ca mātsaryaṁ pūjāṁ parakuleṣu ca //
13.03.uv-kg13#267: ṅan pa rñed pa ’dod pa daṅ || dge sloṅ ’khor ni ’dod pa daṅ || gnas la ser sna byed pa dag || rigs gźan dag gis mchod pa daṅ ||

13.04.S10udanav_u:uv_13.4_0-1: mām eva nityaṁ jānīyur gṛhī pravrajitas tathā / mama prativaśāś ca syuḥ kṛtyākṛtyeṣu keṣu cit //
13.04.uv-kg13#268: rab tu byuṅ daṅ khyim pa dag || gaṅ yaṅ ruṅ bas bdag ’phrigs te|| bya ba byas ruṅ ma byas ruṅ || bdag dbaṅ phyug na re stes źes ||

13.05.S10udanav_u:uv_13.5_0-1: iti bālasya saṃkalpā;icchā māna abhivardhakāḥ / anyā hi lābha upaniṣad anyā nirvāṇa gāminī //
13.05.uv-kg13#269: de ltar byis pa kun rtog na || sems la ’dod chen ’phel bar ’gyur || rñed pa’i thabs ni gźan yin la || mya ṅan ’das gro’i gźan yin źes ||

13.06.S10udanav_u:uv_13.6_0-1: etaj jñātvā yathā bhūtam buddhānām śrāvakaḥ sadā / satkāram na abhinandeta vivekam anubṛṃhayet //
