13.06.uv-kg13#270: de ltar ci rigs śes nas su || bkur sti dag la mi dga’ źiṅ || dben pa rim gyis ’phel byed pa’i || dge sloṅ saṅs rgyas ñan thos yin ||

13.07.S10udanav_u:uv_13.7_0-1: na vyāyamente sarvatra nānyeṣāṁ puruṣo bhavet / nānyāṁ niḥśritya jīveta dharmeṇa na vaṇik caret //
13.07.uv-kg13#271: thams cad la ni mi rtsol źiṅ || mi yis ’phrigs par ma gyur daṅ || ’tsho ba gźan la mi rten ciṅ || chos la tshod pa bźin mi spyad ||

13.08.S10udanav_u:uv_13.8_0-1: svalābhaṁ nāvamanyeta nānyeṣāṁ spṛhako bhavet / anyeṣāṁ spṛhako bhikṣuḥ samādhiṁ nādhigacchati //
13.08.uv-kg13#272: raṅ gi rñed pa blaṅ bya źiṅ || gźan gyil ni ’dod mi skyed || dge sloṅ gźan gyi ’dod byed pas || tiṅ ’dzin thob par mi ’gyur ro ||

13.09.S10udanav_u:uv_13.9_0-1: sukhaṁ jīvitum icchec cec chramaṇyārtheṣv avekṣavān / ahir mūṣakadurgaṁ vā seveta śayanāsanam //
13.09.uv-kg13#274: gal te bde bar ’tsho ’dod ciṅ || dge sbyoṅ ’di la lta ’dod na || byi ba’i khuṅ nas sbrul lta bur || gnas mal dag la bsten par gyis ||

13.1.S10udanav_u:uv_13.10_0-1: sukhaṁ jīvitum icchec cec chramaṇyārtheṣv avekṣavān / itaretareṇa saṁtuṣyed ekadharmaṁ ca bhāvayet //
13.1.uv-kg13#275: gal te bde bar ’tsho ’dod ciṅ || dge sbyoṅ ’di la lta ’dod na || ṅan ṅon tsam gyis chog śes śiṅ || chos gcig po yaṅ bsgom par bya ||

13.11.S10udanav_u:uv_13.11_0-1: sukhaṁ jīvitum icchec cec chramaṇyārtheṣv avekṣavān / sāṁghikaṁ nāvamanyeta cīvaraṁ pānabhojanam //
13.11.uv-kg13#273: gal te bde bar ’tsho ’dod ciṅ || dge sbyoṅ ’di la lta ’dod na || dge ’dun gyis ni chos gos daṅ || bza’ btuṅ byin par gyur na blaṅ ||

13.12.S10udanav_u:uv_13.12_0-1: alpajñāto 'pi ced bhavati śīleṣu susamāhitaḥ / vidvāṁsas taṁ praśaṁsanti śuddhājīvam atandritam //
13.12.uv-kg13#276: gal te maṅ po mi śes śiṅ || tshul khrims legs par mñam bźag na || de śes pa dag ’tsho dag ciṅ || sñom las med ces stod par byed ||

13.13.S10udanav_u:uv_13.13_0-1: traividyaḥ syāt sa ced bhikṣur mṛtyuhantā nirāsravaḥ / alpajñātam iti jñātvā hy avajānanty ajānakāḥ // [i] sa ced bhavati traividyo mṛtyuhāyī nirāsravaḥ /jñātvālpajñāta iti tam avajānanty ajānakāḥ // [ii]
13.13.uv-kg13#277: gal te ’chi bdag ñams byed pa’i || zag med rig pa gsum ldan na || blun pos ci yaṅ mi śes źes || bsams nas de la ’phya yaṅ sla ||

13.14.S10udanav_u:uv_13.14_0-1: sa cet tv ihānnapānasya lābhī bhavati pudgalaḥ / pāpadharmāpi ced bhavati sa teṣāṁ bhavati pūjitaḥ //
13.14.uv-kg13#278: gaṅ zag sdig pa’i chos can la || gal te bza’ daṅ btuṅ ba yi || rñed pa dag daṅ ldan gyur na || de la de dag mchod pa byed ||

13.15.S10udanav_u:uv_13.15_0-1: bahūn amitrāṁ labhate saṁghāṭīpravṛtaḥ sadā / lābhī yo hy annapānasya vastraśayyāsanasya ca //
13.15.uv-kg13#279: mgo bregs ṅur smrig byis pa yi || bza’ ba daṅ ni btuṅ ba daṅ || gos daṅ mal cha rñed pa lta|| dgra byed maṅ pa kho nar zad ||

13.16.S10udanav_u:uv_13.16_0-1: etad ādīnavaṁ jñātvā satkāreṣu mahābhayam /alpajñāto hy anutsukaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet //
13.16.uv-kg13#280: de ltar bkur sti ’jigs chen gyi || skyon rnams khoṅ du chud byas sa || ’phrigs ñuṅ sems khral bskyuṅs nas su || dran ldan dge sloṅ kun du rgyus ||

13.17.S10udanav_u:uv_13.17_0-1: nāyam anaśanena jīvate nāhāro hṛdayasya śāntaye / āhāraḥ sthitaye tu vidyate taj jñātvā hi careta eṣaṇām //
13.17.uv-kg13#281: kham gyi zas kyis sems źir mi ’gyur yaṅ || ’tsho ba ’di phyir mi bza’ mi bya ste|| kha zas kyis ni lus dag gnas ’gyur ba || de ltar rtogs la bsod sñoms dag la rgyus ||

13.18.S10udanav_u:uv_13.18_0-1: paṅkas tv iti yo hi vindate nityaṁ vandanamānanā kule / sūkṣmaḥ śalyo duruddharaḥ satkāraḥ kāpuruṣeṇa dustyajaḥ //
13.18.uv-kg13#282: rigs kyis phyag byas mchod pa gaṅ yin ’di || zug rṅu phra mo dbyuṅ bar dka’ ba ste || mi yis bzod dka’ bkur sti gaṅ yin ’di || ’dam daṅ ’dra bar rab tu rtogs par gyis ||

14.01.S10udanav_u:uv_14.1_0-1: akruddhasya hi yaḥ krudhyet karma pāpam akurvataḥ /duḥkhaṁ tam eva spṛśati loke 'smiṁś ca paratra ca //
14.01.uv-kg14#283: || sdig pa’i las ni mi byed pa || ’khu bya min la gaṅ ’khu ba || ’jig rten ’di daṅ pha rol tu || de ñid sdig pa rnams kyis gos ||

14.02.S10udanav_u:uv_14.2_0-1: pūrvaṁ kṣiṇoti hātmānaṁ paścād bāhyaṁ vihiṁsati / sa hatas tv itaraṁ hanti vītaṁseneva pakṣiṇaḥ //
14.02.uv-kg14#284: daṅ por bdag ni phuṅ byed ciṅ || phyi nas gźan yaṅ phuṅ byed pa || khra yi gzan ma’i bya lta bur || phuṅ źiṅ gźan yaṅ phuṅ bar byed ||

14.03.S10udanav_u:uv_14.3_0-1: hantāraṁ labhate hantā vairī vairāṇi paśyati / akroṣṭāraṁ tathākroṣṭā roṣitāraṁ ca roṣakaḥ //
14.03.uv-kg14#285: rdeg par byed pas rdeg pa ’thob || ’khon du ’dzin pas ’khon can mthoṅ || de bźin gśegs gśe ba ste || khro bar byed la khro ba ’byuṅ ||

14.04.S10udanav_u:uv_14.4_0-1: anyatrāśravaṇād asya saddharmasyāvijānakāḥ / āyuṣy evaṁ paritte hi vairaṁ kurvanti kena cit //
14.04.uv-kg14#286: ’di gźan dge sbyoṅ byis pa ste || dam pa’i chos la mi mkhas pa || yoṅs su tshe thuṅ ’di la yaṅ || gyi na’i phyir ni ’khon par byed ||

14.05.S10udanav_u:uv_14.5_0-1: pṛthakchabdāḥ samutpannās taṁ ca śreṣṭham iti manyathā / saṁghe hi bhidyamāne 'smiṁ śreṣṭham ity abhimanyathā //
14.05.uv-kg14#287: ’di ni mchog ces bsams nas su || so sor smra źiṅ ’thun ’jug pas || ’di na dge ’dun ’byed pa’i tshe || ci phyir stobs med sems mi byed ||

14.08.S10udanav_u:uv_14.8_0-1: pare hi na vijānanti vayam atrodyamāmahe / atra ye tu vijānanti teṣāṁ śāmyanti methakāḥ //
14.08.uv-kg14#290: khyod ni mi mkhas lugs can te || kha bya yis ni rtsol byed pa || pha rol po dag mi śes pas || bdag ni ’di la brtson par byed || ’di na mkhas pa gaṅ yin pa || de dag bźams pa’i tshig gis źi ||

14.09.S10udanav_u:uv_14.9_0-1: ākrośan mām avocan mām ajayan mām ajāpayet / atra ye hy upanahyanti vairaṁ teṣāṁ na śāmyati //
14.09.uv-kg14#291: bdag la kha zer bdag la gśe || bdag pham bdag pham byed pa’o źes || ’di gaṅ sems la ’dzin byed pa || de yi ’khon ni źi mi ’gyur ||

14.1.S10udanav_u:uv_14.10_0-1: ākrośan mām avocan mām ajayan mām ajāpayet / atra ye nopanahyanti vairaṁ teṣāṁ praśāmyati //
14.1.uv-kg14#292: bdag la kha zer bdag la gśe || bdag pham bdag pham byed pa’o źes || ’di gaṅ sems la mi ’dzin pa || de yi ’khon ni źi bar ’gyur ||

14.11.S10udanav_u:uv_14.11_0-1: na hi vaireṇa vairāṇi śāmyantīha kadā cana / kṣāntyā vairāṇi śāmyanti eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //
14.11.uv-kg14#293: ’di na ’khon gyis ’khon can dag || nam yaṅ źi bar ’gyur ba med || bzod pas ’khon ni źi ’gyur ba || ’di ni chos kyi raṅ bźin yin ||

14.12.S10udanav_u:uv_14.12_0-1: vairaṁ na vaireṇa hi jātu śāmyec chāmyed avaireṇa tu vairabhāvaḥ / vairaprasaṅgo hy ahitāya dṛṣṭas tasmād dhi vairaṁ na karoti vidvān //
14.12.uv-kg14#294: ’khon gyis ’khon can nam yaṅ źi mi ’gyur || ’khon med rnams kyis ’khon ni źi bar byed || śa kho na źugs pa lus can la gnod pas || de phyir mkhas pas ’khon par mi bya’o ||

14.13.S10udanav_u:uv_14.13_0-1: sa cel labhed vai nipakaṁ sahāyaṁ loke caraṁ sādhu hi nityam eva / abhibhūya sarvāṇi parisravāṇi careta tenāptamanā smṛtātmā //
14.13.uv-kg14#295: brtan pa legs gnas lhan cig spyad pa yi || grogs po mkhas pa gal te rñed na ni || ñon moṅs thams cad mṅon par zil mnan nas || dran ldan dga’ ba’i yid kyis de daṅ spyad ||

14.14.S10udanav_u:uv_14.14_0-1: sa cel labhed vai nipakaṁ sahāyaṁ loke caraṁ sādhu hi nityam eva / rājeva rāṣṭraṁ vipulaṁ prahāya ekaś caren na ca pāpāni kuryāt //
14.14.uv-kg14#296: brtan pa legs gnas lhan cig spyad pa yi || grogs po mkhas pa gal te ma rñed na || yul ’khor yaṅs pa spaṅs pa’i rgyal po ltar || gcig pus spyad bya sdig pa mi bya’o ||

14.15.S10udanav_u:uv_14.15_0-1: caraṁś ca nādhigaccheta sahāyaṁ tulyam ātmanaḥ / ekacaryāṁ dṛḍhaṁ kuryān nāsti bāle sahāyatā //
14.15.uv-kg14#297: bdag daṅ ’thun par spyod pa yi || grogs bzaṅ rñed par ma gyur na || byis pa grogs su mi ’gyur bas || gcig pus spyod pa brtan par bya ||

14.16.S10udanav_u:uv_14.16_0-1: ekasya caritaṁ śreyo na tu bālaḥ sahāyakaḥ /. ekaś caren na ca pāpāni kuryād alpotsuko 'raṇyagataiva nāgaḥ // [i] ekasya caritaṁ ṣreyo na tu bālasahāyatā / alposukaś cared eko mātaṅgāraṇye nāgavat // [ii]
14.16.uv-kg14#298: byis pa grogs su mi ’gyur bas || gcig pu spyod par byed sla bas || ma taṅ dgon pa’i glaṅ po ltar || sems khral bskyuṅs te gcig pu spyad ||

15.01.S10udanav_u:uv_15.1_0-1: ānāpānasmṛtir yasya paripūrṇā subhāvitā / anupūrvaṁ parijitā yathā buddhena deśitā / sa imaṁ bhāsate lokam abhramuktaiva candramāḥ //
15.01.uv-kg15#299: || saṅs rgyas kyis ni bstan pa bźin || gaṅ gi dbugs dbyuṅ rdub dran pa || yoṅs su rdzogs par legs bsgoms pas || rim gyis yoṅs su byaṅ gyur te || sprin bral ñi ma zla ba ltar || ’jig rten ’di na kun nas gsal ||

15.03.S10udanav_u:uv_15.3_0-1: smṛtiḥ kāyagatā nityaṁ saṁvaraś cendriyaiḥ sadā / samāhitaḥ sa jānīyāt tena nirvāṇam ātmanaḥ //
15.03.uv-kg15#300: lus rtogs dran pa ne bar bźag nas su || reg pa’i skye mched drug ni bsdams byas te || gaṅ źig rtag tu mñam par ’jog byed pa || de bdag ñid kyis mya ṅan ’das pa rtogs ||

15.04.S10udanav_u:uv_15.4_0-1: yasya syāt sarvataḥ smṛtiḥ satataṁ kāyagatā hy upasthitā / no ca syān no ca me syān na bhaviṣyati na ca me bhaviṣyati / anupūrvavihāravān asau kālenottarate viṣaktikām //
15.04.uv-kg15#301: gaṅ źig rtag tu rnam pa thams cad du || lus rtogs dran pa ñe bar ’jog byed pa || bdag ñid med ciṅ bdag gir ’dzin pa med || bdag tu mi ’gyur bdag gir ’dzin mi ’gyur || de ltar dge sloṅ mñam ’jog myur du ni || yul la sred pa dag las rgal bar ’gyur ||

15.05.S10udanav_u:uv_15.5_0-1: yo jāgaret smṛtimāṁ saṁprajānaḥ samāhito mudito viprasannaḥ / kālena dharmāṁ mīmāṁsamānaḥ so 'tikramej jātijarāṁ saśokām //
15.05.uv-kg15#302: gaṅ źig dran daṅ śes bźin mñam ’jog daṅ || dga’ daṅ rab tu daṅ bas dus dus su || chos ’di la spyod mel tse byed pa de || skye rga rnams las rgal bar ’gyur źes gsuṅ ||

15.06.S10udanav_u:uv_15.6_0-1: tasmāt sadā jāgarikāṁ bhajeta yo vīryavāṁ smṛtimān apramattaḥ / saṁyojanaṁ jātijarāṁ ca hitvā ihaiva duḥkhasya karoti so 'ntam //
15.06.uv-kg15#303: de ltar rtag tu mel tse byed sten ciṅ || dge sloṅ mkhas pa dran ldan brtson pa yis || skye ba ku du sbyor ba spaṅs nas su || des ni ’di la mya ṅan ’das pa ’thob ||

15.07.S10udanav_u:uv_15.7_0-1: jāgarantaḥ śṛṇudhvaṁ me suptāś ca pratibudhyata / supteṣu jāgaraṁ śreyā na hi jāgarato bhayam //
15.07.uv-kg15#304: gñid log de dag sad par byed pa yi || mel tse bdag las khyod ñon cig || ñal bas mel tse byed sla ste || mel tse byed la ’jigs pa med ||

15.08.S10udanav_u:uv_15.8_0-1: jāgaryam anuyuktānām ahorātrānuśikṣiṇām / amṛtaṁ cādhimuktānām astaṁ gacchanti āsravāḥ //
15.08.uv-kg15#305: mel tse byed par brtson pa daṅ || ñin mtshan rjes su slob byed ciṅ || ’chi ba med la lhag mos pa’i || zag pa rnams ni zad par ’gyur ||

15.12.S10udanav_u:uv_15.12_0-1: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ / yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ buddhagatā smṛtiḥ //
15.12.uv-kg15#309: gaṅ źig ñin daṅ mtshan rnams su || saṅs rgyas rjes su dran byed pa || gau ta ma yi ñan thos de || legs par sad pas sad par ’gyur ||

15.13.S10udanav_u:uv_15.13_0-1: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ / yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ dharmagatā smṛtiḥ //
15.13.uv-kg15#310: gaṅ źig ñin daṅ mtshan rnams su || chos rnams rjes su dran byed pa || go.au ta ma yi ñan thos de || legs par sad pas sad par ’gyur ||

15.14.uv-kg15#311: gaṅ źig ñin daṅ mtshan rnams su || dge ’dun rjes su dran byed pa || gau ta ma yi ñan thos de || legs par sad pas sad par ’gyur ||

15.22.S10udanav_u:uv_15.22_0-1: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ / yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca śunyatāyāṁ rataṁ manaḥ //
15.22.uv-kg15#320: gaṅ źig ñin daṅ mtshan rnams su || stoṅ pa ñid la yid dga’ ba || gau ta ma yi ñan thos de || legs par sad pas sad par ’gyur ||

15.23.S10udanav_u:uv_15.23_0-1: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ / yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau caivānimitte rataṁ manaḥ //

15.24.S10udanav_u:uv_15.24_0-1: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ / yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca ākiñcanye rataṁ manaḥ //

15.25.S10udanav_u:uv_15.25_0-1: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ / yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca bhāvanāyāṁ rataṁ manaḥ //

15.26.S10udanav_u:uv_15.26_0-1: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ / yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nirvāṇe 'bhirataṁ manaḥ //

16.01.S10udanav_u:uv_16.1_0-1: pūrvaṁ hi kṛtyaṁ pratijāgareta mā me kṛtyaṁ kṛtyakāle vihanyāt /taṁ nityakāle pratiyatyakāriṇaṁ naiva kṛtyaṁ kṛtyakāle vihanti //
16.01.uv-kg16#326: || bdag gi bya ba bya ba’i dus g-yo bas || daṅ po kho nar bya ba’i mel tse gyis || bdag gis daṅ po de ltar byas na ni || bya ba bya ba’i dus ltar zad ’dod ciṅ ||

16.02.S10udanav_u:uv_16.2_0-1: vyāyametaiva puruṣo yāvad arthasya niṣpadaḥ / paśyed asau tathātmārthaṁ yathaivecchet tathā bhavet //
16.02.uv-kg16#327: ji ltar ’dod pa de bźin ’byor ’gyur bar || de yi raṅ bźin ṅa yis mthoṅ bas na || ji srid don ni phun sum tshogs ’gyur ba || de srid par du mi yis bsgrim par gyis ||

16.03.S10udanav_u:uv_16.3_0-1: uttiṣṭhata vyāyamata kurudhvaṁ dvīpam ātmanaḥ / karmāro rajatasyaiva haradhvaṁ malam ātmanaḥ /. nirdhāntamalā hy anaṅgaṇā na punar jātijarām upeṣyetha //
16.03.uv-kg16#328: bsgrim źiṅ brtson par bya ba yis|| bdag ñid gliṅ du ’gyur bar bya || mgar ba yis ni dbul bźin du || raṅ gi dri ma sbyaṅ bar gyis || dri ma sbyaṅs pa skyon mi ’byuṅ || phyi nas skye daṅ rga mi ’thob ||

16.04.S10udanav_u:uv_16.4_0-1: alajjitavye lajjante lajjitavye tv alajjinaḥ / abhaye bhayadarśīno bhaye cābhayadarśinaḥ / mithyādṛṣṭisamādānāt satvā gacchanti durgatim //
16.04.uv-kg16#329: ṅo tsha min la ṅo tsha źiṅ || ṅo tsha ba la ṅo mi tshe || mi ’jigs pa la ’jigs lta daṅ || ’jigs la mi ’jigs lta ba yi || log par lta ba blaṅs pa yis || sems can ṅan ’gror ’gro bar ’gyur |

16.05.S10udanav_u:uv_16.5_0-1: yas tu pūrvaṁ pramādyeha paścād vai na pramādyate / sa imaṁ bhāsate lokam abhramuktaiva candramāḥ //
16.05.uv-kg16#330: ’di na gaṅ sṅon bag med las || phyi nas bag daṅ ldan gyur te || sprin bral ñi ma zla ba ltar || ’jig rten ’di na kun nas gsal ||

16.06.S10udanav_u:uv_16.6_0-1: yas tu pūrvaṁ pramādyeha paścād vai na pramādyate / sa imāṁ viṣaktikāṁ loke smṛtaḥ samativartate //
16.06.uv-kg16#331: ’di na gaṅ sṅon bag med las || phyi nas bag daṅ ldan gyur te || ’jig rten ’di na sred pa las || dran pa legs par ’da’ bar ’gyur ||

16.07.S10udanav_u:uv_16.7_0-1: daharo 'pi cet pravrajate yujyate buddhaśāsane / sa imaṁ bhāsate lokam abhramuktaiva candramāḥ //

16.08.S10udanav_u:uv_16.8_0-1: daharo 'pi cet pravrajate yujyate buddhaśāsane / sa imāṁ viṣaktikāṁ loke smṛtaḥ samativartate //
16.08.uv-kg16#333: gaṅ źig gźon nur rab byuṅ nas || saṅs rgyas bstan la ’jug pa de || ’jig rten ’di na sred pa las || dran pas legs par ’da’ bar ’gyur ||

16.09.S10udanav_u:uv_16.9_0-1: yasya pāpakṛtaṁ karma kuśalena pithīyate / sa imaṁ bhāsate lokam abhramuktaiva candramāḥ //
16.09.uv-kg16#334: gaṅ źig sdig pa’i las byas pa || dge bas ’gebs par byed pa de || sprin bral ñi ma zla ba ltar || ’jig rten ’di na kun nas gsal ||

16.1.S10udanav_u:uv_16.10_0-1: yasya pāpakṛtaṁ karma kuśalena pithīyate / sa imāṁ viṣaktikāṁ loke smṛtaḥ samativartate //
16.1.uv-kg16#335: gaṅ źig sdig pa’i las byas pa || dge bas ’gebs par byed pa de || ’jig rten ’di na sred pa las || dran pas legs par ’da’ bar ’gyur ||

16.12.S10udanav_u:uv_16.12_0-1: yo jīvite na tapate maraṇānte ca sarvaśaḥ / sa vai dṛṣṭapado dhīraḥ śokamadhye na śocati //
16.12.uv-kg16#336: gaṅ źig gson la mi dga’ ba || de ni śi na’aṅ mya ṅan med || brtan pa go ’phaṅ mthoṅ ba de || mya ṅan dbus na’aṅ gduṅ mi ’gyur ||

16.13.S10udanav_u:uv_16.13_0-1: yo jīvite na tapate maraṇānte ca sarvaśaḥ / sa vai dṛṣṭapado dhīro jñātimadhye virocate //
16.13.uv-kg16#337: gaṅ źig gson la mi dga’ ba || de ni śi na’aṅ mya ṅan med || brtan pa go ’phaṅs mthoṅ ba de || gñen ’dun dbus na lam mer ’dug ||

16.14.S10udanav_u:uv_16.14_0-1: kṛṣnāṁ dharmāṁ viprahāya śuklāṁ bhāvayata bhikṣavaḥ / okād anokam āgamya vivekam anubṛṁhayet / tatra cābhirametāryo hitvā kāmān akiñcanaḥ //
16.14.uv-kg16#338: dge sloṅ dkar po bsgom gyis la || nag po’i chos ni rnam par spoṅs || khyim nas khyim med soṅ nas su || spyod yul dben pa gaṅ yin pa || de la mṅon par dga’ bslab ciṅ || ’dod pa ci yaṅ med par spaṅs ||

16.15.S10udanav_u:uv_16.15_0-1: śuddhasya hi sadā phalguḥ śuddhasya poṣathaḥ sadā / śuddhasya śucikarmaṇaḥ sadā saṁpadyate vratam //
16.15.uv-kg16#339: rtag tu sñiṅ po dag pa daṅ || rtag tu gso sbyoṅ dag pa daṅ || gtsaṅ ma’i las ni dag pa de’i || brtul źugs phun sum tshogs par ’gyur ||

16.16.S10udanav_u:uv_16.16_0-1: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi rāgadoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā / tasmād vigatarāgebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam //
16.16.uv-kg16#340: źiṅ gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar || skye dgu ’di la ’dod chags skyon || de bas ’dod chags bral rnams la || byin na ’bras bu chen por ’gyur ||

16.17.S10udanav_u:uv_16.17_0-1: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi dveṣadoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā / tasmād vigatadveṣebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam //
16.17.uv-kg16#341: źiṅ gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar || skye dgu ’di la źe sdaṅ skyon || de bas źe sdaṅ bral rnams la || byin na ’bras bu chen por ’gyur ||

16.18.S10udanav_u:uv_16.18_0-1: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi mohadoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā / tasmād vigatamohebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam //
16.18.uv-kg16#342: źiṅ gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar || skye dgu ’di la gti mug skyon || de bas gti mug bral rnams la || byin na ’bras bu chen por ’gyur ||

16.19.S10udanav_u:uv_16.19_0-1: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi mānadoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā / tasmād vigatamānebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam //
16.19.uv-kg16#343: źiṅ gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar || skye dgu ’di la ṅa rgyal skyon || de bas ṅa rgyal bral rnams la || byin na ’bras bu chen por ’gyur ||

16.2.S10udanav_u:uv_16.20_0-1: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi lobhadoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā / tasmād vigatalobhebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam //
16.2.uv-kg16#344: źiṅ gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar || skye dgu ’di la chags ba skyon || de bas chags daṅ bral rnams la || byin na ’bras bu cen por ’gyur ||

16.21.S10udanav_u:uv_16.21_0-1: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi tṛṣṇādoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā / tasmād vigatatṛṣṇebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam //
16.21.uv-kg16#345: źiṅ gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar || skye dgu ’dil sred pa skyon || de bas sred daṅ bral rnams la || byin na ’bras bu chen por ’gyur ||

16.22.S10udanav_u:uv_16.22_0-1: ṣaṣṭha adhipatī rājā rajyamāne rajasvalaḥ / arakte virajā bhavati rakte bālo nirucyate //
16.22.uv-kg16#346: drug pa bdag po rgyal po ste || chags par gyur na chags can yin || ma chags gyur na ma chags yin || chags pa byis pa źes brjod do ||

16.23.S10udanav_u:uv_16.23_0-1: nagaraṁ hy asthiprākāraṁ māṁsaśoṇitalepanam / yatra rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca māno mrakṣaś ca bādhyate //
16.23.uv-kg16#347: ’dod chags źe sdaṅ ṅa rgyal daṅ || ’chab pa gaṅ du gnas pa yi || groṅ khyer rus pa’i ra ba can || śa daṅ khrag gis źal źal byas ||

16.24.S10udanav_u:uv_16.24_0-1: hetuprabhavaṁ sadā hi duḥkhaṁ tad apaśyaṁ sa hi tena tatra baddhaḥ / tasya tu samayāj jahāti saṅgaṁ na hi bāhyā prajahanti taṁ mahaugham //
16.24.uv-kg16#348: rgyu yis kun nas bslaṅ ba las byuṅ sdug bsṅal can || de ma mthoṅ na der ni de dag ’chiṅ ’gyur źiṅ || de dag rtogs na chu bo rnams ni rab tu spoṅ || phyi rol pa la chags pa de dag spoṅ ba med ||

17.01.S10udanav_u:uv_17.1_0-1: smṛtimantaḥ prayujyante na nikete ramanti te / haṁsavat palvalaṁ hitvā hy okam oghaṁ jahantĕ te //
17.01.uv-kg17#349: || de dag khyim la mi dga’ bar || dran daṅ ldan pa ’bad pa yis || ṅaṅ pas mtsho ṅan spoṅ ba ltar || de dag khyim spaṅs chu bo rgal ||

17.02.S10udanav_u:uv_17.2_0-1: haṁsādityapathe yānti ākāśe jīvitendriyāḥ /niryānti dhīrā lokān mārasainyaṁ pramathya te //
17.02.uv-kg17#350: brtan pa ’jig rten ges byuṅ nas || bdud kyi sde rnams rab bcom ste || ñi ma’i lam nas ṅaṅ pa ltar || rdzu ’phrul gyis ni mkha’ la ’gro ||

17.03.S10udanav_u:uv_17.3_0-1: acaritvā brahmacaryam alabdhvā yauvane dhanam / jīrṇakrauñcaivă dhyāyante 'lpamatsya iva palvale //
17.03.uv-kg17#351: tshaṅs par spyod pa ma spyad ciṅ || gźon nur nor ni ma rñed pa || mtsho ṅan ña ñuṅ ṅogs dag na || chu skyar rgan sems bźin du ’gyur ||

17.04.S10udanav_u:uv_17.4_0-1: acaritvā brahmacaryam alabdhvā yauvane dhanam / śenti cāpātikīrṇā vā paurāṇāny anucintitāḥ //
17.04.uv-kg17#352: tshaṅs par spyod pa ma spyad ciṅ || gźon nur nor ni ma rñed pa || sṅan chad byas pa rjes dran źiṅ || lus bskums nas ni ñal bar ’gyur ||

17.05.S10udanav_u:uv_17.5_0-1: nālpaṁ manyeta pāpasya naitaṁ mām āgamiṣyati / udabindunipātena mahākumbho 'pi pūryate /pūryanti bālāḥ pāpair hi stokastokaṁ kṛtair api //
17.05.uv-kg17#353: sdig pa chuṅ byas bdag ñid kyi || phyi bźin mi ’oṅ ma sems śig || chu yi thigs pa lhuṅ ba yis || bum chen gaṅ ba ji bźin du || chuṅ zad chuṅ zad bsags pa yi || sdig pas byis pa gaṅ bar ’gyur ||

17.06.S10udanav_u:uv_17.6_0-1: nālpaṁ manyeta puṇyasya naitaṁ mām āgamiṣyati / udabindunipātena mahākumbho 'pi pūryate /pūryanti dhīrāḥ puṇyair hi stokastokaṁ kṛtair api //
17.06.uv-kg17#354: dge ba chuṅ byas bdag ñid kyi || phyi bźin mi ’od ma sems śig || chu yi thigs pa lhuṅ ba yis || bum chen gaṅ ba ji bźin du || chuṅ zad chuṅ zad bsags pa yi || dge bas brtan pa gaṅ bar ’gyur ||

17.07.S10udanav_u:uv_17.7_0-1: ye taranty ārṇavaṁ nityaṁ kolaṁ baddhvā janāḥ śubham /na te taranti saritāṁ tīrṇā medhāvino janāḥ //
17.07.uv-kg17#355: gaṅ źig rags brtsigs mtsho ṅan sṅaṅs || rgya mtsho’i chu bo rgas ’dod pa || skye bos gziṅs ni bcas nas kyaṅ || skye bo mkhas pa rgal bar byed ||

17.08.S10udanav_u:uv_17.8_0-1: uttīrṇo bhagavāṁ buddhaḥ sthale tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇaḥ / bhikṣavaḥ snānti caivātra kolaṁ badhnanti cāpare //
17.08.uv-kg17#356: rgal nas saṅs rgyas bcom ldan ’das || bram ze sgam sar gnas par mdzad || de la dge sloṅ khrus byed ciṅ || ñan thos rnams kyis gziṅs kyaṅ bcas ||

17.09.S10udanav_u:uv_17.9_0-1: kiṁ kuryād udapānena yatrāpaḥ sarvato bhavet / tṛṣṇāyā mūlam uddhṛtya kasya paryeṣaṇāṇ caret //
17.09.uv-kg17#358: ’di ltar kun na chu yod pas || su źig tshol źiṅ rgyu byed de || khron pa’i chu lta ci źig dgos || sred pa rtsa nas gcad par gyis ||

17.1.S10udanav_u:uv_17.10_0-1: udakena nijanti nejakā iṣukārā namayanti tejasā / dāruṁ namayanti takṣakā hy ātmānaṁ damayanti paṇḍitāḥ //
17.1.uv-kg17#359: btso blag mkhan dag chus ’khru źiṅ || mda’ mkhan mes ni sroṅ ba daṅ || śiṅ mkhan śiṅ la ’jog sbyor ltar || mkhas pas bdag ñid gdul bar bya ||

17.11.S10udanav_u:uv_17.11_0-1: yathā hradaḥ sugambhīro viprasanno hy anāvilaḥ / evaṁ śrutvā hi saddharmaṁ viprasīdanti paṇḍitāḥ //
17.11.uv-kg17#357: ji ltar mtsho chen zab mo dag || rab tu mnam daṅ rñog med ltar || de bźin mkhas pa raṅ daṅ bas || ’di ni chos ni ñan par byed ||

17.12.S10udanav_u:uv_17.12_0-1: pṛthivīsadṛśo na lipyate tāyī kīlavad aprakampayaḥ / hrada iva hi vinītakardamo niṣkaluṣā hi bhavanti paṇḍitāḥ //
17.12.uv-kg17#360: nam mkha’ lta bur chags med ciṅ || sgo them lta bur g-yo ba med || rñog pa can gyi mtsho lta bur || mkhas pa ’khor ba la mi dga’ ||

18.01.S10udanav_u:uv_18.1_0-1: ka imāṁ pṛthivīṁ vijeṣyate yamalokaṁ ca tathā sadevakam / ko dharmapadaṁ sudeśitaṁ kuśalaḥ puṣpam iva praceṣyate //
18.01.uv-kg18#361: || lhar bcas gśin rje’i ’jig rten ’di || sa steṅs las rgyal gaṅ źiṅ lags || me tog lta bur rab ’dod pa’i|| chos bźi legs par ston mkhas gaṅ ||

18.02.S10udanav_u:uv_18.2_0-1: śaikṣaḥ pṛthivīṁ vijeṣyate yamalokaṁ ca tathā sadevakam / sa hi dharmapadaṁ sudeśitaṁ kuśalaḥ puṣpam iva praceṣyate //
18.02.uv-kg18#362: lhar bcas gśin rje’i ’jig rten ’di || sa steṅs las rgyal slob pa yi || me tog lta bur rab ’dod pa’i || chos bźi legs par ston mkhas de ||

18.03.S10udanav_u:uv_18.3_0-1: vanaṁ chindata mā vṛkṣaṁ vanād vai jāyate bhayam / chitvā vanaṁ samūlaṁ tu nirvaṇā bhavata bhikṣavaḥ //
18.03.uv-kg18#363: nags la las las ni ’jigs skyes phyir || nags tshal gcad kyi śiṅ ma yin || nags daṅ nags sbyor chod cig daṅ || dge sbyoṅ mya ṅan ’da’ bar ’gyur ||

18.04.S10udanav_u:uv_18.4_0-1: na chidyate yāvatā vanaṁ hy anumātram api narasya bandhuṣu / pratibaddhamanāḥ sa tatra vai vatsaḥ kṣīrapaka iva mātaram //
18.04.uv-kg18#364: gal te nags sbyor ma bcad na || phra rab kyis kyaṅ mi rnams skye || ma druṅ nu źo ’dod be’u ltar || de yis yid ni rab tu ’chiṅ ||

18.05.S10udanav_u:uv_18.5_0-1: ucchindi hi sneham ātmanaḥ padmaṁ śāradakaṁ yathodakāt / śāntimārgam eva bṛṁhayen nirvāṇaṁ sugatena deśitam //
18.05.uv-kg18#365: lag pas ston ka’i pad ma ltar || bdag la dga’ ba bcad nas su || rgyal gsuṅs mya ṅan ’das pa’i phyir || źi ba’i lams ñid bskyed par gyis ||

18.06.S10udanav_u:uv_18.6_0-1: yathāpi ruciraṁ puṣpaṁ varṇavat syād agandhavat / evaṁ subhāṣitā vācā niṣphalāsāv akurvataḥ //
18.06.uv-kg18#366: ji ltar me tog yid ’oṅ ba || kha dog bzaṅ yaṅ dri med ltar || de bźin legs par gsuṅs pa’i tshig || ’bras bu med par ma byed cig ||

18.07.S10udanav_u:uv_18.7_0-1: yathāpi ruciraṁ puṣpaṁ varṇavat syād sugandhavat / evaṁ subhāṣitā vācā saphalā bhavati kurvataḥ //
18.07.uv-kg18#367: ji ltar me tog yid ’oṅ ba || kha dog bzaṅ źiṅ dri źim ltr || de bźin legs par gsuṅs pa’i tshig || ’bras bu yod pa ñid du gyis ||

18.08.S10udanav_u:uv_18.8_0-1: yathāpi bhramaraḥ puṣpād varṇagandhāv aheṭhayan / paraiti rasam ādāya tathā grāmāṁ muniś caret //
18.08.uv-kg18#368: ji ltar buṅ ba me tog gi || kha dog dri la mi gnod par || khu ba bźibs nas ’phur ba ltar || de bźin thub pa groṅ du rgyu ||

18.09.S10udanav_u:uv_18.9_0-1: na pareṣāṁ vilomāni na pareṣāṁ kṛtākṛtam / ātmanas tu samīkṣeta samāni viṣamāni ca //
18.09.uv-kg18#369: gźan gyi skyon la mi brtag ciṅ || gźan gyi byas daṅ ma byas min || bdag ñid kyis ni rigs pa daṅ || mi rigs pa la brtag par bya ||

18.1.S10udanav_u:uv_18.10_0-1: yathāpi puṣparāśibhyaḥ kuryān mālāguṇāṁ bahūn / evaṁ jātena martyena kartavyaṁ kuśalaṁ bahu //
18.1.uv-kg18#372: ji ltar me tog phuṅ po las || me tog phreṅ rgyud maṅ byed ltar || de bźin mir ni skyes pa yis || dge ba phal chen rnams kyaṅ bya ||

18.11.S10udanav_u:uv_18.11_0-1: varṣāsu hi yathā puṣpaṁ vaguro vipramuñcati / evaṁ rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca vipramuñcata bhikṣavaḥ //
18.11.uv-kg18#373: ji ltar dbyar ka ba ku la’i || me tog rab tu rnam ’brul ltar || de bźin dge sloṅ ’dod chags daṅ || źe sdaṅ gti mug spaṅ bar gyis ||

18.12.S10udanav_u:uv_18.12_0-1: yathā saṁkārukūṭe tu vyujjhite hi mahāpathe / padmaṁ tatra tu jāyeta śucigandhi manoramam //
18.12.uv-kg18#370: ji ltar phyag dar phyuṅ po dag || mi gtsaṅ chu ni med ’di las || pad ma kha bye gtsaṅ ba daṅ || dri źim yid ’oṅ rab skyes ltar ||

18.13.S10udanav_u:uv_18.13_0-1: evaṁ saṁkārabhūte 'sminn andhabhūte pṛthagjane / prajñayā vyatirocante samyaksaṁbuddhaśrāvakāḥ //
18.13.uv-kg18#371: de bźin so so skye bo dag || ldoṅs gyur phyag dar phuṅ ’di las || rdzogs saṅs rgyas kyi ñan thos dag || śes rab kyis ni gsal ba ’byuṅ ||

18.14.S10udanav_u:uv_18.14_0-1: puṣpāṇy eva pracinvantaṁ vyāsaktamanasaṁ naram / suptaṁ grāmaṁ mahaughaiva mṛtyur ādāya gacchati //
18.14.uv-kg18#374: mi yi yid la rnam chags daṅ || me tog bźin du rab bsags pa || ’chi bdag gis ni blaṅs nas ’gro || ñal ’gro chu bos bdas pa bźin ||

18.15.S10udanav_u:uv_18.15_0-1: puṣpāṇy eva pracinvantaṁ vyāsaktamanasaṁ naram / atṛptam eva kāmeṣu tv antakaḥ kurute vaśam //
18.15.uv-kg18#375: mi yi yid la rnam chags dag || me tog bźin du rab bsags pa || ’dod pa rnams kyis mi ṅoms śiṅ || ’chi bdag gis ni dbaṅ du byed ||

18.16.S10udanav_u:uv_18.16_0-1: puṣpāṇy eva pracinvantaṁ vyāsaktamanasaṁ naram / anutpanneṣu bhogeṣu tv antakaḥ kurute vaśam //
18.16.uv-kg18#376: mi yi yid la rnam chags dag || me tog bźi du rab bsags pa || loṅs spyod skye bar mi ’gyur źiṅ || ’chi bdag gis ni bdaṅ du byed || (mi yi yid la rnam chags dag || me tog bźin du rab bsags pa || bya ba mthar ni ma phyin par || ’chi bdag gis ni dbaṅ du byed ||)

18.17.S10udanav_u:uv_18.17_0-1: kumbhopamaṁ kāyam imaṁ viditvā marīcidharmaṁ paribudhya caiva / chitveha mārasya tu puṣpakāṇi tv adarśanaṁ mṛtyurājasya gacchet //
18.17.uv-kg18#377: lus ’di buṅ ba ’dra bar rtogs byas śiṅ || de bźin chos rnams smig rgyu ’drar śes nas || bdud kyi me tog mchog ni ’dir gcod pa || ’chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yaṅ med par ’gro ||

18.18.S10udanav_u:uv_18.18_0-1: phenopamaṁ kāyam imaṁ viditvā marīcidharmaṁ paribudhya caiva / chitveha mārasya tu puṣpakāṇi tv adarśanaṁ mṛtyurājasya gacchet //
18.18.uv-kg18#379: lus ’di dbu ba ’dra bar rtogs byas śiṅ || de bźin chos rnams smig rgyu ’drar śes nas || bdud kyi me tog mchog ni ’dir gcod pa || ’chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yaṅ med par ’gro ||

18.19.S10udanav_u:uv_18.19_0-1: kumbhopamaṁ lokam imaṁ viditvā marīcidharmaṁ paribudhya caiva / chitveha mārasya tu puṣpakāṇi tv adarśanaṁ mṛtyurājasya gacchet //
18.19.uv-kg18#378: ’jig rten ’di dag buṅ ba ’drar rtogs śiṅ || de bźin chos rnams smig rgyu ’drar śes nas || bdud kyi me tog mchog ni ’dir gcod pa || ’chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yaṅ med par ’gro ||

18.2.S10udanav_u:uv_18.20_0-1: phenopamaṁ lokam imaṁ viditvā marīcidharmaṁ paribudhya caiva / chitveha mārasya tu puṣpakāṇi tv adarśanaṁ mṛtyurājasya gacchet //
18.2.uv-kg18#380: ’jig rten ’di dag bu ba ’drar rtogs śiṅ || de bźin chos rnams smig rgyu ’drar śes nas || bdud kyi me tog mchog ni ’dir gcod pa || ’chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yaṅ med par ’gro ||

19.04.S10udanav_u:uv_19.4_0-1: apramattaḥ pramatteṣu supteṣu bahujāgaraḥ / abalāśva iva bhadrāśvaṁ hitvā yāti sumedhasam //
19.04.uv-kg19#390: bag yod pa yis bag med daṅ || mi ñal maṅ pos gñid log daṅ || rta bzaṅs kyis ni rta rgod ltar || śin tu mkhas pas spaṅs nas ’gro ||

19.05.S10udanav_u:uv_19.5_0-1: hrīniṣevī hi puruṣaḥ prājño yaḥ susamāhitaḥ / sarvapāpaṁ jahāty eṣa bhadrāśvo hi kaśām iva //
19.05.uv-kg19#391: rta bzaṅ la ni lcag bźin du || gaṅ źig ṅo tsha śes sten ciṅ || śes rab legs par mñam bźag pa || des ni sdig pa sel bar byed ||

19.06.S10udanav_u:uv_19.6_0-1: dānto vai samitiṁ yāti dāntaṁ rājādhirohati / dāntaḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṁ yo 'tivākyaṁ titīkṣati //
19.06.uv-kg19#392: dul ba ’dun sar ’gro byed ciṅ || dul ba rgyal po lhag par źon || gaṅ źig tshig ṅan bzod byed pa || dul ba mi yi naṅ na mchog ||

19.07.S10udanav_u:uv_19.7_0-1: yo hy aśvaṁ damayej jānyam ājāneyaṁ ca saindhavam / kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmā dāntas tato varam // [i] yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam / kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam // [ii]
19.07.uv-kg19#393: glaṅ po’i naṅ na glaṅ chen daṅ || sin du’i caṅ śes rta daṅ ni || dre’u ’dul byed pa gaṅ yin pa || de bas bdag ñid ’dul ba mchog ||

19.08.uv19#19.8B: na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet / yām ātmanā sudāntena bhave duḥkhasya pāragaḥ //
19.08.uv-kg19#397: glaṅ po’i naṅ na glaṅ chen daṅ || sin du’i caṅ śes rta daṅ ni || dre’u ’dul byed pa gaṅ yin pa || de bas bdag ñid ’dul ba mchog ||

19.09.uv19#19.9A: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam / kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam //
19.09.uv-kg19#399: glaṅ po’i naṅ na glaṅ chen daṅ || sin du’i caṅ śes rte daṅ ni || dre’u ’dul byed pa gaṅ yin pa || de bas bdag ñid ’dul ba mchog ||

19.1.S10udanav_u:uv_19.10_0-1: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati / ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvāṁ chinatti bandhanam // [i] na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet / yām ātmanā sudāntena sarvāṁ chindati bandhanam // [ii]
19.1.uv-kg19#400: bdag ñid legs ’dul gaṅ yin des || ’chiṅ ba bcad nas ’gro ’gyur gyi || bźon pa de dag rnams kyis ni || sa de mṅon par ’thob mi srid ||

19.11.uv19#19.11C: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam / kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam //
19.11.uv-kg19#405: glaṅ po’i naṅ na glaṅ chen daṅ || sin du’i caṅ śes rta daṅ ni || dre’u ’dul byed gaṅ yin pa || de bas bdag ñid ’dul ba mchog ||

19.12.S10udanav_u:uv_19.12_0-1: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati / ātmanā hi sudāntena nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike // [i] na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet / yām ātmanā sudāntena nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike // [ii]
19.12.uv-kg19#406: bdag ñid legs ’dul gaṅ yin des || mya ṅan ’das gaṅ ’gro ’gyur gyi || bźon pa de dag rnams kyis ni || sa de mṅon par ’thob mi srid ||

19.13.S10udanav_u:uv_19.13_0-1: ātmānam eva damayed bhadrāśvam iva sārathiḥ / ātmanā hi sudāntena smṛtimāṁ duḥkhapāragaḥ //
19.13.uv-kg19#407: ’dul sbyoṅ byed pas rta bzaṅ ltar || bdag ñid kho na gdul bar bya || bdag ñid legs par ’dul ba yis || sdug bsṅal rnams kyi pha mthar phyin ||

19.14.S10udanav_u:uv_19.14_0-1: ātmaiva hy ātmano nāthaḥ ātmā śaraṇam ātmanaḥ / tasmāt saṁyamayātmānaṁ bhadrāśvam iva sārathiḥ //
19.14.uv-kg19#408: bdag ñid kho na bdag gi mgon || bdag ñid bdag gi skyabs yin pas || ’dul sbyoṅ byed pas rta bzaṅs ltar || de bas bdag ñid gdul bar bya ||

20.01.S10udanav_u:uv_20.1_0-1: krodhaṁ jahed viprajahec ca mānaṁ saṁyojanaṁ sarvam atikrameta /taṁ nāmne rūpe ca asajyamānam akiñcanaṁ nānupatanti saṅgāḥ //
20.01.uv-kg20#409: || khro ba spaṅs śiṅ ṅa rgyal rnam spaṅs na || kun sbyor kun las śin tu ’da’ ’gyur źiṅ || miṅ daṅ gzugs la chags pa med de dag || ci yaṅ med pas chags pa’i rjes mi ltuṅ ||

20.02.S10udanav_u:uv_20.2_0-1: krodhaṁ jahed utpatitaṁ rāgaṁ jātaṁ nivārayet / avidyāṁ prajahed dhīraḥ satyābhisamayāt sukham //
20.02.uv-kg20#410: skyes ma thag tu khro ba spoṅs || skyes nas ’dod chags spaṅ bar gyis || brtan pas ma rig rab tu spaṅ || bden pa mthoṅ na bde bar ’gyur ||

20.03.S10udanav_u:uv_20.3_0-1: krodhaṁ hatvā sukhaṁ sete krodhaṁ hatvā na śocati / krodhasya viṣamūlasya madhuraghnasya bhikṣavaḥ / vadham āryāḥ praśaṁsanti taṁ ca hatvā na śocati //
20.03.uv-kg20#411: khro ba spaṅs na bde bar ñal || khro ba spaṅs na gduṅ mi ’gyur || dge sloṅ khro ba bde ’joms pa’i || dug gi rtsa ba chom śig daṅ ||

20.04.S10udanav_u:uv_20.4_0-1: yat tu rocayati kruddho duṣkṛtaṁ sukṛtaṁ tv iti / paścāt sa vigate krodhe spṛṣṭvāgnim iva tapyate //
20.04.uv-kg20#412: ’phags pa rnams kyis bsṅags ’gyur źiṅ || de bcom pa yis mya ṅan med || gaṅ khros bdag gis legs byas kyi || ma legs min źes rab smra ba || de ni khro ba źi ’og tu || me yis bsregs bźin gduṅ bar ’gyur ||

20.05.S10udanav_u:uv_20.5_0-1: ahrīkaś cānavatrāpī cāvrataś caiva roṣaṇaḥ / krodhena hy abhibhūtasya dvīpaṁ nāstīha kiṁ cana // [i] ahrīkyo 'py anavatrāpi bhavati krodhano 'vrataḥ / krodhena cābhibhūtasya na dvīpo bhavati kaś cana // [ii]
20.05.uv-kg20#413: ṅo tsha med khrel med pa || khro ba can la brtul źugs med || khro bas mṅon par zil gnon pa || de la su yaṅ rten mi byed ||

20.06.S10udanav_u:uv_20.6_0-1: abalaṁ hi balaṁ tasya yasya krodhe balaṁ balam / kruddhasya dharmahīnasya pratipattir na vidyate //
20.06.uv-kg20#414: gaṅ źig byis pa’i mthu stobs can || de yi stobs ni stobs med yin || byis pa chos daṅ bral ba la || bsgrub par bya ba yod re sga na ||

20.07.S10udanav_u:uv_20.7_0-1: yas tv ayaṁ balavāṁ bhūtvā durbalasya titīkṣati / tām āhuḥ paramāṁ kṣāntiṁ nityaṁ kṣamati durbalaḥ //
20.07.uv-kg20#415: gaṅ źig stobs daṅ ldan gyur yaṅ || stobs chuṅ rnams kyi bzod byed pa || de ni bzod pa’i mchog ces gsuṅs || ñam chuṅ ba lta rtag tu sgur ||

20.08.S10udanav_u:uv_20.8_0-1: yaḥ pareṣāṁ prabhūḥ saṁs tu durbalāṁ saṁtitīkṣati / tām āhuḥ paramāṁ kṣāntiṁ nityaṁ kṣamati durbalaḥ //
20.08.uv-kg20#416: gaṅ źig gźan gyi dpon gyur kyaṅ || stobs chuṅ rnams kyi bzod byed pa || de ni bzod pa’i mchog ces gsuṅs || ñam chuṅ ba lta rtag tu sgur ||

20.1.S10udanav_u:uv_20.10_0-1: ātmānaṁ ca paraṁ caiva mahato rakṣate bhayāt / yaḥ paraṁ kupitaṁ jñātvā svayaṁ tatropaśāmyati //
20.1.uv-kg20#419: gaṅ źig pha rol khros rig nas || bdag ñid ne bar źi byed pa || de ni bdag daṅ gźan dag gi || ’jigs chen dag las skyob pa yin ||

20.11.S10udanav_u:uv_20.11_0-1: ubhayoś carate so 'rtham ātmanasya parasya ca / yaḥ paraṁ kupitaṁ jñātvā svayaṁ tatropaśāmyati //
20.11.uv-kg20#420: gaṅ źig pha rol khros rig nas || bdag ñid ñe bar źi byed pa || de ni bdag daṅ gźan dag gi || gñi ga’i don ni spyod pa yin ||

20.12.S10udanav_u:uv_20.12_0-1: ubhārthe caramāṇaṁ taṁ hy ātmanasya parasya ca / abalaṁ manyate bālo dharmeṣv avavicakṣaṇaḥ //
20.12.uv-kg20#421: bdag ñid dag ni gźan dag daṅ || gñi ga’i don ni spyod del || skye bo chos la mi mkhas rnams || byis pa yin źes sems kyaṅ sla||

20.13.S10udanav_u:uv_20.13_0-1: jayaṁ hi manyate bālo vacobhiḥ paruṣair vadan / nityam iva jayas tasya yo 'tivākyaṁ titīkṣati //
20.13.uv-kg20#423: byis pa khros nas tshig rtsub dag || smras na rgyal bar ’gyur sñam sems || gaṅ źig tshig dag bzod byed pa || de ni rtag tu rgyal ba yin ||

20.14.S10udanav_u:uv_20.14_0-1: śreṣṭhasya vākyaṁ kṣamate bhayena saṁrambhahetoḥ sadṛśasya caiva / yo vai nihīnasya vacaḥ kṣameta tām uttamāṁ kṣāntim ihāhur āryāḥ //
20.14.uv-kg20#422: gtso bo’i tshig ni ’jigs phyir bzod byed daṅ || thab zla’i tshig ni ’thab gcugs rgyu bzod pas || gaṅ źig dman pa’i tshig la bzod byed de || bzod pa’i mchog ces dam pas rab tu gsuṅs ||

20.15.S10udanav_u:uv_20.15_0-1: kruddho vācaṁ na bhāṣeta pariṣatsv atha vā mithaḥ /krodhābhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ svam arthasṁ hi na budhyate //
20.15.uv-kg20#425: khro ba’i zil gyis non pa’i mis || raṅ gi don kyaṅ mi rtogs pas || ’khor gyi naṅ du bag skyoṅ la || khro ba med pa’i tshig smros śig ||

20.16.S10udanav_u:uv_20.16_0-1: satyaṁ vaden na ca krudhyed dadyād alpād api svayam / sthānair ebhis tribhir yukto devānām antikaṁ vrajet //
20.16.uv-kg20#424: bden par smra bya khro mi bya || sloṅ la chuṅ yaṅ sbyin par bya || rnam pa ’di gsum gnas kyis ni || lha yi gnas su ’gro bar ’gyur ||

20.18.S10udanav_u:uv_20.18_0-1: tasyaiva pāpaṁ bhavati yaḥ kruddhe krudhyate punaḥ / kruddheṣv akruddhamānas tu saṁgrāmaṁ durjayaṁ jayet //
20.18.uv-kg20#426: gaṅ źig khros la slar khro ba || de ni sdig pa ca ’gyur bas || khros la slar ni ma khro daṅ || thub par dka’ ba’i g-yul las rgyal ||

20.19.S10udanav_u:uv_20.19_0-1: akrodhena jayet krodham asādhuṁ sādhunā jayet /jayet kadaryaṁ dānena satyena tv anṛtaṁ jayet //
20.19.uv-kg20#427: khro ba med pas khro ba thub || legs pas legs pa ma yin thub || sbyin pa yis ni ’juṅs pa thub || bden pas bden pa ma yin thub ||

20.21.S10udanav_u:uv_20.21_0-1: akrodhaś cāvihiṁsā ca vasaty āryeṣu sarvadā / sadā pāpajane krodhas tiṣṭhati parvato yathā //
20.21.uv-kg20#429: khro ba med la ’tshe med pa || ’apagasa pa’i skye bos rtag bsten kyaṅ || sde bo sdig can khro ba dag || ri bo bźin du sgur bar byad ||

20.22.S10udanav_u:uv_20.22_0-1: yas tv ihotpatitaṁ krodhaṁ rathaṁ bhrāntam iva dhārayet / vadāmi sārathiṁ taṁ tu raśmigrāho 'yam anyathā //
20.22.uv-kg20#430: gaṅ źig khro ba byuṅ ba daṅ || śiṅ rta ’khyams las ’dzin byed de || ’dul byoṅ mkhan du ṅas gsuṅs kyi || źags ’debs skye bo phal pa yin ||

21.01.S10udanav_u:uv_21.1_0-1: sarvābhibhūḥ sarvavid eva cāsmi sarvaiś ca dharmaiḥ satataṁ na liptaḥ / sarvaṁjahaḥ sarvabhayād vimuktaḥ svayaṁ hy abhijñāya kam uddiśeyam //
21.01.uv-kg21#431: ’jig rten ’di na kun rig kun zil gnon || ’di na chos rnams kun gyis ma gos śiṅ || kun spaṅs sred zad rab tu rnam grol ba || ñid kyis mṅon mkhyen pa la su yis bstan ||

21.02.S10udanav_u:uv_21.2_0-1: kam uddiśeyaṁ tv asamo hy atulyaḥ svayaṁ pravaktā hy adhigamya bodhim / tathāgato devamanuṣyaśāstā sarvajñatāṁ prāpya balair upetaḥ //
21.02.uv-kg21#432: de bźin gśegs pa lha mi’i ston pa ste || stobs rnams kun ldan thams cad mkhyen pa ṅa || byaṅ chub brñes nas ñid kyis rab ston pa || mtshuṅs med mnam med ṅa la su yis bstan ||

21.03.S10udanav_u:uv_21.3_0-1: ahaṁ hi lokeṣv arahann ahaṁ lokeṣv anuttaraḥ / sadevakeṣu lokeṣu cāhaṁ mārābhibhūr jinaḥ //
21.03.uv-kg21#433: ṅa ni ’jig rten dgra bcom ste || ’jig rten dag na bla med daṅ || lha daṅ bcas pa’i ’jig rten na || bdud rnams zil gnon rgyal ba ṅa ||

21.04.S10udanav_u:uv_21.4_0-1: ācāryo me na vai kaś cit sadṛśaś ca na vidyate /eko 'smiṁ loke saṁbuddhaḥ prāptaḥ saṁbodhim uttamām //
21.04.uv-kg21#434: ṅa daṅ ’dra ba med pas na || ṅa la slob dpon su yaṅ med || ’jig rten ’di na gcig pu yis || rdzogs pa’i byaṅ chub bla med brñes ||

21.05.S10udanav_u:uv_21.5_0-1: jinā hi mādṛśā jñeyā ye prāptā hy āsravakṣayam / jitā me pāpakā dharmās tato 'ham upagā jinaḥ //
21.05.uv-kg21#435: gaṅ źig zag pa zad brñes pa || rgyal ba ṅa ’drar śes par gyis || sdig pa’i chos las ṅa rgyal bas || de bas ñe ’gro ṅa rgyal ba ||

21.06.S10udanav_u:uv_21.6_0-1: bārāṇasīṁ gamiṣyāmi haniṣye 'mṛtadundubhim /dharmacakraṁ pravartayiṣye lokeṣv aprativartitam //
21.06.uv-kg21#437: ba ra ṇa ser soṅ nas su || ṅas ni chos kyi rṅa brduṅ źiṅ || ’jig rten sus kyaṅ ma bskor ba’i || chos kyi ’khor lo bskor bar byas ||

21.07.S10udanav_u:uv_21.7_0-1: na hi santaḥ prakāśyante viditvā lokaparyāyam /ādeśayanto virajaḥ padaṁ śāntamanīṣiṇaḥ //
21.07.uv-kg21#436: ’jigs rten yul sred rgal ba yi || kun mkhyen saṅs rgyas mya ṅan ’das || ’jig rten pa la ma bstan par || kun nas ’byuṅ ba mi śes pas ||

21.08.S10udanav_u:uv_21.8_0-1: nadantīha mahāvīrāḥ saddharmeṇa tathāgatāḥ / dharmeṇa nadamānānāṁ ke tv asūyed vijānakāḥ //
21.08.uv-kg21#438: dpa’ bo de bźin gśegs pa rnams || ’di na chos kyis ’dul bar mdzad || de dag chos kyis btul ba la || mkhas pa su yaṅ smod mi byed ||

21.1.S10udanav_u:uv_21.10_0-1: teṣāṁ devā manuṣyāś ca saṁbuddhānāṁ yaśasvinām / spṛhayanty āśubuddhīnāṁ śarīrāntimadhāriṇām //
21.1.uv-kg21#439: brtan gaṅ tiṅ ’dzin la źugs śiṅ || ṅes ’byuṅ źi la dga’ ba daṅ || sku yi ta ma ’dzin pa yi || rdzogs pa’i saṅs rgyas grags ldan pa || śes rab myur ba de dag la || lha daṅ mi rnams dga’ bar byed ||

21.11.S10udanav_u:uv_21.11_0-1: ye cābhyatītāḥ saṁbuddhā ye ca buddhā hy anāgatāḥ / yaś cāpy etarhi saṁbuddho bahūnāṁ śokanāśakaḥ //
21.11.uv-kg21#440: gaṅ dag ’das pa’i saṅs rgyas daṅ || gaṅ dag ma byon saṅs rgyas daṅ || gaṅ dag da ltar rdzogs saṅs rgyas || maṅ po’i mya ṅan sel mdzad pa ||

21.12.S10udanav_u:uv_21.12_0-1: sarve saddharmaguravo vyāhārṣu viharanti ca / athāpi vihariṣyanti eṣā buddheṣu dharmatā //
21.12.uv-kg21#441: bźugs par gyur ciṅ bźugs pa daṅ || de bźin bźugs par ’gyur kun gyis || dam chos bla mar mdzad pa ’di || rdzogs saṅs rgyas kyi chos ñid yin ||

21.13.S10udanav_u:uv_21.13_0-1: tasmād ihātmakāmena māhātmyam abhikāṅkṣatā / saddharmo gurukartavyaḥ smaratā buddhaśāsanam //
21.13.uv-kg21#442: de bas ’di na bdag dga’ źiṅ || bdag ñid chen po mṅon ’dod pas || saṅs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te || dam pa’i chos la bya mar bya ||

21.14.S10udanav_u:uv_21.14_0-1: na śraddhāsyanti vai ye tu narā buddhasya śāsanam / vyasanaṁ te gamiṣyanti vaṇijo rākṣasīṣv iva //
21.14.uv-kg21#443: mi gaṅ saṅs rgyas bstan pa la || dad pa ma bskyed byis pa de || rgud pa’i gnas su ’gro ’gyur te || srin mo rnams kyis tshod pa bźin ||

21.15.S10udanav_u:uv_21.15_0-1: śraddhāsyanti tu ye nityaṁ narā buddhasya śāsanam / svastinā te gamiṣyanti vālāhenaiva vāṇijāḥ //
21.15.uv-kg21#444: mi gaṅ saṅs rgyas bstan pa la || dad pa bskyed pa śes rab can || de ni bde bar pha rol ’gro || smrin śugs ldan pas tshoṅ pa bźin ||

21.16.S10udanav_u:uv_21.16_0-1: tathāgataṁ buddham iha svayaṁbhuvaṁdvau vai vitarkau bahulaṁ samudācarete / kṣemas tathaiva pravivekayuktas tamonudaṁ pāragataṁ maharṣim //
21.16.uv-kg21#445: de bźin gśegs pa mñam med mtshuṅs pa med || bde bar rnam rtog de bźin rab dben pa’i || rnam rtog gñis po spyod pa’i saṅs rgyas rnams || mun bsal pha rol gśegs śiṅ grags daṅ ldan ||

21.17.S10udanav_u:uv_21.17_0-1: prāptaḥ sa cāryo vaśitām aśeṣāṁ viṣvottaraḥ sarvabhayād vimuktaḥ / tṛṣṇāprahīṇo vimalo nirāśaś cālokayaṁ lokahitāya satvān //
21.17.uv-kg21#446: des ni brñes bya brñes śiṅ yid dbaṅ gyur || kun grol zag zad rab tu rnam par grol || rnam grol źugs ldan tha ba zag med rnams || lus can ’jig rten rnams la phan phyir gzigs ||

21.18.S10udanav_u:uv_21.18_0-1: śaile yathā parvatamūrdhani sthito yathaiva paśyej janatāṁ samantāt / tathā hy asau dharmamayaṁ sumedhāḥ prāsādam āruhya samantacakṣuḥ / śokābhibhūtāṁ janatām aśoko 'drākṣīd imāṁ jātijarābhibhūtām //
21.18.uv-kg21#447: ’ga’ źig ri bo’i spo la ’dug nas su || ’gro ba rnams la kun du lta ba ltar || de bźin blo bzaṅ mya ṅan bral ba dag || chos las byuṅ pa’i khaṅ bzaṅs steṅ gśegs nas || skye bo skye rgas zil gnon mya ṅan gyis || gduṅs pa rnams la kun du spyan gzigs nas || ’chi ba med pa’i sgo mo ’byed mdzad kyis || gaṅ dag ñan ’dod the tsom bzal bar gyis ||

22.01.S10udanav_u:uv_22.1_0-1: sādhu śrutaṁ sucaritaṁ sādhu cāpy aniketatā / pradakṣiṇaṁ pravrajyā ca śrāmaṇyasyānulomikam //
22.01.uv-kg22#448: || legs par thos daṅ legs spyod daṅ || khyim nas legs par byuṅ ba daṅ || spoṅ bar byed pas rab bskor ciṅ || dge sbyoṅ gi ni rjes ’thun legs ||

22.02.S10udanav_u:uv_22.2_0-1: bālā ihāvijānantaś caranti hy amarā iva / vijānatāṁ tu saddharmam āturasyaiva śarvarī //
22.02.uv-kg22#449: byis pa mi mkhas pa dag ni || ’chi ba med pa lta bur spyod || mkhas pa dam pa’i chos dag la || mtshan mo’i nad pa bźin du byed ||

22.03.S10udanav_u:uv_22.3_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ succhannaṁ praviśya tamasā sphuṭam / vidyamānāni rūpāṇi cakṣuṣmāṁ hi na paśyati //
22.03.uv-kg22#450: ji ltar khyim ni legs g-yogs pa || mun pas khebs pa’i naṅ źugs na || gzugs rnams yod par gyur kyaṅ ni || mig ldan bźin du mi mthoṅ ba ||

22.04.S10udanav_u:uv_22.4_0-1: tahaiveha naro nityaṁ jñānavān api yo bhavet / aśrutvā na vijānāti dharmāṁ kalyāṇapāpakān //
22.04.uv-kg22#451: de bźin ’di na rigs skyes pa’i || mi ni blo gros ldan gyur kyaṅ || sdig pa daṅ ni dge ba’i chos || ma thos par du śes mi ’gyur ||

22.05.S10udanav_u:uv_22.5_0-1: pradīpena tu rūpāṇi cakṣuṣmāṁ paśyate yathā / evaṁ śrutvā vijānāti dharmāṁ kalyāṇapāpakān //
22.05.uv-kg22#452: mig ldan mar me yod pa yis || gzugs rnams mthoṅ ba ji lta bar || de bźin dge daṅ sdig pa’i chos || chos pas rnam par śes par ’gyur ||

22.06.S10udanav_u:uv_22.6_0-1: śrutvā dharmāṁ vijānāti śrutvā pāpaṁ na sevate / śrutvā hy anarthaṁ varjayate śrutvā prāpnoti nirvṛtim //
22.06.uv-kg22#453: thos pas chos rnams rnam par śes || thos pas sdig las ldog par ’gyur || thos pas don med spoṅ bar byed || thos pas mya ṅan ’das pa ’thob ||

22.07.S10udanav_u:uv_22.7_0-1: bahuśruto 'pi ced bhavati śīleṣu tv asamāhitaḥ / śīlatas taṁ vigarhanti nāsya saṁpadyate śrutam //
22.07.uv-kg22#454: gal te thos pa maṅ gyur kyaṅ || tshul khrims legs par mi sdom na || de ni tshul khrims phyir smad ciṅ || de yi thos pa phun sum min ||

22.08.S10udanav_u:uv_22.8_0-1: alpaśruto 'pi ced bhavati śīleṣu susamāhitaḥ / śīlatas taṁ praśaṁsanti tasya saṁpadyate śrutam //
22.08.uv-kg22#455: gal te thos pa ñuṅ gyur kyaṅ || tshul khrims legs par sdom byed na || de ni tshul khrims phyir bsṅags śiṅ || de yi thos pa phun sum ’gyur ||

22.09.S10udanav_u:uv_22.9_0-1: alpaśruto 'pi ced bhavati śīleṣu tv asamāhitaḥ / ubhayatas taṁ vigarhanti nāsya saṁpadyate vratam //
22.09.uv-kg22#456: gaṅ źig thos pa ñuṅ ba daṅ || tshul khrims legs par mi sdom pa || de ni gñi ga’i phyir smad ciṅ || de yis brtul źugs phun sum min ||

22.1.S10udanav_u:uv_22.10_0-1: bahuśruto 'pi ced bhavati śīleṣu susamāhitaḥ / ubhayatas taṁ praśaṁsanti tasya saṁpadyate vratam //
22.1.uv-kg22#457: gaṅ źig maṅ du thos pa daṅ || tshul khrims legs par sdom byed pa || de ni gñi ga’i phyir bsṅags śiṅ || de yis brtul źugs phun sum ’gyur ||

22.11.S10udanav_u:uv_22.11_0-1: bahuśrutaṁ dharmadharaṁ prājñaṁ nityaṁ samāhitam / niṣkaṁ jāmbunadasyaiva kas taṁ ninditum arhati //
22.11.uv-kg22#458: thos pa maṅ źiṅ chos ’dzin daṅ || śes rab ldan źiṅ mñam bźag pa || de dag sus kyaṅ smad ’os min || ’dzam bu’i gliṅ gi gser rgyan bźin ||

22.12.S10udanav_u:uv_22.12_0-1: ye me rūpeṇa minvanti ye me ghoṣeṇa cānvagāḥ / chandarāgavaśopetā na māṁ jānanti te janāḥ // [i] ye rūpeṇa pramiṇvanti māṁ ghoṣeṇānuyānti ca / chandarāgavaśopetā na māṁ jānanti te janāḥ // [ii]
22.12.uv-kg22#459: gaṅ źig gzugs kyis rjes dpog ciṅ || ṅa la sgra yis ’jal byed pa || ’dun pa’i ’dod chags ldan pa yi || skye bo de yis ṅa mi śes ||

22.13.S10udanav_u:uv_22.13_0-1: ādhyātmaṁ ca na jānāti bahirdhā tu vipaśyati / bahirdāphaladarśī tu sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate //
22.13.uv-kg22#461: gal te phyi rol mthoṅ gyur ciṅ || naṅ ni śes par ma gyur na || phyi rol ’bras bu mthoṅ ba gaṅ || de ni sgra yis draṅ du ruṅ ||

22.14.S10udanav_u:uv_22.14_0-1: ādhyātmaṁ tu prajānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati / ādhyātmaphaladarśī tu sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate //
22.14.uv-kg22#460: gal te naṅ ni rnam śes śiṅ || phyi rol mthoṅ bar ma gyur na || naṅ gi ’bras bu mthoṅ ba gaṅ || de ni sgra yis draṅ du ruṅ ||

22.15.S10udanav_u:uv_22.15_0-1: ādhyātmaṁ ca na jānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati / ubhaye 'phaladarśī tu sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate //
22.15.uv-kg22#462: gal te naṅ yaṅ mi śes śiṅ || phyi rol mthoṅ bar ma gyur na || byis pa kun nas bsgribs pa dag || de ni sgra yis draṅ du ruṅ ||

22.16.S10udanav_u:uv_22.16_0-1: ādhyātmaṁ ca prajānāti bahirdhā ca vipaśyati / sa tu niḥsaraṇaprajño na vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate //
22.16.uv-kg22#463: gal te naṅ ni rnam śes śiṅ || phyi rol dag kyaṅ mthoṅ gyur pa || bstan pa ṅes ’byuṅ śes rab can || de ni sgra yis draṅ du ruṅ ||

22.17.S10udanav_u:uv_22.17_0-1: bahu śṛṇoti śrotreṇa bahū paśyati cakṣuṣā / na tad dṛṣṭaṁ śrutaṁ dhīraḥ sarvaṁ śraddhātum arhati // [i] śrotreṇa śrūyate bahu dṛśyate bahu cakṣuṣā / na tad dṛṣṭaṁ śrutaṁ dhīraḥ sarvaṁ śraddhātum arhati // [ii]
22.17.uv-kg22#464: rna bas phal chen thos pa daṅ || mig gis maṅ po mthoṅ na yaṅ || bstan pa mthoṅ thos de kun gyis || yid ches bya ba’i mi rigs so ||

22.18.S10udanav_u:uv_22.18_0-1: vijñānasārāṇi subhāṣitāni jñātaṁ śrutaṁ caiva samādhisāram / na tasya vijñānaśrutaṁ mahārthaṁ yaḥ sāhaso bhavati naraḥ pramattaḥ //
22.18.uv-kg22#465: legs gsuṅs thos pa sñiṅ por śes pa daṅ || tiṅ ṅe ’dzin dag sñiṅ por śes gyur kyaṅ || gaṅ źig bag med rlaṅ por byed pa de’i || thos daṅ śes pa don chen mi ’gyur ro ||

22.19.S10udanav_u:uv_22.19_0-1: dharme tu ye hy āryanivedite ratās tadā carante vacasā yadāhuḥ /te kṣāntisauratyasamādhigocarāḥ śrutasya buddher api sāram adhyaguḥ //
22.19.uv-kg22#466: gaṅ źig ’phags pas bstan pa’i chos dga’ źiṅ || de bźi lus daṅ ṅag gis spyod byed pa || de dag bzod ldan ’grogs dga’ dbaṅ po bsdams || thos daṅ śes pa’i pha rol phyin pa ’thob ||

23.01.S10udanav_u:uv_23.1_0-1: subhāṣitasya śikṣeta śramaṇopāsanasya ca / ekāsanasya ca rahaś cittavyupaśamasya ca //
23.01.uv-kg23#467: || legs par gsuṅs la bslab bya źiṅ || dge sbyoṅ la ni bsñen bkur daṅ || dben pa daṅ ni stan gcig daṅ || sems ni ñe bar źi bar bya ||

23.02.S10udanav_u:uv_23.2_0-1: ekāsanaṁ tv ekaśayyām ekacaryām atandritaḥ / ramayec caikam ātmānaṁ vaneṣv ekaḥ sadā vaset //
23.02.uv-kg23#468: stan gcig mal stan gcig pa daṅ || gcig pu sñom las med spyod ciṅ || gcig pu nags tshal gnas pa daṅ || gcig pus bdag ñid gdul bar bya ||

23.03.S10udanav_u:uv_23.3_0-1: yaḥ sahasraṁ sahasrāṇāṁ saṁgrāme dviṣatāṁ jayet / yaś cātmānaṁ jayed ekaṁ saṁgrāmo durjayaḥ sa vai //
23.03.uv-kg23#469: gaṅ źig stoṅ phrag stoṅ dag gi || mi yi g-yul las rgyal ba bas || gaṅ źig bdag las rgyal byed pa || de ni mi yi g-yul las rgyal ||

23.04.S10udanav_u:uv_23.4_0-1: ātmā hy asya jitaḥ śreyāṁ yac ceyam itarāḥ prajāḥ / ātmadāntasya puruṣasya nityaṁ saṁvṛtacāriṇaḥ //
23.04.uv-kg23#470: rtag tu sdom pa spyod pa yi || mi yis bdag brtul gcig pu yis || bdag ñid las rgyal mchog yin gyi || skye dgu gźan lta phal par zad ||

23.05.S10udanav_u:uv_23.5_0-1: na devā nāpi gandharvā na māro brāhmaṇā saha / jitasyāpajitaṁ kuryus tathā prājñasya bhikṣuṇaḥ //
23.05.uv-kg23#471: śes rab kyis gnas dge sloṅ gis || rgyal bar byas la bdud daṅ ni.i || tshaṅs par bcas pas pham mi nus || lha yis ma yin dri zas min ||

23.07.S10udanav_u:uv_23.7_0-1: ātmānam eva prathamaṁ pratirūpe niveśayet / tato 'nyam anuśāsīta na kliśyeta hi paṇḍitaḥ //
23.07.uv-kg23#472: bdag ñid daṅ por rigs par gnas byas nas || phyi nas gźan dag bdag bźin gdul bar bya || bdag ñid daṅ por rigs par gnas byas nas || phyi dus ’dul tshe mkhas pa ñon mi moṅs ||

23.08.S10udanav_u:uv_23.8_0-1: ātmānaṁ hi tathā kuryāc chāsītānyaṁ yathā svayam / sudānto bata me nityam ātmā sa hi sudurdamaḥ //
23.08.uv-kg23#473: bdag la ji ltar byas pa bźin || gźan dag la yaṅ de ltar bya || bdag ñid dul źiṅ źi ba yis || gźan dag bde bar gdul bar bya ||

23.09.S10udanav_u:uv_23.9_0-1: ātmānaṁ hi tathā kuryāc chāsītānyaṁ yathā svayam / ātmā dānto mayā nityam ātmadānto hi paṇḍitaḥ //
23.09.uv-kg23#474: bdag la ji ltar byas pa bźin || gźan dag la yaṅ de ltar bya || kye ma bdag raṅ legs dul ba || bdag ñid dul bas dga’ bar ’gyur ||

23.1.S10udanav_u:uv_23.10_0-1: ātmano 'rthaṁ parārthena bahunāpi na hāpayet / ātmārthaṁ paramaṁ jñātvā svakārthaparamo bhavet //
23.1.uv-kg23#475: bdag gi don phyir gźan don ni || maṅ po dag kyaṅ gtaṅ bar bya || bdag don ched cher śes gyur na || raṅ gi don gyi mchog tu ’gyur ||

23.11.S10udanav_u:uv_23.11_0-1: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet / ātmanā hi sudāntena nāthaṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ //
23.11.uv-kg23#486: bdag ñid bdag gi mgon yid gyi || gźan lta su źig mgon du ’gyur || bdag ñid bdag gi mgon gyur pas || bdag ñid mgon du ’gyur ba ’thob ||

23.12.S10udanav_u:uv_23.12_0-1: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet / ātmanā hi sudāntena arthaṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ //
23.12.uv-kg23#476: bdag ñid bdag gi mgon yin gyi || gźan lta su źig mgon du ’gyur || bdag ñid bdag gi mgon gyur pa’i || mkhas pas don rnams ’thob par ’gyur ||

23.13.S10udanav_u:uv_23.13_0-1: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet / ātmanā hi sudāntena dharmaṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ //
23.13.uv-kg23#477: bdag ñid bdag gi mgon yin gyi || gźal lta bu źig mgon du ’gyur || bdag ñid bdag gi mgon gyur pa’i || mkhas pas chos rnams ’thob par ’gyur ||

23.16.S10udanav_u:uv_23.16_0-1: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet / ātmanā hi sudāntena sukhāṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ //
23.16.uv-kg23#478: bdag ñid bdag gi mgon yin gyi || gźan lta su źig mgon du ’gyur || bdag ñid bdag gi mgon gyur pa’i || mkhas pas bde ba ’thob par ’gyur ||

23.17.S10udanav_u:uv_23.17_0-1: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet / ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ //
23.17.uv-kg23#479: bdag ñid bdag gi mgon yin gyi || gźan lta su źig mgon du ’gyur || bdag ñid bdag gi mgon gyur pa’i || makasa pas bde ’gro ’thob par ’gyur ||

23.21.S10udanav_u:uv_23.21_0-1: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet / ātmanā hi sudāntena jñātimadhye virocate //
23.21.uv-kg23#480: bdag ñid bdag gi mgon yin gyi || gźan lta su źig mgon du ’gyur || bdag ñid bdag gi mgon gyur pas || yun riṅ gnas pas dga’ bar ’gyur ||

23.22.S10udanav_u:uv_23.22_0-1: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet / ātmanā hi sudāntena śokamadhye na śocati //
23.22.uv-kg23#481: bdag ñid bdag gi mgon yin gyi || gźan lta su źig mgon du ’gyur || bdag ñid bdag gi mgon gyur pa || gñen gyi naṅ na lam mer ’bar ||

23.23.S10udanav_u:uv_23.23_0-1: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet / ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvaṁ chindati bandhanam //
23.23.uv-kg23#482: bdag ñid bdag gi mgon yin gyi || gźan lta su źig mgon du ’gyur || bdag ñid bdag gi mgon gyur pa || mya ṅan naṅ na gduṅ mi ’gyur ||

23.24.S10udanav_u:uv_23.24_0-1: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet / ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvās tyajati durgatīḥ //
23.24.uv-kg23#483: bdag ñid bdag gi mgon yin gyi || gźan lta su źig mgon du ’gyur || bdag ñid bdag gi mgon gyur pas || ’chiṅ ba thams cad gcod par ’gyur ||

24.01.S10udanav_u:uv_24.1_0-1: yac ca gāthāśataṁ bhāṣed anarthapadasaṁhitam / ekam arthapadaṁ śreyo yac chrutvā hy upaśāmyati //
24.01.uv-kg24#488: || gaṅ dag don daṅ mi ldan tshig || tshigs bcad brgya dag smra ba bas || gaṅ dag ñe bar źi ’gyur ba’i || don ldan tshig gcig thos pa ruṅ ||

24.02.S10udanav_u:uv_24.2_0-1: yac ca gāthāśataṁ bhāṣed adharmapadasaṁhitam / ekaṁ dharmapadaṁ śreyo yac chrutvā hy upaśāmyati //
24.02.uv-kg24#489: gaṅ dag chos daṅ mi ldan tshig || tshigs bcad brgya dag smra ba bas || gaṅ dag ne bar źi ’gyur ba’i || chos ldan tsig gcig thos pa ruṅ ||

24.03.S10udanav_u:uv_24.3_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved duḥśīlo hy asamāhitaḥ / ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ sadā śīlavataḥ śuceḥ //
24.03.uv-kg24#490: tshul ’chal mñam par ma bźag pa || lo brgyar gson pa gaṅ yin pas || tshul khrims ldan źiṅ mñam bźag pa || ñin źag ’ga’ źig gson pa ruṅ ||

24.04.S10udanav_u:uv_24.4_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved duṣprajño hy asamāhitaḥ / ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ prājñasya dhyāyinaḥ sadā //
24.04.uv-kg24#492: śes ’chal mñam par ma bźag pa || lo brgyar gson pa gaṅ yin pas || śes rab chen po mñam bźag pa || ñin źag ’ga’ źig gson pa ruṅ ||

24.05.S10udanav_u:uv_24.5_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīvet kusīdo hīnavīryavān / ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyo vīryam ārabhato dṛḍham //
24.05.uv-kg24#491: brtson med le lo ldan pa dag || lo brgyar gson pa gaṅ yin pas || brtson ’grus brtan pa brtsams pa dag || ñin źag ’ga’ źig gson pa ruṅ ||

24.06.S10udanav_u:uv_24.6_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann udayavyayam / ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy udayavyayam //
24.06.uv-kg24#493: skye daṅ ’jig pa ma mthoṅ ba || lo brgyar gson pa gaṅ yin pas || skye daṅ ’jig pa mthoṅ ba dag || ñin źag ’ga’ źig gson pa ruṅ ||

24.07.S10udanav_u:uv_24.7_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyaṁ vedanākṣayam / ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato vedanākṣayam //
24.07.uv-kg24#494: tshor ba zad pa ma mthoṅ ba || lo brgyar gson pa gaṅ yin pas || tshor bzad pa mthoṅ pa dag || ñin źag ’ga’ źig gson pa ruṅ ||

24.08.S10udanav_u:uv_24.8_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann āsravakṣayam / ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy āsravakṣayam //
24.08.uv-kg24#495: zag pa zad pa ma mthoṅ ba || lo brgyar gson pa gaṅ yin pas || zag pa zad pa mthoṅ ba dag || ñin źag ’ga’ źig gson pa ruṅ ||

24.09.S10udanav_u:uv_24.9_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann acalaṁ padam / ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy acalaṁ padam //
24.09.uv-kg24#496: go ’phaṅ mi g-yo ma mthoṅ ba || lo brgyar gson pa gaṅ yin pas|| go ’phaṅ mi g-yo mthoṅ ba dag || ñin źag ’ga’ źig gson pa ruṅ ||

24.11.S10udanav_u:uv_24.11_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann arajaḥ padam / ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy arajaḥ padam //
24.11.uv-kg24#502: rdul me go ’phaṅ ma mthoṅ ba || lo brgyar gson pa gaṅ yin pas || rdul med go ’phaṅ mthoṅ ba dag || ñin źag ’ga’ źig gson pa ruṅ ||

24.12.S10udanav_u:uv_24.12_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyaṁ virajaḥ padam / ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato virajaḥ padam //
24.12.uv-kg24#503: rdul bral go ’phaṅ ma mthoṅ ba || lo brgyar gson pa gaṅ yin pas || rdul bral go ’phaṅ mthoṅ ba dag || ñin źag ’ga’ źig gson pa ruṅ ||

24.13.S10udanav_u:uv_24.13_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyaṁ durdṛśaṁ padam / ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato durdṛśaṁ padam //
24.13.uv-kg24#497: go ’phaṅ blta dka’ ma mthoṅ ba || lo brgyar gson pa gaṅ yin pas || go ’phaṅ blta dka’ mthoṅ ba dag || ñin źag ’ga’ źig gson pa ruṅ ||

24.16.S10udanav_u:uv_24.16_0-1: yac ca varṣaśataṁ pūrṇam agniṁ paricared vane / yac caikaṁ bhāvitātmānaṁ muhūrtam api pūjayet / sā tasya pūjanā śreṣṭhā na tad varṣaśataṁ hutam //
24.16.uv-kg24#504: mi ni lo brgyar nags tshal na || me la yoṅs sten gaṅ yin daṅ || bdag ñid bsgom la yud tsam źig || mchod pa byed pa gaṅ yin pa || mchod byed de ñid ches ruṅ gi || lo brgyar sbyin sreg byed mi ruṅ ||

24.17.S10udanav_u:uv_24.17_0-1: māse māse kuśāgreṇa yo hi bhuñjīta bhojanam / na tad buddhe prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm //
24.17.uv-kg24#505: zla ba re rer ku śa’i rtses || kha zas za ba gaṅayina des || saṅs rgyas la ni dad pa yi || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

24.18.S10udanav_u:uv_24.18_0-1: māse māse kuśāgreṇa yo hi bhuñjīta bhojanam / na tad dharme prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm //
24.18.uv-kg24#506: zla ba re rer ku śa’i rtses || kha zas za ba gaṅ yin des|| dam pa’i chos la dad pa yi || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

24.19.S10udanav_u:uv_24.19_0-1: māse māse kuśāgreṇa yo hi bhuñjīta bhojanam / na tat saṁghe prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm //
24.19.uv-kg24#507: zla ba re rer ku śa’i rtses || kha zas za ba gaṅ yin des || dge ’dun la ni dad pa yi || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

24.2.uv24#24.20D: māse māse kuśāgreṇa yo hi bhuñjīta bhojanam / na tad bhūtānukampāyā kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm //
24.2.uv-kg24#510: zla ba re rer ku śa’i rtses || kha zas za ba gaṅ yin des || ’byuṅ po rnams la sñiṅ brtse ba’i || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

24.21.S10udanav_u:uv_24.21_0-1: māse māse sahasreṇa yo yajeta samāśatam / na tad buddhe prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm //
24.21.uv-kg24#513: zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stoṅ || lo brgyar byed pa gaṅ yin des || saṅs rgyas la ni dad pa yi || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

24.22.S10udanav_u:uv_24.22_0-1: māse māse sahasreṇa yo yajeta samāśatam / na tad dharme prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm //
24.22.uv-kg24#514: zla ba re rer mchog sbyin stoṅ || lo brgyar byed pa gaṅ yin des || dam pa’i chos la dad pa yi || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

24.23.S10udanav_u:uv_24.23_0-1: māse māse sahasreṇa yo yajeta samāśatam / na tat saṁghe prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm //
24.23.uv-kg24#515: zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stoṅ || lo brgyar byed pa gaṅ yin des || dge ’dun la ni dad pa yi || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

24.25.S10udanav_u:uv_24.25_0-1: māse māse sahasreṇa yo yajeta samāśatam / na taṁ maitrasya cittasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm //
24.25.uv-kg24#519: zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stoṅ || lo brgyar byed pa gaṅ yin des || byams par sems par byed pa yi || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

24.26.S10udanav_u:uv_24.26_0-1: māse māse sahasreṇa yo yajeta samāśatam / na tat satvānukampāyā kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm //
24.26.uv-kg24#516: zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stoṅ || lo brgyar byed pa gaṅ yin des|| sems can rnams la sñiṅ brtse ba’i || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

24.29.S10udanav_u:uv_24.29_0-1: māse māse sahasreṇa yo yajeta samāśatam / na tat svākhyātadharmasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīm //
24.29.uv-kg24#520: zla ba re rer mchod sbyin stoṅ || lo brgyar byed pa gaṅ yin des || legs par gsuṅs pa’i dam chos kyi || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

24.3.S10udanav_u:uv_24.30_0-1: yat kiṁ cid iṣṭaṁ ca hutaṁ ca loke saṁvatsaraṁ yajati puṇyaprekṣī / sarvaṁ pi taṁ na caturbhāgam eti abhivādanaṁ tv ṛjjugateṣu śreyaḥ //
24.3.uv-kg24#521: bsod nams ’dod pa’i mi yis ’jig rten du || sbyin sreg mchod sbyin chuṅ zad ci byas des || gaṅ źig draṅ po’i sems kyis phyag ’tshal ba || de yi bźi char yaṅ ni mi phod do ||

25.01.S10udanav_u:uv_25.1_0-1: aśrāddhebhiḥ kadaryebhiḥ piśunair vibhūtinandibhiḥ / sākhyaṁ kurvīta na prājñaḥ saṁgatiḥ pāpair hi pāpikā //
25.01.uv-kg25#522: dad pa med ciṅ ’juṅs pa daṅ || dbyer byed phra ma can dag daṅ || mkhas pas bśes par mi bya źiṅ || sdig can mi daṅ ’grogs mi bya||

25.02.S10udanav_u:uv_25.2_0-1: śrāddhebhiḥ peśalebhiś ca śīlavadbhir bahuśrutaiḥ / sākhyaṁ kurvīta saprajñaḥ saṁgatir bhadrair hi bhadrikā //
25.02.uv-kg25#523: dad ldan sñan par smra ba daṅ || thos maṅ tshul khrims ldan pa daṅ || mkhas pa yis ni mdza’ bya źiṅ || mi mchog dag daṅ ’grogs par bya ||

25.03.S10udanav_u:uv_25.3_0-1: na bhajet pāpakaṁ mitraṁ na bhajet puruṣādhamam /bhajeta mitraṁ kalyāṇaṁ bhajed uttamapūruṣam //
25.03.uv-kg25#524: sdig pa’i grogs po mi bsten ciṅ || skyes bu ṅan pa bsten mi bya || dge ba’i bśes gñen bsten bya źiṅ || skyes bu dam pa bstan par bya || de lta bu dag bsten byas na || sdig par mi ’gyur legs par ’gyur ||

25.04.S10udanav_u:uv_25.4_0-1: addhā narāḥ sevitavyāḥ śrutāḍhyāḥ sthānacintakāḥ /. teṣāṁ hi śrutvā tu subhāṣitāni vināpi tebhyo labhate viśeṣam //
25.04.uv-kg25#525: gaṅ dag thos maṅ gnas maṅ sems pa daṅ || dad daṅ śes rab ldan de mi yis bsten || ’dir ni de yis legs smras mñan byas na || riṅ po nas kyaṅ khyad par thob par ’gyur ||

25.05.S10udanav_u:uv_25.5_0-1: hīyati puruṣo nihīnasevī na tu khalu hāyeta tulyasevī / śreṣṭham upagato hy upaiti śraiṣṭhyaṁ tasmāc chreṣṭham ihātmano bhajeta //
25.05.uv-kg25#526: dman pa bsten pas ma dag ñams ’gyur źiṅ || thad kar bab pa bsten pas so na gnas || gtso bo bsten pas dam pa ’thob ’gyur bas || de phyir bdag pas gtsor gyur bsten par bya ||

25.06.S10udanav_u:uv_25.6_0-1: śreyo hi labhate nityaṁ yaḥ śreṣṭhān upasevate / prajñayā cottamatamāṁ śīlenopaśamena ca //
25.06.uv-kg25#527: tshul khrims ñe bar źi ba daṅ || śes rab ches mchog ldan pa yi || gtso bo gaṅ yin de bsten na || gtso bo bas kyaṅ ches gtsor ’gyur ||

25.07.S10udanav_u:uv_25.7_0-1: pūtimatsyāṁ kuśāgreṇa yo naro hy upanahyate / kuśāpi pūtikā vānti hy evaṁ pāpopasevanāḥ //
25.07.uv-kg25#528: mi yis ’di na ña rul la || ku śa’i gtsaṅ byed bciṅs pa gaṅ || ku śa ñid kyaṅ rul ’gyur ba || sdig pa bsten pa’aṅ de bźin ’gyur ||

25.08.S10udanav_u:uv_25.8_0-1: tagaraṁ palāśapatreṇa yo naro hy upanahyati / patrāṇy api sugandhīni sad evaṁ saṁgamāt satām //
25.08.uv-kg25#529: ma yis rgya spos pa la śa’i || lo mar phur ma byas pa gaṅ || lo ma ñid kyaṅ dri źim pa || dam pa bsten pa’aṅ de bźin ’gyur ||

25.09.S10udanav_u:uv_25.9_0-1: akurvann api pāpāni kurvāṇam upasevate / śaṅkito bhavati pāpasya avarṇaś cāsya vardhate //
25.09.uv-kg25#530: gal te sdig pa byed pa dag || sdig mi byed pas bsten na yaṅ || sdig pa byed par dogs skye źiṅ || mi sñan pa yaṅ ’phel bar ’gyur || bsten bya ma yin bsten pa’i mi || de yi skyon gyis skyon can ’gyur ||

25.11.S10udanav_u:uv_25.11_0-1: yādṛśaṁ kurute mitraṁ yādṛśaṁ copasevate / na cirāt tādṛśo bhavati saṁsevā hy asya tādṛśī //
25.11.uv-kg25#532: ji ltar grogs po bsten pa daṅ || ji ltar ñe.e bar bsten byas pa || bstan bya de ni ci ’dra bar || riṅ po mi thogs de ’drar ’gyur ||

25.12.S10udanav_u:uv_25.12_0-1: tasmāt phalapuṭasyaiva dṛṣṭvā saṁpākam ātmanaḥ / asanto nopaseveta santaḥ seveta paṇḍitaḥ //
25.12.uv-kg25#533: de bas ’bras bu’i snod bźin du || bdag gis bsten pa śes pa yis || dam pa ma yin mi bstan ciṅ || mkhas pas dam pa bsten byas la || dge sloṅ de’i lam rjes ’braṅ na || sdug bsṅal zad pa thob par ’gyur ||

25.13.S10udanav_u:uv_25.13_0-1: yāvajjīvaṁ pi ced bālaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate / na sa dharmaṁ vijānāti darvī sūparasān iva //
25.13.uv-kg25#534: byis pas ji srid gson par du || gal te mkhas pa bsten byas kyaṅ || de yis chos śes mi ’gyur te || gzar bus tshod ma’i ro bźin no ||

25.14.S10udanav_u:uv_25.14_0-1: muhūrtam api saprajñaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate / sa vai dharmaṁ vijānāti jihvā sūparasān iva //
25.14.uv-kg25#535: śes rab ldan pas yud tsam źig || mkhas pa ñe bar bsten pas kyaṅ || de yis chos rnams śes ’gyur te || lce yis tshod ma’i ro bźin no ||

25.15.S10udanav_u:uv_25.15_0-1: yāvajjīvaṁ pi ced bālaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate / na sa dharmaṁ vijānāti prajñā hy asya na vidyate //
25.15.uv-kg25#536: byis pas ji srid gson bar du || gal te mkhas pa bsten byas kyaṅ || de la mig ni med pa’i phyir || chos rnams śes par mi ’gyur ro ||

25.16.S10udanav_u:uv_25.16_0-1: muhūrtam api saprajñaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate / sa vai dharmaṁ vijānāti prajñā tasya hi vidyate //
25.16.uv-kg25#537: śes rab ldan pas yud tsam źig || mkhas pa ñe bar bsten pas kyaṅ || de la mig ni yod pa’i phyir || chos rnams rab tu śes par ’gyur ||

25.17.S10udanav_u:uv_25.17_0-1: yāvajjīvaṁ pi ced bālaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate / na sa dharmaṁ vijānāti samyaksaṁbuddhadeśitam //
25.17.uv-kg25#538: byis pas ji srid gson bar du || gal te mkhas pa bsten byas kyaṅ || rdzogs saṅs rgyas kyis bstan pa yi || chos rnams de yis śes mi ’gyur ||

25.18.S10udanav_u:uv_25.18_0-1: muhūrtam api saprajñaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate / sa vai dharmaṁ vijānāti samyaksaṁbuddhadeśitam //
25.18.uv-kg25#539: śes rab ldan pas yud tsam źig || mkhas pa ñe bar bsten pas kyaṅ || rdzogs saṅs gyas kyis bstan pa yi || chos rnams de yis śes par ’gyur ||

25.19.S10udanav_u:uv_25.19_0-1: ekam arthapadaṁ proktaṁ paṇḍitasyārthakārakam / bālasya tu na kṛtyāya syāt sarvaṁ buddhabhāṣitam //
25.19.uv-kg25#540: don ldan tshig ni gcig gis kyaṅ || mkhas pa yi ni bya ba byed || saṅs rgyas kun gyi gsuṅ gis kyaṅ || byis pa’i bya ba byed mi ’gyur ||

25.2.S10udanav_u:uv_25.20_0-1: bālaḥ padasahasreṇa padam ekaṁ na budhyate / padenaikena medhāvī padānāṁ vindate śatam //
25.2.uv-kg25#541: blo daṅ ldan pa tshig gcig gis || tshig brgya dag ni śes par ’gyur || byis pa la ni tshig stoṅ gis || tshig gcig śes par mi ’gyur ro ||

25.21.S10udanav_u:uv_25.21_0-1: amitraḥ paṇḍitaḥ śreyāṁ na tu bālo 'nukampakaḥ / bālo 'nukampamāno hi narakān upakarṣati //
25.21.uv-kg25#542: gñis na mkhas daṅ mi mdza’ sla’i || byis pa rnams daṅ mdza’ mi ruṅ || byis pa rnams daṅ mdza’ byed pa || sems can dmyal bar khrid par byed ||

25.22.S10udanav_u:uv_25.22_0-1: yo jānīyād ahaṁ bāla iti bālaḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ / bālaḥ paṇḍitamānī tu bāla eva nirucyate //
25.22.uv-kg25#543: byis pa gaṅ źig byis pa’o źes || śes pa de ’dir mkhas pa yin || byis pa gaṅ źig mkhas sems pa || de ni byis pa źes brjod do ||

25.23.S10udanav_u:uv_25.23_0-1: yac ca bālaḥ praśaṁseta yac ca nindeta paṇḍitaḥ / nindā tu paṇḍitāc chreṣṭhā na tu bālāt praśaṁsanā //
25.23.uv-kg25#544: byis pas bstod pa gaṅ yin daṅ || mkhas pas smad pa gaṅ yin las || mkhas pas smad pa ches ruṅ gis || byis pas bstod pa mi ruṅ ṅo ||

25.25.S10udanav_u:uv_25.25_0-1: dhīraṁ prājñaṁ niṣeveta śīlavantaṁ bahuśrutam / dhaureyaṁ javasaṁpannaṁ candraṁ tārāgaṇā iva //
25.25.uv-kg25#546: de bas rgyu skar lam du zla ba ltar || brtan źiṅ thos maṅ mchog ’dren byed pa daṅ || tshul khrims ldan daṅ ’phags pa’i brtul źugs can || mi mchog brtse ldan blo bzaṅs bsten par gyis||

26.01.S10udanav_u:uv_26.1_0-1: kurmo yathāṅgāni svake kapāle samādadhītātmavitarkitāni / aniḥśrito hy anyam aheṭhayānaḥ parinirvṛto nāpavadeta kaṁ cit //
26.01.uv-kg26#547: || rus sbal raṅ gi khog par yan lag ltar || dge sloṅ yid kyi rnam rtog naṅ bsdus nas || rten pa med ciṅ gźan la ’tshe med par || mya ṅan ’das la su yaṅ smod mi byed ||

26.02.S10udanav_u:uv_26.2_0-1: kṣāntiḥ paramaṁ tapas titīkṣā nirvāṇaṁ paramaṁ vadanti buddhāḥ / na hi pravrajitaḥ paropatāpī śramaṇo bhavati paraṁ viheṭhayaṁ vai //
26.02.uv-kg26#548: bzod pa dka’ thub mchog ste bzod pa ni || mya ṅan ’das pa mchog ces saṅs rgyas gsuṅ || rab tu byuṅ ba gźan la ’tshe ba daṅ || gźan la gnod pas dge sbyoṅ ma yin no ||

26.03.S10udanav_u:uv_26.3_0-1: mā kaṁ cit paruṣaṁ brūthaḥ proktāḥ prativadanti tam /duḥkhā hi saṁrambhakathāḥ pratidaṇḍaṁ spṛśanti hi //
26.03.uv-kg26#549: tshig rdub ci yaṅ smra mi bya || smras na slar yaṅ smra bar byed || ’thab gcugs tshig gis sdug bsṅal źiṅ || de la phyir yaṅ chad pas gcod ||

26.04.S10udanav_u:uv_26.4_0-1: yadīrayasi hātmānaṁ kaṁsīvopahatā sadā / jātimaraṇasaṁsāraṁ ciraṁ hy anubhaviṣyasi //
26.04.uv-kg26#550: gal te bdag gis phar byas na || ’khar ba’i snod la brduṅs pa bźin || ’khor bar skye daṅ rga ba dag | yun riṅ ñams su myoṅ bar ’gyur ||

26.05.S10udanav_u:uv_26.5_0-1: na tv īrayasi hātmānaṁ kaṁsir nopahatā yathā / eṣa prāpto 'si nirvāṇaṁ saṁrambhas te na vidyate //
26.05.uv-kg26#551: bdag gis phar nim byas daṅ || ’khar ba’i snod la ma brduṅs ltar || ’di ltar ’thab mo mi ’byuṅ źiṅ || mya ṅan ’das pa thob par ’gyur ||

26.06.S10udanav_u:uv_26.6_0-1: ārogyaparamā lābhā saṁtuṣṭiparamaṁ dhanam / viśvāsaparamaṁ mitraṁ nirvāṇaparamaṁ sukham //
26.06.uv-kg26#552: nad med rñed pa’i dam pa ste || chog śes pa ni nor gyi dbyig || yid gtsugs bśes pa’i mchog yin te || mya ṅan ’das ba bde ba’i phul ||

26.07.S10udanav_u:uv_26.7_0-1: kṣudhā parama rogāṇāṁ saṁskārā duḥkham eva tu / etaj jñātvā yathābhūtaṁ nirvāṇaparamo bhavet //
26.07.uv-kg26#553: ’du byed sdug bsṅal ma ruṅs pa || nad kyi naṅ na bkres mi bzad || de ltar ji bźin śes na ni || mya ṅan ’das pa mchog tu ’gyur ||

26.08.S10udanav_u:uv_26.8_0-1: alpakāḥ sugatiṁ yānti bahavo yānti durgatim / etaj jñātvā yathābhūtaṁ nirvāṇaparamo bhavet //
26.08.uv-kg26#554: bde ’gror ’gro ba ñuṅ zad de || ṅan ’gror ’gro ba bsam yas śig || de lta’i ñes dmigs rtogs gyur na || myur du mya ṅan ’das pa ’thob ||

26.09.S10udanav_u:uv_26.9_0-1: sahetuṁ sugatiṁ yānti sahetuṁ yānti durgatim / sahetuṁ parinirvānti hy evam etat sahetukam //
26.09.uv-kg26#555: bde ’gror ’gro ba rgyu daṅ bcas || ṅan ’gror ’gro ba rgyu daṅ ldan || mya ṅan ’das ’gro rgyu can te || de dag thams cad rgyu daṅ bcas ||

26.1.S10udanav_u:uv_26.10_0-1: gatir mṛgāṇāṁ pravaṇam ākāśaṁ pakṣiṇāṁ gatiḥ / dharmo gatir vibhāgīnāṁ nirvāṇaṁ tv arhatāṁ gatiḥ //
26.1.uv-kg26#556: nags tshal mchog tu ri dgas ’gro || mkha’ la bya rnams ’gro bar byed || chos la rnam par bsgoms ’gro ste || dgra bcom mya ṅan ’das par ’gro ||

26.11.S10udanav_u:uv_26.11_0-1: na hīdaṁ hīnavīryeṇa mandenāpy avijānatā / nirvāṇaṁ śakyam adhigantuṁ sarvagranthapradālanam //
26.11.uv-kg26#557: ’di na brtson ’grus źan pa daṅ || blo chuṅ śes pa med pa yis || mdud pa thams cad rab gtubs pa’i || mya ṅan ’das pa thob mi ’gyur ||

26.12.S10udanav_u:uv_26.12_0-1: siñca bhikṣor imāṁ nāvaṁ siktā laghvī bhaviṣyati / hitvā rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca tato nirvāṇam eṣyasi //
26.12.uv-kg26#558: khyod kyis gru ’di’i chu phyags daṅ || ’di ni yaṅ bar ’gyur ba ltar || de bźin źe sdaṅ ’dod chags spoṅs || de nas mya ṅan ’das pa ’thob ||

26.13.S10udanav_u:uv_26.13_0-1: abhūt pūrve tato nābhūn nābhūt pūrve tato hy abhūt /na cābhūn na bhaviṣyati na vāpy etarhi vidyate //
26.13.uv-kg26#559: sṅon chad byuṅ ba mi ’byuṅ źiṅ || ma byuṅ ba dag ’byuṅ bar ’gyur || ma byuṅ ’byuṅ bar mi ’gyur la || da ltar byuṅ ba’aṅ yod ma yin ||

26.14.S10udanav_u:uv_26.14_0-1: durdṛśaṁ satyam acalaṁ sudṛśaṁ pratividhyataḥ /tṛṣṇākṣayaṁ paśyato hi duḥkhasyānto nirucyate //
26.14.uv-kg26#560: blta dka’ mtha’ med der mi mthoṅ || bden pa rab rtogs śes pa daṅ || sred daṅ dga’ ba med mthoṅ ba || ’di ’dra ’di ni sdug bsṅal mtha’ ||

26.15.S10udanav_u:uv_26.15_0-1: chitvā tṛṣṇāṁ praśāmyeha rajaḥ sarvaṁ samāhitaḥ / viśoṣayitvā saritāṁ duḥkhasyānto nirucyate //
26.15.uv-kg26#561: sred pa rnams ni bcad pa daṅ || ’dod chags rab tu spaṅs pa daṅ || mtsho bskams nas ni mi ’bab pa || ’di ’dra ’di ni sdug bsṅal mtha’ ||

26.16.S10udanav_u:uv_26.16_0-1: bhitvā kāyaṁ ca saṁjñāṁ ca vedanāṁ vyupaśāmya ca / vijñānāstagamaṁ labdhvā duḥkhasyānto nirucyate //
26.16.uv-kg26#562: lus źig tshor ba bsil bar gyur || ’du śes ’gags śiṅ ’du byed źi || rnam par śes pa nub gyur pa || ’di ’dra ’di ni sdug bsṅal mtha’ ||

26.17.S10udanav_u:uv_26.17_0-1: dṛṣṭe tu dṛṣṭamātreṇa śrute ca śrutamātratā / mate tathaiva vijñāte duḥkhasyānto nirucyate //
26.17.uv-kg26#563: lta bas mthoṅ bar gyur tsam daṅ || ñan pas thos par gyur pa tsam || rtogs par byed pas rtogs tsam daṅ || rnam par śes pas rnam śes tsam || ’di ’dra ’di ni sdug bsṅal mtha’ || ’di daṅ ma daṅ gduṅs rab gduṅs ||

26.19.S10udanav_u:uv_26.19_0-1: māśā tuṣā saṁśamā ca sarvatra viraḍī tathā / sarvasmād viratiḥ pāpād duḥkhasyānto nirucyate //
26.19.uv-kg26#564: ’di ’dra ’di ni sdug bsṅal mtha’ || ma re ma dga’ rab źi daṅ || kun du ’dod chags bral gyur pa || ’di ’dra ’di ni sdug bsṅal mtha’ || (rten pa yod pas spyod par ’gyur ro || spyod pa yod pas gźol bar ’gyur ro || gźol ba yod pas śin tu ma sbyaṅs bar ’gyur ro || śin tu ma sbyaṅs pa yod pas ’gro ba daṅ ’oṅ bar ’gyur ro || ’gro ba daṅ ’oṅ ba yod pas gźan du śi ’pho len par ’gyur ro || gźan du śi ’pho blaṅs pas ’di ltar gźan du skye ba daṅ | rga ba daṅ | na ba daṅ | ’chi ba daṅ | mya ṅan daṅ smre sṅags ’don pa daṅ | sdug bsṅal ba daṅ | yid mi bde ba daṅ | ’khrug pa ’byuṅ źiṅ ’di ltar sdug bsṅal gyi phuṅ po chen po ’ba’ źig po ’di ’byuṅ bar ’gyur ro ||)

26.2.S10udanav_u:uv_26.20_0-1: aniḥśritasyācalitaṁ prasrabdhiś ceha vidyate / na gatir na cyutiś caiva duḥkhasyānto nirucyate //
26.2.uv-kg26#565: rten pa med pas spyod pa med par ’gyur ro || spyod pa med pas gźol bar mi ’gyur ro || gźol bar ma gyur pas śin tu sbyaṅs par ’gyur ro || śin tu sbyaṅs pas ’gro ba daṅ ’oṅ bar mi ’gyur ro || (’gro ba daṅ ’oṅ ba med pas gźan du ’chi ’pho len pa med par ’gyur ro || gźan du ’chi ’pho len pa med pas ’di ltar gźan du skye ba daṅ || rga ba daṅ | na ba daṅ | ’chi ba daṅ | mya ṅan daṅ | smre sṅags ’don pa daṅ | sdug bsṅal ba daṅ || yid mi bde ba daṅ | ’khrug pa rnams ’gag par ’gyur źiṅ | ’di ltar sdug bsṅal gyi phuṅ po chen po ’ba’ źig po ’di ’gag par ’gyur ro ||)

26.22.S10udanav_u:uv_26.22_0-1: jātaṁ bhūtaṁ samutpannaṁ kṛtaṁ saṁskṛtam adhruvam / jarāmaraṇasaṁghātaṁ moṣadharmapralopanam /āhāranetrīprabhavaṁ nālaṁ tad abhinanditum //
26.22.uv-kg26#569: skyes daṅ byuṅ daṅ ’byuṅ ba daṅ || bcos daṅ dus byas mi brtan źiṅ || rga daṅ ’chi daṅ rmoṅs pa yi || chos can rab tu ’jig ’gyur ba || zas kyi rgyud las byuṅ ba yi || ’jig ’gyur ’di la dga’ mi bya ||

26.23.S10udanav_u:uv_26.23_0-1: tasya niḥsaraṇaṁ śāntam atarkāvacaraṁ padam / nirodho duḥkhadharmāṇāṁ saṁskāropaśamaṁ sukham //
26.23.uv-kg26#570: de yi ṅes par ’byuṅ ba’i gźi || rtog daṅ dpyod daṅ źi ba daṅ || sdug bsṅal chos rnams ’gags pa ste || ’du byed ñe bar źi ba bde ||

26.25.S10udanav_u:uv_26.25_0-1: naivāgatir na ca gatir nopapattiś cyutir na ca / apratiṣṭham anālambaṁ duḥkhāntaḥ sa nirucyate //
26.25.uv-kg26#573: dge sloṅ dag de la ’gro ba daṅ ’oṅ ba yod par ṅa mi smra ste | gnas par ma yin no || ’chi ’pho yod par ṅa mi smra ste | skye bar ma yin | ’adilta bu ’di ni sdug bsṅal gyi mtha’ yin no ||

26.28.S10udanav_u:uv_26.28_0-1: niṣṭhāgato hy asaṁtrāsī na vikanthī na kaukṛtiḥ / ācchettā bhavaśalyānām antimo 'sya samucchrayaḥ //
26.28.uv-kg26#576: mthar phyin ’jigs pa med pa ste || rlom med ’gyod pa med pa yin || srid pa’i zug rṅu gtubs pa ste || lus kyi tha mar gyur pa yin ||

26.29.S10udanav_u:uv_26.29_0-1: eṣā hi paramā niṣṭhā śāntaṁ padam anuttaram / kṣayaḥ sarvanimittānāṁ pradānapadam acyutam //
26.29.uv-kg26#577: ’di ni mthar phyin rnams kyi mchog || źi ba’i go ’phaṅ bla med pa || mtshan ma thams cad zad pa ste || byaṅ grol go ’phaṅ ’chi med yin ||

26.3.S10udanav_u:uv_26.30_0-1: tulyam atulyaṁ ca saṁbhavaṁ bhavasaṁskāram avāsṛjan muniḥ / ādhyātmarataḥ samāhito hy abhinat kośam ivāṇḍasaṁbhavam //
26.3.uv-kg26#578: mtshuṅs daṅ mi mtshuṅs ’byuṅ ba yi || ’du byed thub pas rab tu spaṅs || naṅ du mñam bźag dga’ ba yis || sgo ṅa’i sbubs ni dral nas byuṅ ||

26.31.S10udanav_u:uv_26.31_0-1: jayate dānaṁ dharmadānaṁ ca sarvaṁ jayate ratiṁ dharmaratiṁś ca sarvām / jayate balaṁ kṣāntibalaṁ ca sarvaṁ jayate sukhaṁ sarvaṭṛṣānirodhaḥ // [i] sarvaṁ dānaṁ dharmadānaṁ jināti sarvāṁ ratiṁ dharmaratiṁ jināti / sarvaṁ balaṁ kṣāntibalaṁ jināti tṛṣṇākṣayaḥ sarvasukhaṁ jināti // [ii]
26.31.uv-kg26#579: sbyin kun chos kyi sbyin pas thub || dga’ kun chos kyi dga’ bas thub || stobs kun bzod pa’i stobs kyis thub || bde kun sred pa zad pas thub ||

27.01.S10udanav_u:uv_27.1_0-1: supaśyaṁ paravadyaṁ syād ātmavadyaṁ tu durdṛśam / paraḥ parasya vadyāni tūtpunāti busaṁ yathā / ātmanaś chādayaty eṣa kṛtvā yadvat kaliṁ śaṭhaḥ //
27.01.uv-kg27#580: || bdag las gźan pa’i skyon dag ni || phub ma gtor ba ji bźin du || gźan gyi skyon mthoṅ sla ba ste || raṅ gi skyon ni mthoṅ bar dka’ || g-yo can cho lo ’jo ba ltar || raṅ gi de ni sbed pa daṅ ||

27.02.S10udanav_u:uv_27.2_0-1: paravadyānudarśino nityāvadhyānasaṁjñinaḥ / vāmā dharmāḥ pravardhante sa hy ārād dharmadarśanāt //
27.02.uv-kg27#581: gźan gyi skyon la lta byed ciṅ || rtag tu ’phyas laṅ ’du śes can || de yis riṅ du chos mi mthoṅ || g-yon phyogs chos ni rab tu ’phel ||

27.03.S10udanav_u:uv_27.3_0-1: ahrīkena sujīvaṁ syāt kākaśūreṇa dhvāṅkṣiṇā / praskandinā pragalbhena saṁkliṣṭaṁ tv iha jīvate //
27.03.uv-kg27#582: spyi rdol byed ciṅ ’phrog rlom can || mi gtsaṅ las ldan khwa lta bur || śin tu ñon moṅs ’tsho ba can || ṅo tsha med pa’i ’tsho ba sla ||

27.04.S10udanav_u:uv_27.4_0-1: hrīmatā tv iha durjīvaṁ nityaṁ śucigaveṣiṇā / sulīnenāpragalbhena śuddhājīvena paśyatā //
27.04.uv-kg27#583: rtag tu gtsag ma tshol ba daṅ || thub chod mi byed ’dzem bag can || ’tsho bdag pa lta ba yi || ṅo tsha śes pa’i ’tsho ba dka’ ||

27.05.S10udanav_u:uv_27.5_0-1: andhabhūto hy ayaṁ lokas tanuko 'tra vipaśyakaḥ / śakunto jālamuktaiva hy alpaṁ svargeṣu modate //
27.05.uv-kg27#584: ’jig rten mun par gyur ’di ste || de las lhag mthoṅ ldan pa ñuṅ || rgya las śor ba’i bya lta bur || mtho ris la dga’ śas tsam źig ||

27.07.S10udanav_u:uv_27.7_0-1: ahaṁkārasṛtā martyāḥ parakāropasaṁhitāḥ / etad eke na jānanti paśyanti na hi śalyataḥ //
27.07.uv-kg27#586: bdag gis skye dgu ’di phyuṅ źiṅ || gźan gyis byas so sñam sems pa || bden ba min la bden lta bas || ci yaṅ mthog bar mi ’gyur ro || de ni ’gas kyaṅ mi mthoṅ źiṅ || zug rṅu mthoṅ bar mi ’gyur ro ||

27.08.S10udanav_u:uv_27.8_0-1: etat tu śalyaṁ pratiyatya paśyato hy adhyavasitā yatra prajāḥ prasaktāḥ / ahaṁ karomīti na tasya hiṁsyāt paraḥ karotīti na tasya hiṁsyāt //
27.08.uv-kg27#587: yul sred gaṅ la skye bo chags pa yi || zug rṅu de dag sṅon chad mthoṅ ba dag || de ni bdag gis byas sñam mi ’dzin ciṅ || de ni gźan gyis byas sñam mi ’dzin to ||

27.09.S10udanav_u:uv_27.9_0-1: mānopeto hy ayaṁ loko mānasaktaḥ sadā sthitaḥ / dṛṣṭibhiś caiva saṁrabdhaḥ saṁsāraṁ nātivartate //
27.09.uv-kg27#588: skye dgu ’di dag ṅa rgyal ldan || ṅa rgyal la chags ṅa rgyal bciṅs || rtsod par gyur pa’i lta ba can || ’khor ba ldog par mi ’gyur ro ||

27.1.S10udanav_u:uv_27.10_0-1: yat prāptaṁ yac ca prāptavyaṁ rajaḥkīrṇam idaṁ dvayam / āturyam iti taṁ jñātvā jahyād vidvāṁ samāhitaḥ //
27.1.uv-kg27#589: thob par gyur pa gaṅ yin daṅ || thob par bya ba gaṅ yin pa || de dag gñi ga rdul gyis yog || rjes su nad pa slob par byed ||

27.11.S10udanav_u:uv_27.11_0-1: śikṣāsārāś ca ye satvā jīvino brahmajīvinaḥ /upasthānarataye ca sa eko 'ntaḥ prakīrtitaḥ //
27.11.uv-kg27#590: gaṅ źig tshul khrims daṅ | bslab pa daṅ | brtul źugs daṅ | tshaṅs par spyod pa daṅ | dka’ thub daṅ | ñe bar gnas pa sñiṅ por byed pa de ni mtha’ gcig go ||

27.12.S10udanav_u:uv_27.12_0-1: bhoktavyāḥ śucayaḥ kāmā na doṣas teṣu vidyate / ya evaṁ darśino bālā dvitīyo 'ntaḥ prakīrtitaḥ //
