27.12.uv-kg27#591: gaṅ źig de ltar lta źiṅ ’di skad ces ’dod pa ni gtsaṅ ba’o || ’dod pa ni bsod ñams can no || ’dod pa ni loṅs spyad par bya ba’o || ’dod pa ni skyon med pa yin no źes smra źiṅ de dag lhag par ’dod pa rnams su lhuṅ bar byed pa’i brtul źugs len pa ’di yaṅ mtha’ gcig go ||

27.13.S10udanav_u:uv_27.13_0-1: etāv antāv anajñāya tv atilīyanti bāliśaḥ / apare tv atidhāvanti cakṣuṣmāṁs tāṁ prapaśyati //
27.13.uv-kg27#592: mtha’ gñis po ’di dag ni dur khrod ’phel bar byed pa ste | ’di dag gis dur khrod ’phel bar byas so || mtha’ gñis po ’di dag ma mthoṅ ba kha cig źen par byed ciṅ | kha cig mṅon par rgyur par byed pa || de dag lhag par źen par byed ciṅ lhag par rgyug par byed pa dag mig daṅ ldan pas mthoṅ ṅo ||

27.14.S10udanav_u:uv_27.14_0-1: etāv antau viditvā tu nābhavaṁs tatra ye budhāḥ / na caiva tena manyante vartmas teṣāṁ na vidyate //
27.14.uv-kg27#593: mtha’ gñis po ’di dag mthoṅ ba na źen par mi byed rgyur par mi byed la | de dag lhag par źen par mi byed ciṅ lhag par rgyug par rgyug par mi byed pa yaṅ mig daṅ ldan pas mthoṅ ṅo || de dag de ltar mi byed ciṅ de dag de ltar mi sems na | de dag gi lam du mi gdags pa ’di lta ste ’di ni sdug bsṅal gyi mtha’ yin no ||

27.15.S10udanav_u:uv_27.15_0-1: yathā budbudikāṁ paśyed yathā paśyen marīcikām / evaṁ lokam avekṣaṁ vai mṛtyurājaṁ na paśyati //
27.15.uv-kg27#594: ji ltar chu bur mthoṅ ba daṅ || ji ltar smig rgyu mthoṅ ba ltar || de bźin ’jig rten lta byed pa || ’chi bdag rgyal pos mthoṅ mi ’gyur ||

27.16.S10udanav_u:uv_27.16_0-1: yathā budbudikāṁ paśyed yathā paśyen marīcikām / evaṁ kāyam avekṣaṁ vai mṛtyurājaṁ na paśyati //
27.16.uv-kg27#595: ji ltar chu bur mthoṅ ba daṅ || ji ltar smig rgyu mthoṅ ba ltar || de bźin lus la lta byed pa || ’chi bdag rgyal pos mthoṅ mi ’gyur ||

27.17.S10udanav_u:uv_27.17_0-1: paśyatemaṁ sadā kāyaṁ citraṁ rājarathopamam / yatra bālāḥ pramuhyante saṅgo nāsti prajānatām //
27.17.uv-kg27#596: gaṅ la byis pa mṅon chags pa || de la mkhas pa chags mi ’gyur || rgyal po’i śiṅ rta bkra ba ltar || lus ’di rtag tu blta bar gyis ||

27.18.S10udanav_u:uv_27.18_0-1: paśyatemaṁ sadā kāyaṁ citraṁ rājarathopamam / yatra bālā viṣīdanti yathā paṅke jaradgavaḥ //
27.18.uv-kg27#598: gaṅ du byis pa ñams gyur pa || glaṅ rgan rdzab tu chud pa bźin || rgyal po śiṅ rta bkra ba ltar || lus ’di rtag tu blta bar gyis ||

27.19.S10udanav_u:uv_27.19_0-1: paśyatemaṁ sadā kāyaṁ citraṁ rājarathopamam / yatra bālāḥ pramuhyante paṇḍito 'tra virajyate //
27.19.uv-kg27#597: gaṅ la byis pa rmoṅs ’gyur ba || de la mkhas pa rmoṅs mi ’gyur || rgyal po’i śiṅ rta bkra ba ltar || lus ’di rtag tu blta bar gyis ||

27.2.S10udanav_u:uv_27.20_0-1: paśya citrakṛtaṁ bimbam arukaṁ kāyasaṁjñitam / āturaṁ moṣasaṁkalpaṁ yasya nāsti dhruvasthitiḥ //
27.2.uv-kg27#599: nad pa lta bur ’jig chos can|| rma byuṅ ba daṅ ’dra ba ste || gaṅ yaṅ brtan par mi gnas pa || lus ’di rtag tu blta bar gyis ||

27.21.S10udanav_u:uv_27.21_0-1: paśya citrakṛtaṁ bimbaṁ maṇibhiḥ kuṇḍalais tathā / alaṁ bālasya mohāya na tu pāragaveṣiṇām //
27.21.uv-kg27#600: nad pa ’jig pa’i chos can ltar || gaṅ yaṅ brtan par mi gnas par || nor bu’i rna cha gdub ’khor gyis || brgyan pa’i lus la blta bar gyis ||

27.22.uv27#27.22A: gandhena gātrām anuliptaḥ pādau gairikarañjitau / alaṁ bālasya mohāya na tu pāragaveṣiṇām //
27.22.uv-kg27#603: lus ni dri źim gyis bskus nas || rkaṅ pa btsag gis byugs pa dag || byis pa lhag par rmoṅs byed kyaṅ || pha rol tshol bar mi byed do ||

27.23.S10udanav_u:uv_27.23_0-1: aṣṭāpadīkṛtāḥ keśā netre cāñjanarañjite / alaṁ bālasya mohāya na tu pāragaveṣiṇām //
27.23.uv-kg27#601: skra ni lan bu brgyad byas śiṅ || mig sman gyis ni bskus pa’i mig || byis pa lhag par rmoṅs byed kyaṅ || pha rol tshol bar mi byed do ||

27.25.S10udanav_u:uv_27.25_0-1: añjanīva navā citrā pūtikāyo hy alaṁkṛtaḥ / alaṁ bālasya mohāya na tu pāragaveṣiṇām //
27.25.uv-kg27#602: mig sman gyis ni gsar bris śiṅ || rnag can lus ni brgyan pa yis || byis pa lhag par rmoṅs byed kyaṅ || pha rol tshol bar mi byed do ||

27.27.S10udanav_u:uv_27.27_0-1: kāmeṣu saktāḥ satataṁ hi mūḍhāḥ saṁyojane vadyam apaśyamānāḥ / na jātu saṁyojanasaṅgasaktā hy oghaṁ tareyur vipulaṁ mahāntam //
27.27.uv-kg27#604: gaṅ źig ’dod par kun sbyor ’brel chags śiṅ || kun du sbyor ba’i skyon rnams ma mthoṅ ba || ’dod par ’brel la chags pa’i mi de yis || chu bo mtha’ yas yaṅs pa rgal mi ’gyur ||

27.28.S10udanav_u:uv_27.28_0-1: ūrdhvaṁ cādhaḥ sarvato vītarāgo hy ayam aham asmīti ca nānupaśyan / evaṁ vimukto hi tared ihaugham atīrṇapūrvaṁ hy apunarbhavāya //
27.28.uv-kg27#605: chags bral mchog daṅ tha ma thams cad dag || ’di la bdag daṅ bdag gir mi lta źiṅ || de ltar rnam grol sṅon chad ma rgal ba’i || chu bo rab rgal yaṅ srid med par ’gyur ||

27.29.S10udanav_u:uv_27.29_0-1: yo nirvanagair vimokṣitaḥ saṁvanamukto vanam eva dhāvati / taṁ paśyatha pudgalaṁ tv imaṁ mukto bandhanam eva dhāvati //
27.29.uv-kg27#606: gaṅ źig tshal spaṅs tshal med pa || nags tshal spaṅs nas nags su rgyug || grol ba ’chiṅ bar gcen pa yin || gaṅ zag ’di la ltos śig tshur ||

27.3.S10udanav_u:uv_27.30_0-1: nelāṅgaḥ śvetasaṁchanna ekāro vartate rathaḥ / anighaṁ paśyatāyāntaṁ chinnayoktram abandhanam //
27.3.uv-kg27#607: śiṅ rta ’thun pa’i rtsibs ldan pa || yan lag yid ’oṅ gos dkar g-yogs || sdig med ’gro ba la ltos la || chiṅ ma’i rgyun rnams bcad par gyis ||

27.31.S10udanav_u:uv_27.31_0-1: bahavaḥ śaraṇaṁ yānti parvatāṁś ca vanāni ca / ārāmāṁ vṛkṣacaityāṁś ca manuṣyā bhayatarjitāḥ //
27.31.uv-kg27#608: ’jigs pas skrag pa’i ma dag ni || phal cer ri dag nags tshal daṅ || skyed mos tshal daṅ mchod gnas daṅ || ljon śiṅ rnams la skyabs su ’gro ||

27.32.S10udanav_u:uv_27.32_0-1: naitad dhi śaraṇaṁ kṣemaṁ naitac charaṇam uttamam / naitac charaṇam āgamya sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate //
27.32.uv-kg27#609: skyabs de gtso bo ma yin źiṅ || skyabs de mchog tu gyur pa min || de la skyabs su soṅ ba yis || sdug bsṅal kun la grol mi ’gyur ||

27.35.S10udanav_u:uv_27.35_0-1: etad dhi śaraṇaṁ kṣemam etac charaṇam uttamam / etac charaṇam āgamya sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate //
27.35.uv-kg27#612: de ni skyabs kyi mchog yin źiṅ || de ni skyabs kyi dam pa yin || de la skyabs su soṅ ba yis || sdug bsṅal kun las grol bar ’gyur ||

27.38.S10udanav_u:uv_27.38_0-1: anupaśyati cen na paśyati tv atha cet paśyati nānupaśyati / paśyann ayaṁ nānupaśyati tv anupaśyaṁs tu sadā na paśyati //
27.38.uv-kg27#614: ’dra ba mthoṅ bas mthoṅ mi ’gyur || gal te mthoṅ na ’dra mi mthoṅ || mthoṅ ’dis ’dra ba mi mthoṅ ste || ’dra mthoṅ mi yis mthoṅ ba med ||

27.39.S10udanav_u:uv_27.39_0-1: paśyaṁ nu kiṁ nānupaśyate kim apaśyaṁ nānupaśyate sadā / kasmiṁ sati hānupaśyanā kasmiṁ na sati nānupaśyanā //
27.39.uv-kg27#615: mi yis ci ma mthoṅ na ’dra ba mthoṅ || ci źig mthoṅ na ’dra ba mthoṅ mi ’gyur || ji ltar ’di na ’dra ba mthoṅ ba dag || gaṅ źig med na ’dra bar mthoṅ daṅ bral ||

27.4.S10udanav_u:uv_27.40_0-1: duḥkhaṁ yad ayaṁ na paśyati tad apaśyann ātmeti paśyati / duḥkhaṁ tu yathā tathā prapaśyann ayam ātmeti sadānupaśyati //
27.4.uv-kg27#616: gaṅ tshe ’di yis sdug bsṅal ma mthoṅ ba || de yi tshe na bdag tu mthoṅ bar ’gyur || ji lta ji ltar sdug bsṅal rtogs gyur pa || des ni bdag ’di ’dra ba mthoṅ mi ’gyur ||

27.41.S10udanav_u:uv_27.41_0-1: yenāvṛtaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ saṁskārāṁ duḥkhaṁ na paśyati / tasmiṁ sati hānupaśyanā vigate 'smiṁ vigatānupaśyanā //
27.41.uv-kg27#617: gaṅ gis so so’i skye bsgribs na || ’du byed sdug bsṅal ma mthoṅ ba || de phyir ’di na ’dra mthoṅ ste || de med ’dra ba mi mthoṅ ṅo ||

28.01.uv-kg28#618: || sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste || dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya || raṅ gi sems ni yoṅs su gdul || ’di ni saṅs rgyas bstan pa yin ||

28.02.S10udanav_u:uv_28.2_0-1: dadataḥ puṇyaṁ pravardhate vairaṁ na kriyate ca saṁyamāt / kuśalī prajahāti pāpakaṁ rāgadoṣamohakṣayāt tu nirvṛtiḥ //
28.02.uv-kg28#619: sbyin pas bsod nams rab tu ’phel || legs bsdams dgra sogs mi ’gyur ro || dge daṅ ldan pas sdig pa spoṅ || ñon moṅs zad pas mya ṅan ’da’ ||

28.03.S10udanav_u:uv_28.3_0-1: sārdhaṁ carann ekakaḥ sadā miśro hy anyajanena vedakaḥ kuśalī prajahāti pāpakaṁ krauñcaḥ kṣīrapako yathodakam //
28.03.uv-kg28#620: mkhas daṅ ’dre daṅ byis pa’i skye bo daṅ || lhan cig spyod daṅ gcig pu gnas kyaṅ ruṅ || ṅaṅ pas chu la ’o ma ’thuṅ ba ltar || mkhas pas sdig ba can rnams rab tu spaṅ ||

28.04.S10udanav_u:uv_28.4_0-1: dṛṣṭvā hy ādīnavaṁ loke jñātvā dharmaniraupadhim / āryo na ramate pāpe pāpo na ramate śubhe //
28.04.uv-kg28#621: ’jig rten ñes dmigs mthoṅ ba daṅ || ’gog par ’gyur ba’i chos mthoṅ bas || ’phags pa sdig la dga’ mi byed || sdig can dge la dga’ mi ’gyur ||

28.05.S10udanav_u:uv_28.5_0-1: pravivekarasaṁ jñātvā rasaṁ copaśamasya vai / nirjvaro bhavati niṣpāpo dharmaprītirasaṁ piban //
28.05.uv-kg28#622: legs par ñer źi’i ro daṅ ni || rab tu dben pa’i ro śes pa || rims nad med ciṅ sdig med la || chos la dga’ ba’i ro dag ’thuṅ ||

28.06.S10udanav_u:uv_28.6_0-1: anavasrutacittasya tv anunnahanacetasaḥ / puṇyapāpaprahīṇasya nāsti durgatito bhayam //
28.06.uv-kg28#623: sems kyi zag pa med pa daṅ || sems ni ’chiṅ bas ma bcom la || dge daṅ sdig pa rab spaṅs pa || ṅan ’gro rnams kyis ’jigs pa med ||

28.07.S10udanav_u:uv_28.7_0-1: niṣeddhāraṁ pravaktāraṁ yaj jāned vadyadarśinam / nigṛhyavādinaṁ dhīraṁ tādṛśaṁ satataṁ bhajet / tādṛśaṁ bhajamānasya śreyo bhavati na pāpakam //
28.07.uv-kg28#624: gnas min zlog daṅ legs smra daṅ || ñes dmigs ston par byed pa daṅ || mkhas pas tshar gcod smra byed pa || de lta’i skye dgu bsten par bya || de lta bu dag bsten byas na || sdig par mi ’gyur legs par ’gyur ||

28.08.S10udanav_u:uv_28.8_0-1: upaśānto hy uparato mandabhāṣī hy anuddhataḥ / dhunāti pāpakāṁ dharmāṁ drumapatraṁ yathānilaḥ //
28.08.uv-kg28#625: ñe bar źi źiṅ rab źi la || dal bus smra źiṅ kheṅs med pa || sdig pa’i chos rnams sprug byed de || rluṅ gis ljon śiṅ lo ma bźin ||

28.09.S10udanav_u:uv_28.9_0-1: yo hy apraduṣṭasya narasya duṣyate śuddhasya nityaṁ vigatāṅgaṇasya / tam eva bālaṁ pratiyāti pāpaṁ kṣiptaṁ rajaḥ prativātaṁ yathaiva //
28.09.uv-kg28#626: gaṅ źiṅ skyes bu dag ciṅ ñon moṅs med || rab tu sdaṅ med mi la khro byed pa’i || byis pa de la sdig pa phyir ’gog ste || rdzi rdzogs su ni rdul rnams gtor ba bźin ||

28.1.S10udanav_u:uv_28.10_0-1: yad yat karoti puruṣas tat tat paśyati hātmanaḥ /kalyāṇakārī kalyāṇaṁ pāpakārī ca pāpakam //
28.1.uv-kg28#627: dge ba byed pas dge ba daṅ || sdig pa byed pas sdig pa ste || mi yis gaṅ daṅ gaṅ byas pa || de de raṅ gis mthoṅ bar ’gyur ||

28.13.S10udanav_u:uv_28.13_0-1: cakṣuṣmāṁ viṣamānīva vidyamāne parākramet / paṇḍito jīvaloke 'smiṁ pāpāni parivarjayet //
28.13.uv-kg28#630: mig ldan ’gro bar byed pa yis || ñam ṅa’i lam dag ji lta bar || mkhas pas ’tsho ba’i ’jig rten ’di || sdig pa dag ni yoṅs su spaṅ ||

28.14.S10udanav_u:uv_28.14_0-1: vaṇig vā sabhayaṁ mārgam alpaśāstro mahādhano / viṣaṁ jīvitakāmo vā pāpāni parivarjayet //
28.14.uv-kg28#631: nor chen gyis ni grogs ñuṅ daṅ || tshoṅ pas ’jigs bcas lam daṅ ni || gson par ’dod pas dug lta bur || mkhas pa sdig can yoṅs su spaṅ ||

28.15.S10udanav_u:uv_28.15_0-1: pāṇau cāsya vraṇo na syād dhārayet pāṇinā viṣam /nāvraṇe krāmati viṣaṁ nāsti pāpam akurvataḥ //
28.15.uv-kg28#632: gal te lag mthil rma med na || lag pas dug ni bzuṅ byas kyaṅ || rma med dug ni mi ’dzin ltar || ma byas pa la sdig pa med ||

28.16.S10udanav_u:uv_28.16_0-1: sukarāṇi hy asādhūni svātmano hy ahitāni ca / yad vai hitaṁ ca pathyaṁ ca tad vai paramaduṣkaram //
28.16.uv-kg28#633: bdag la mi phan bya ba daṅ || legs pa ma yin bya bar sla || gaṅ dag phan źiṅ bder ’gyur ba || de ni mchog tu bya bar dka’ ||

28.17.S10udanav_u:uv_28.17_0-1: sukaraṁ sādhunā sādhu sādhu pāpena duṣkaram /pāpaṁ pāpena sukaraṁ pāpam āryeṇa duṣkaram //
28.17.uv-kg28#634: dam pas legs pa bya sla yi || dam pas sdig pa bya bar dga’ || ṅan pas sdig pa bya sla yi|| ’phags pas sdig pa bya bar dka’ ||

28.18.S10udanav_u:uv_28.18_0-1: madhuvad manyate bālo yāvat pāpaṁ na pacyate / yadā tu pacyate pāpam atha duḥkhaṁ nigacchati //
28.18.uv-kg28#635: ji srid sdig pa ma smin pa || de srid byis pa mṅar bar sems || gaṅ tshi sdig pa smin gyur pa || de tshe de ni tsha bar sems ||

28.19.S10udanav_u:uv_28.19_0-1: pāpo 'pi paśyate bhadraṁ yāvat pāpaṁ na pacyate / yadā tu pacyate pāpam atha pāpāni paśyati //
28.19.uv-kg28#636: ji srid sdig pa ma smin pa || de srid sdig pa ruṅ bar lta || gaṅ tshe sdig pa smin gyur pa || de tshe sdig pa mthoṅ bar ’gyur ||

28.2.S10udanav_u:uv_28.20_0-1: bhadro 'pi paśyate pāpaṁ yāvad bhadraṁ na pacyate / yadā tu pacyate bhadram atha bhadrāṇi paśyati //
28.2.uv-kg28#637: ji srid bzaṅ po ma smin pa || de srid bzaṅ po sdig par mthoṅ || gaṅ tshe bzaṅ po smin gyur pa || de tshe bzaṅ por mthoṅ bar ’gyur ||

28.21.S10udanav_u:uv_28.21_0-1: kuryāc cet puruṣaḥ pāpaṁ nainaṁ kuryāt punaḥ punaḥ /na tatra cchandraṁ kurvīta duḥkhaṁ pāpasya saṁcayaḥ //
28.21.uv-kg28#638: sdig pa sdug bsṅal sogs pas na || de la dga’ bar mi bya’o || brgya la sdig pa byas na yaṅ || yaṅ daṅ yaṅ du de mi bya ||

28.22.S10udanav_u:uv_28.22_0-1: kuryāc cet puruṣaḥ puṇyaṁ kuryāc cainaṁ punaḥ punaḥ / tatra cchandraṁ ca kurvīta sukhaṁ puṇyasya saṁcayaḥ //
28.22.uv-kg28#639: bsod namasabade ba sogs pas na || de ñid la ni dga’ bar bya || gal te bsod nams byas na yaṅ || de ni yaṅ daṅ yaṅ du bya ||

28.23.S10udanav_u:uv_28.23_0-1: abhitvareta kalyāṇe pāpāc cittaṁ nivārayet / dhandhaṁ hi kurvataḥ puṇyaṁ pāpeṣu ramate manaḥ //
28.23.uv-kg28#640: sdig la yid ni mṅon dga’ ba || bsod nams dal bus byed ’gyur bas || sdig pa lasani sems bzlog ciṅ || bsod nams mṅon par smyur te bya ||

28.24.S10udanav_u:uv_28.24_0-1: alpakaṁ pi kṛtaṁ pāpaṁ duḥkhāya parataḥ sadā / mahate bhavaty anarthāya viṣaṁ koṣṭhagataṁ yathā //
28.24.uv-kg28#641: sdig pa chuṅ du byas pas kyaṅ || ’jig rten pha rol ’jig chen daṅ || phuṅ khrol chen po byed ’gyur te || khoṅ par soṅ ba’i dug bźin no ||

28.25.S10udanav_u:uv_28.25_0-1: alpakaṁ pi kṛtaṁ puṇyaṁ paraloke sukhāvaham / arthāya mahate nityaṁ sasyānām iva saṁcayaḥ //
28.25.uv-kg28#642: bsod nams chuṅ ṅu byas pas kyaṅ || ’jig rten pha rol badebara ’dren || don chen dag kyaṅ byed ’gyur te || ’bru rnams phun sum ’byor pa bźin ||

28.26.S10udanav_u:uv_28.26_0-1: adaṇḍeṣu hi daṇḍena yo 'praduṣṭeṣu duṣyate /daśānām anyatamaṁ sthānaṁ kṣipram eva nigacchati //
28.26.uv-kg28#643: gaṅ źig ñes med chad pas gcod || sdaṅ ba min la rab sdaṅ ba || gnas gźan gaṅ yaṅ ruṅ ba bcu || myur du thob pa kho nar ’gyur ||

28.27.S10udanav_u:uv_28.27_0-1: jñātīnāṁ vā vinābhāvaṁ bhogānāṁ vā parikṣayam / rājato hy upasargaṁ vāpy abhyākhyānaṁ ca dāruṇam //
28.27.uv-kg28#645: gñen ’dun rnams daṅ bral ba’am || loṅs spyod zad par ’gyur ba’am || rgyal po’i gnod pa ’byuṅ ba’am || mi sñan śin tu mi bzad dam ||

28.28.S10udanav_u:uv_28.28_0-1: vedanāṁ kaṭukāṁ vāpi śarīrasya ca bhedanam /ābādhaṁ vāpi paruṣaṁ cittakṣepam athāpi vā //
28.28.uv-kg28#644: tshor ba mi bzad pa dag gam || yaṅ na lus ni ’dral ba’am || gnod pa’i tshor ba tsha ba’aṅ ruṅ || yaṅ na sems ’khrugs thob par ’gyur ||

28.29.S10udanav_u:uv_28.29_0-1: atha vāsyāpy agārāṇi hy agnir dahati sarvathā / bhedāt kāyasya cāprājño daśamāṁ durgatiṁ vrajet //
28.29.uv-kg28#646: yaṅ na khyim ni mi chen pos || ṅes par sreg par byed par ’gyur || śes rab ’chal ba lus źig nas || bcu pa ṅan ’gror ’gro bar ’gyur ||

28.3.S10udanav_u:uv_28.30_0-1: pāpe tu kṛte hi nāśvasec cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi nāśvaset / rahasi ca kṛte 'pi nāśvased asti tasya vipāka iti nāśvaset //
28.3.uv-kg28#647: sdig pa byas pas bag dbab mi bya ste || riṅ byas rgyaṅ mar byas kyaṅ bag mi dbab || dben par byas kyaṅ bag dbab mi bya ste || de yi rnam snin yod pas bag mi dbab ||

28.31.S10udanav_u:uv_28.31_0-1: puṇye tu kṛte hi ihāśvasec cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi cāśvaset / rahasi ca kṛte 'pi cāśvased asti tasya vipāka iti cāśvaset //
28.31.uv-kg28#648: bsod nams byas pas bag ni dbab bya ste || riṅ byas rgyaṅ riṅ byas kyaṅ bdag dbab ciṅ || dben par byas kyaṅ bag ni dbab par bya || de yi rnam smin yod pas bagt dbab bo ||

28.32.S10udanav_u:uv_28.32_0-1: pāpe tu kṛte hi śocate cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi śocate / rahasi ca kṛte 'pi śocate asti tasya vipāka iti śocate //
28.32.uv-kg28#649: bdag gis sdig pa byas pas mya ṅan byed || riṅ daṅ rgyaṅ riṅ byas pas mya ṅan byed || bdag gis dben par byas pas mya ṅan byed || de yi rnam smin yo pas mya ṅan byed ||

28.33.S10udanav_u:uv_28.33_0-1: puṇye tu kṛte hi nandate cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi nandate / rahasi ca kṛte 'pi nandate asti tasya vipāka iti nandate //
28.33.uv-kg28#651: bdag gis bsod nams byas pas dga’ bar ’gyur || riṅ daṅ rgyaṅ riṅ byas pas dga’ bar ’gyur || bdag gis dben par byas pas dga’ bar ’gyur || de yi rnam smin yod pas dga’ bar ’gyur ||

28.34.S10udanav_u:uv_28.34_0-1: iha śocati pretya śocati pāpakarmā hy ubhayatra śocati / sa hi śocati sa praśocati dṛṣṭvā karma hi kliṣṭam ātmanaḥ //
28.34.uv-kg28#650: bdag ñid nag po’i las daṅ ldan mthoṅ nas || ’dir yaṅ mya ṅan gźan du’aṅ mya ṅan byed || sdig pa byas pas gñi gar mya ṅan byed || de ni mya ṅan de rab mu ṅan byed ||

28.35.S10udanav_u:uv_28.35_0-1: iha nandati pretya nandati kṛtapuṇyo hy ubhayatra nandati / sa hi nandati sa pramodate dṛṣṭvā karma hi viśuddham ātmanaḥ //
28.35.uv-kg28#652: bdag ñid rnam dag las daṅ ldan mthoṅ nas|| ’di na dga’ ’gyur gźan du’aṅ dga’ bar ’gyur || bsod nams byas pas gñi bar dga’ ’gyur źiṅ || de ni dga’ ’gyur de rab dga’ bar ’gyur ||

28.36.S10udanav_u:uv_28.36_0-1: pāpe tu kṛte hi śocate cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi śocate / rahasi ca kṛte 'pi śocate bhūyaḥ śocati durgatiṁ gataḥ //
28.36.uv-kg28#653: bdag gis sdig pa byas pas gduṅ ’gyur źiṅ || riṅ byas rgyaṅ riṅ byas pas gduṅ bar ’gyur || bdag gis dben par byas pas gdud ’gyur źiṅ || de yi rnam smin yod pas gduṅ bar ’gyur ||

28.37.S10udanav_u:uv_28.37_0-1: puṇye tu kṛte hi nandate cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi nandate / rahasi ca kṛte 'pi nandate bhūyo nandati sadgatiṁ gataḥ //
28.37.uv-kg28#655: bdag gis bsod nams byas pas dga’ ’gyur źiṅ || riṅ byas rgyaṅ riṅ byas pas dga’ bar ’gyur || bdag gis bden par byas pas dga’ ’gyur źiṅ || de yi rnam smin yod pas dga’ bar ’gyur ||

28.39.S10udanav_u:uv_28.39_0-1: kṛte ca pāpe 'py akṛte ca puṇye 'dharmaṁ samādāya vihāya dharmam / bibheti mṛtyor iha pāpakarmā bhinnaplavo madhya ivodakasya //
28.39.uv-kg28#657: sdig pa byas śiṅ bsod nams ma byas la || chos daṅ gol źiṅ chos min thob pa’i mi|| sdig pa’i las can ’chi bas ’jigs ’gyur te || chu chen naṅ du gru ṅan źig pa bźin ||

28.4.S10udanav_u:uv_28.40_0-1: kṛtaṁ ca puṇyaṁ hy akṛtaṁ ca pāpaṁ satāṁ ca dharmaś caritaḥ purāṇaḥ / bibheti mṛtyor na kadaṁ cid eva yathaiva nāvā dṛḍhayā tarantaḥ //
28.4.uv-kg28#658: bsod nams byas śiṅ sdig pa ma byas la || dam pa rnams kyi sṅon gyi chos spyod pas || ṅa ni nams kyaṅ ’chi bas ’jigs med do || brtan pa’i gru yis pha rol ’gro pa bźin ||

29.01.S10udanav_u:uv_29.1_0-1: avabhāsati tāvat sa kṛmir yāvan nodayate divākaraḥ / vairocanĕ tūdgate bhṛśaṁ śvāvo bhavati na cāvabhāsate //
29.01.uv-kg29#659: || ji srid ñi ma ma śar ba || de srid srin bu me khyer snaṅ || ñi ma śar bar gyur pa na || snaṅ ba med ciṅ sṅon por ’gyur ||

29.02.S10udanav_u:uv_29.2_0-1: evaṁ bhāsitam āsi tārkitair yāvan nodayate tathāgataḥ /buddhapratibhāsite tu loke na tārkiko bhāsati nāsya śrāvakaḥ //
29.02.uv-kg29#660: ji srid de bźin gśegs ma śar || de srid rtog ge pa rnams snaṅ || ’jig rten rdzogs saṅs rgyas śar ba || rtog can ñan thos bcas mi snaṅ ||

29.03.S10udanav_u:uv_29.3_0-1: asāre sāramatayaḥ sāre cāsārasaṁjñinaḥ / te sāraṁ nādhigacchanti mithyāsaṁkalpagocarāḥ //
29.03.uv-kg29#661: gces min gces par blos ’dzin ciṅ || gces la gces pa min rtog pa || log par kun rtog spyod yul can || des ni gces pa thob mi ’gyur ||

29.04.S10udanav_u:uv_29.4_0-1: sāraṁ tu sārato jñātvā hy asāraṁ cāpy asārataḥ / te sāram adhigacchanti samyaksaṁkalpagocarāḥ //
29.04.uv-kg29#662: gces pa min la gces min daṅ || gces la gces par ’du śes pa || legs par kun rtog spyod yul can || des ni gces pa ’thob par ’gyur ||

29.05.S10udanav_u:uv_29.5_0-1: upātidhāvanti hi sārabuddhyā navaṁ navaṁ bandhanam ādadantaḥ / patanti hi dyotam ivāndhakārād dṛṣṭe śrute caiva niviṣṭacittāḥ //
29.05.uv-kg29#663: ’di na lta daṅ ñan la mṅon źen pa’i || chiṅs ma gsar daṅ gsar du ’phel ba dag || ’khor bar rgyug ciṅ ’gro daṅ sdod ’gyur te|| me naṅ lhuṅ ba’i phye ma leb daṅ ’dra ||

29.06.S10udanav_u:uv_29.6_0-1: kāṅkṣā hi yā syād iha vā pṛthag vā ihavedikā vā paravedikā vā / tāṁ dhyāyino viprajahanti sarvā hy ātāpino brahmacaryaṁ carantaḥ //
29.06.uv-kg29#664: ’di la myoṅ ’gyur gźan la myoṅ ’gyur ba’am || ’di na the tshom tha dad ji sñed pa || de dag tshaṅs par spyad spyod ’bad pa dag || sems par byed pas rab tu rnam par spoṅ ||

29.07.S10udanav_u:uv_29.7_0-1: aniṣkaṣāyaḥ kāṣāyaṁ yo vastraṁ paridhāsyati / apetadamasauratyo nāsau kāṣāyam arhati //
29.07.uv-kg29#665: gaṅ źig sñigs ma yod bźin du || ṅur smrig gos ni gyon byed pa || dul daṅ des pa med pa de || ṅur smrig gyon pa’i ’os ma yin ||

29.08.S10udanav_u:uv_29.8_0-1: yas tu vāntakaṣāyaḥ syāc chīleṣu susamāhitaḥ / upetadamasauratyaḥ sa vai kāṣāyam arhati //
29.08.uv-kg29#666: gaṅ źig sñigs ma rnams spaṅs nas || tshul khrims legs par mñam bźag pa || dul daṅ ṅes par ldan pa de || ṅur smrig gyon pa’i ’os yin no ||

29.09.S10udanav_u:uv_29.9_0-1: yasya doṣāḥ samucchinnās tālamastakavad dhatāḥ /sa vāntadoṣo medhāvī sādhurūpo nirucyate //
29.09.uv-kg29#668: gaṅ źig chos gsum de dag rnams || ta la’i mgo bo bźin bcad nas || blo ldan skyon ni bsal ba de || pho mchog yin par brjod par bya ||

29.1.S10udanav_u:uv_29.10_0-1: na nāmarūpamātreṇa varṇapuṣkalayā na ca / sādhurūpo naro bhavati māyāvī matsarī śaṭhaḥ //
29.1.uv-kg29#667: g-yo sgyu ’juṅs daṅ ldan pa’i mi || kha dog daṅ ni gzugs ldan pa’am || yaṅ na smra bar byed tsam gyis || pho mchog yin par mi chud do ||

29.11.S10udanav_u:uv_29.11_0-1: na varṇarūpeṇa naro hi sarvo vijñāyate netvaradarśanena / susaṁvṛtānām iha vyañjanena tv asaṁvṛtā lokam imaṁ caranti //
29.11.uv-kg29#669: ’jig rten ’di na legs par ma bsdams pa || phal cher legs bsdams rtags kyis rgyu byed pas || legs par ma brtags bar du mi dag gi || mdog gzugs lan ’ga’ mthoṅ bas yid ma rton ||

29.12.S10udanav_u:uv_29.12_0-1: pratirūpakaṁ dhūpitakarṇikā vā lohārdhamāṣa iva hiraṇyacchannaḥ / caranti haike parivāravantas tv antar hy aśuddhā bahi śobhamānāḥ //
29.12.uv-kg29#670: ra gan kha bsgyur lta bur mi ’tsham źiṅ || lcags phyed gser gyis g-yogs pa ji lta bur || khoṅ pa rab gdug phyi rol ’phags tshul gyis || ’jig rten ’di na ’khor daṅ bcas par gyur ||

29.13.S10udanav_u:uv_29.13_0-1: middhī ca yo bhavati mahāgrasaś ca rātriṁ divaṁ saṁparivartaśāyī / mahāvarāhaiva nivāpapuṣṭaḥ punaḥ punar mandam upaiti garbham //
29.13.uv-kg29#671: gaṅ źig rde ’geṅs gñid ni log pa daṅ || ñin daṅ mtshan du ’gre ldog ñal byed pa || rdzab naṅ phag chen lus rgyas ji lta bar || yaṅ daṅ yaṅ du smad pa’i mṅal du ’jug ||

29.14.S10udanav_u:uv_29.14_0-1: manujasya sadā smṛtīmato labdhvā bhojanamātrajānataḥ / tanukāsya bhavanti vedanāḥ śanakair jīryati āyuḥ pālayam //
29.14.uv-kg29#672: mi ni rtag tu dran pa ldan pa daṅ || rtag tu kha zas kyi ni tshod śes pa || de yi sdug bsṅal chuṅ bar ’gyur ba daṅ || dal bus ’ju bas tshe yaṅ riṅ bar byed ||

29.15.S10udanav_u:uv_29.15_0-1: śubhānudarśinaṁ nityam indriyaiś cāpy asaṁvṛtam / bhojane cāpy amātrajñaṁ hīnaṁ jāgarikāsu ca / taṁ vai prasahate rāgo vāto vṛkṣam ivābalam // [i] śubhānupaśyī viharann indriyair hi asaṁvṛtaḥ / bhojane cāpy amātrajñaḥ kusīdo hīnavīryavān / taṁ vai prasahate rāgo vāto vṛkṣam ivābalam // [ii]
29.15.uv-kg29#673: gaṅ źig dbaṅ po ma bsdams śiṅ || zas kyi tshod ni mi śes la || dran pa ñams daṅ le lo can || gtsaṅ bar lta źiṅ gnas byed pa || de ni ’dod chags rnams kyis bcom || rluṅ gis mi brtan ljon śiṅ bźin ||

29.16.S10udanav_u:uv_29.16_0-1: aśubhānudarśinaṁ nityam indriyaiś ca susaṁvṛtam / bhojane cāpi mātrajñaṁ yuktaṁ jāgarikāsu ca / taṁ na prasahate rāgo vātaḥ śailam iva sthiram // [i] aśubhānupaśyī viharann indriyair hi susaṁvṛtaḥ / bhojane cāpi mātrajñaḥ śrāddha ārabdhavīryavān / taṁ na prasahate rāgo vātaḥ śailam iva parvatam // [ii]
29.16.uv-kg29#674: gaṅ źig dbaṅ po legs bsdams śiṅ || zas kyi tshod ni śes pa daṅ || so sor dran źiṅ brtson ’grus ldan || mi gtsaṅ lta bas gnas byed pa || de ni ’dod chags kyis mi choms || rluṅ gis ri bo mi g-yos bźin ||

29.17.S10udanav_u:uv_29.17_0-1: ramaṇīyāny araṇyāni na cātra ramate janaḥ / vītarāgātra raṁsyante na tu kāmagaveṣiṇaḥ //
29.17.uv-kg29#675: dgon pa dga’ bar bya ’os pa || de la skye bo mi dga’ yaṅ || de la ’dod chags bral ba dga’ || ’dod pa tshol bar byed rnams min ||

29.18.S10udanav_u:uv_29.18_0-1: grāme vā yadi vāraṇye nimne vā yadi vā sthale / yatrārhanto viharanti te deśā ramaṇīyakāḥ //
29.18.uv-kg29#676: dgon pa’am yaṅ na groṅ dag gam || gśaṅ ṅam thaṅ bu dag kyaṅ ruṅ || gaṅ na ’phags pa bźugs pa yi || sa de yid du ’oṅ ba yin ||

29.19.S10udanav_u:uv_29.19_0-1: dūrāt santaḥ prakāśyante himavān iva parvataḥ / asanto na prakāśyante rātrikṣiptāḥ śarā yathā //
29.19.uv-kg29#677: dam pa riṅ nas snaṅ gyur te || gaṅs can gyi ni ri bo bźin || ṅan pa ñe yaṅ mi snaṅ ste || mun khrod mda’ ni ’phaṅs pa bźin ||

29.2.S10udanav_u:uv_29.20_0-1: sadbhir eva sahāsīta paṇḍitair arthacintakaiḥ /arthaṁ mahāntaṁ gambhīraṁ prajñayā pratividhyate //
29.2.uv-kg29#678: mkhas pa don sems byed pa yi || dam pa ñid daṅ ’grogs na ni || don chen ’gyur źiṅ zab mo yi || śes rab so sor rtogs par ’gyur ||

29.21.S10udanav_u:uv_29.21_0-1: ahaṁ nāga iva saṁgrāme cāpād utpatitāṁ śarān / ativākyaṁ titīkṣāmi duḥśīlo hi mahājanaḥ //
29.21.uv-kg29#679: gźu yis mda’ ’phaṅs bsnun pa yi || g-yul ṅo’i glaṅ chen ji bźin du || tshul ’chal skye bo maṅ po yis || mi sñan smras pa bzod par bya ||

29.22.S10udanav_u:uv_29.22_0-1: bhave cāhaṁ bhayaṁ dṛṣṭvā bhūyaś ca vibhavaṁ bhave /tasmād bhavaṁ nābhinande nandī ca vibhavena me //
29.22.uv-kg29#680: phal cher ’jigs pa’i ’khor ba ste || ṅas ni de la ’jigs mthoṅ ste || de bas srid la mṅon mi dga’ || srid pa’i ’byor thob dga’ ba med ||

29.23.S10udanav_u:uv_29.23_0-1: aśraddhaś cākṛtajñaś ca saṁdhicchettā ca yo naraḥ /hatāvakāśo vāntāśaḥ sa vai tūttamapūruṣaḥ //
29.23.uv-kg29#681: mi gaṅ khyim ’bigs byed pa daṅ || dad pa med ciṅ byas mi gzo || go skabs bcom daṅ skyugs pa za || de ni skyes bu dam pa yin ||

29.24.S10udanav_u:uv_29.24_0-1: mātaraṁ pitaraṁ hatvā rājānaṁ dvau ca śrotriyau / rāṣṭraṁ sānucaraṁ hatvā anigho yāti brāhmaṇaḥ //
29.24.uv-kg29#682: pha ma dag ni bsad byas śiṅ || rgyal po gtsaṅ sbra can gñis daṅ || yul ’khor ’khor daṅ bcas bcom na || mi ni dag par ’gyur źes bya ||

29.27.S10udanav_u:uv_29.27_0-1: yeṣāṁ saṁnicayo nāsti ye parijñātabhojanāḥ / śunyatā cānimittaṁ ca samādhiś caiva gocaraḥ / ākāśaiva śakuntānāṁ padaṁ teṣāṁ duranvayam //
29.27.uv-kg29#686: gaṅ dag kun du sogs med ciṅ || gaṅ dag kha zas yoṅs śes pa || stoṅ daṅ mtshan ma med pa daṅ || rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can || de dag rjes ni rtogs dka’ ste || nam mkha’ la ni bya rjes bźin ||

29.28.S10udanav_u:uv_29.28_0-1: yeṣāṁ saṁnicayo nāsti ye parijñātabhojanāḥ / śunyatā cānimittaṁ ca samādhiś caiva gocaraḥ / ākāśaiva śakuntānāṁ gatis teṣāṁ duranvayā //
29.28.uv-kg29#685: gaṅ dag kun du sogs med ciṅ || gaṅ dag kha zas yoṅs śes pa || stoṅ daṅ mtshan ma med pa daṅ || stoṅ daṅ mtshan ma med pa daṅ || rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can || de dag ’gro ba rtogs dka’ ste || nam mkha’ la ni bya rjes bźin ||

29.29.S10udanav_u:uv_29.29_0-1: yeṣāṁ bhavaḥ parikṣīno hy aparāntaṁ ca nāśritāḥ / śunyatā cānimittaṁ ca vivekaś caiva gocaraḥ / ākāśaiva śakuntānāṁ padaṁ teṣāṁ duranvayam //
29.29.uv-kg29#690: gaṅ dag pha mthar rten med ciṅ || gaṅ gis zag zad yoṅs śes pa || stoṅ daṅ matsha ma med pa daṅ || dben pa ñid kyi spyod yul can || de dag rjes ni rtogs dga’ ste || nam mkha’ la ni bya rjes bźin ||

29.3.S10udanav_u:uv_29.30_0-1: yeṣāṁ bhavaḥ parikṣīno hy aparāntaṁ ca nāśritāḥ / śunyatā cānimittaṁ ca vivekaś caiva gocaraḥ / ākāśaiva śakuntānāṁ gatis teṣāṁ duranvayā //
29.3.uv-kg29#689: gaṅ dag pha mthar rten med ciṅ || gaṅ gis zag zad yoṅs śes pa || stoṅ daṅ mtshan ma med pa daṅ || dben pa ñid kyi spyod yul ca || de dag ’gro ba rtogs dka’ ste || nam mkha’ la ni bya rjes bźin ||

29.33.S10udanav_u:uv_29.33_0-1: alpakās te manuṣyeṣu ye janāḥ pāragāminaḥ /atheyam itarāḥ prajās tīram evānudhāvati //
29.33.uv-kg29#695: skye dgu phal pa ’di dgi || pha mtha’ ñid du rgyug byed pas || gaṅ dag pha rol ’gro byed pa’i || mi yi skye bo de dag ñuṅ ||

29.34.S10udanav_u:uv_29.34_0-1: ye tarhi samyag ākhyāte dharme dharmānudarśinaḥ / te janāḥ pāram eṣyanti mṛtyudheyasya sarvaśaḥ //
29.34.uv-kg29#696: gaṅ dag legs par gsuṅs pa yi || chos la chos kyi rjes lta bas || skye bo de dag skye śi yi || mtsho chen rgal dka’i pha rol ’gro ||

29.35.S10udanav_u:uv_29.35_0-1: gatādhvano viśokasya vipramuktasya tāyinaḥ / sarvagranthaprahīṇasya paridāgho na vidyate //
29.35.uv-kg29#697: skyob pa rab tu rnam grol źiṅ || dus ’das mya ṅan bral ba daṅ || mdud pa thams cad spaṅs pa la || yoṅs su gduṅ ba yod mi ’gyur ||

29.36.S10udanav_u:uv_29.36_0-1: uttīrṇaḥ sabhayo mārgaḥ pātālaḥ parivarjitaḥ / mukto yogais tathā granthaiḥ sarvaṁ rāgaviṣaṁ hatam //
29.36.uv-kg29#698: ’jigs daṅ bcas pa’i lam rgal ciṅ || g-yaṅ sa yoṅs su spoṅs pa daṅ || sbyor daṅ mdud pa las grol bas || ’dod chags kyi ni dug kun bcom ||

29.37.S10udanav_u:uv_29.37_0-1: nāsti kāmasamo hy ogho nāsti doṣasamo grahaḥ / nāsti mohasamaṁ jālaṁ nāsti tṛṣṇāsamā nadī
29.37.uv-kg29#699: ’dod pa lta bu’i ’dam rdza ba med || źe sdaṅ lta bu’i gnod med do || gi mug lta bu’i rgya med de || sred pa lta bu’i chu kluṅ med ||

29.38.S10udanav_u:uv_29.38_0-1: ākāśe tu padaṁ nāsti śramaṇo nāsti bāhyakaḥ / prapañcābhiratā bālā niṣprapañcās tathāgatāḥ //
29.38.uv-kg29#700: nam mkha’ la ni rjes lta bur || phyi rol pa la dge sbyoṅ med || byis pa spros la mṅon par dga’ || de bźin gśegs la spros mi mṅa’ ||

29.39.S10udanav_u:uv_29.39_0-1: yogaiḥ samuhyate bālo yogāṁ nudati paṇḍitaḥ / yogāṁ praṇudya medhāvī ye divyā ye ca mānusāḥ / sarvayogāṁ praṇudyeha sarvaduḥkhāṭ pramucyate //
29.39.uv-kg29#701: sbyor bas byis pa khrid pa’i phyir || mkhas pa sbyor ba ’joms par byed || mkhas pa lha daṅ mi dag gi || sbyor ba gaṅ yin ’joms byed pa || sbyor ba ku daṅ bral ba’i phyir || sdug bsṅal kun las grol bar ’gyur ||

29.4.S10udanav_u:uv_29.40_0-1: yogād bhavaḥ prabhavati viyogād bhavasaṁkṣayaḥ / etad dvaidhāpathaṁ jñātvā bhavāya vibhavāya ca / tatra śikṣeta medhāvī yatra yogān atikramet //
29.4.uv-kg29#702: sbyor ba las ni srid pa ’byuṅ || sbyor ba med pas srid pa zad || srid pa daṅ ni srid med pa’i || lam ’di gñis ni śes gyis la || sbyor lam rab tu ’da’ bya’i phyir || mkhas pas de la bslab par gyis ||

29.43.S10udanav_u:uv_29.43_0-1: nābhāṣamāṇā jñāyante miśrā bālair hi paṇḍitāḥ / jñāyante bhāṣamāṇās tu deṣayanto 'rajaḥ padam //
29.43.uv-kg29#705: mkhas daṅ byis pa ’dres pa las || ma smras śes par mi ’gyur bas || źi ba’i go ’phaṅ smros śig daṅ || smras pa yis ni śes par ’gyur ||

29.44.S10udanav_u:uv_29.44_0-1: bhāṣayed dyotayed dharmam ucchrayed ṛṣiṇāṁ dhvajam / subhāṣitadhvajā nityam ṛṣayor dharmagauravāḥ //
29.44.uv-kg29#706: legs bśad draṅ sroṅ rgyal mtshan te || draṅ sroṅ rgyal mtshan chos yin pas || chos ni bśad pas gsal bya źiṅ || draṅ sroṅ rgyal mtshan bsgreṅ bar gyis ||

29.45.S10udanav_u:uv_29.45_0-1: nindanti tuṣṇim āsīnaṁ nindanti bahubhāṣiṇam / alpabhāṇiṁ ca nindanti nāsti lokeṣv aninditaḥ //
29.45.uv-kg29#707: ma smras na yaṅ smod byed ciṅ || maṅ du smras na smod par byed || dal bus smras kyaṅ smod byed de || ’jig rten na ni mi smad med ||

29.46.S10udanav_u:uv_29.46_0-1: ekāntaninditaḥ puruṣaḥ ekāntaṁ vā praśaṁsitaḥ /nābhūd bhaviṣyati ca no na cāpy etarhi vidyate //
29.46.uv-kg29#708: gcig tu smad par bya ba daṅ || gcig tu bstod par bya ba’i mi || da ltar yod pa ma yin te || byuṅ bar ma gyur ’byuṅ mi ’gyur ||

29.49.S10udanav_u:uv_29.49_0-1: śailo yathāpy ekaghano vāyunā na prakampyate / evaṁ nindāpraśaṁsābhir na kampyante hi paṇḍitāḥ //
29.49.uv-kg29#711: ji ltar ri daṅ brag dag ni || rluṅ gis g-yos par mi ’gyur ltar || de bźin bstod daṅ smad pa yis || mkhas pa rab tu g-yo ba med ||

29.51.S10udanav_u:uv_29.51_0-1: yasya ha prapañcitaṁ hi no sat saṁtānaṁ parikhaṁ ca yo nivṛttaḥ / tṛṣṇāvigataṁ muniṁ carantaṁ na vijānāti sadevako 'pi lokaḥ //
29.51.uv-kg29#709: gaṅ dag la ni gnas pa’i spros med ciṅ || gaṅ dag kun sbyor gduṅ las rab log pa || thub pa sred bral de dag rgyu mdzad kyaṅ || lhar bcas ’jig rten rnams kyis mi śes so ||

29.53.S10udanav_u:uv_29.53_0-1: yasya jālinī viṣaktikā tṛṣṇā nāsti hi lokanāyinī / taṁ buddham anantagocaraṁ hy apadaṁ kena padena neṣyasi //
29.53.uv-kg29#715: gaṅ la ’khrid byed srid pa ni || yul sred ’dra ba ’ga’ med pa || saṅs rgyas spyod yul mtha’ yas de || ’gro med gom pa gaṅ gis bkri ||

29.54.S10udanav_u:uv_29.54_0-1: yasya mūlaṁ kṣitau nāsti parṇā nāsti tathā latāḥ / taṁ dhīraṁ bandhanān muktaṁ ko nu ninditum arhati //
29.54.uv-kg29#712: sa la gaṅ gi rtswa med pa || lo med lcug phran ga la yod || ’chiṅ ba las grol brtan pa de’i || ji ga sus kyaṅ smad ’os min ||

29.55.S10udanav_u:uv_29.55_0-1: yasya jālinī viṣaktikā tṛṣṇā nāsti hi lokanāyinī / taṁ buddham anantavikramaṁ hy apadaṁ kena padena neṣyasi //
29.55.uv-kg29#716: gaṅ la ’khrid byed srid pa ni || yul sred ’dra ba ’ga’ med pa || saṅs rgyas mthu rtsal mtha’ yas de || ’gro med gom pa gaṅ gis bkri ||

29.56.S10udanav_u:uv_29.56_0-1: yasya vitarkā vidhūpitās tv ādhyātmaṁ vinivartitā hy aśeṣam / sa hi saṅgam atītya sarvasaṁjñāṁ yogāpetam atīrṇasaṅgam eti //
29.56.uv-kg29#717: gaṅ źig rnam par rtog pa rnam bsal ciṅ || naṅ gi kun la rnam par rtog med pa || kun du sbyor daṅ gzugs daṅ ’du śes ’das || rnal ’byor bźi daṅ bral la skye ba med ||

29.57.S10udanav_u:uv_29.57_0-1: muñca purato muñca paścato madhye muñca bhavasya pāragaḥ / sarvatra vimuktamānaso na punar jātijarām upeṣyasi //
29.57.uv-kg29#718: sṅon bral phyi ma daṅ bral źiṅ || dbus bral srid pa’i pha rol phyin || rnam pa kun las sems grol ba || skye rga phyi ma ’dren mi ’gyur ||

30.01.S10udanav_u:uv_30.1_0-1: jayād vairaṁ prasavate duḥkhaṁ śete parājitaḥ / upaśāntaḥ sukhaṁ śete hitvā jayaparājayau //
30.01.uv-kg30#719: || rgyal ba las ni ’khon ’byuṅ źiṅ || pha rol pham pa sdug bsṅal ’thob || rgyal daṅ pha rol pham spaṅs na || ñe bar źi ba’i bde ba ’thob ||

30.02.S10udanav_u:uv_30.2_0-1: paraduḥkhopadhānena ya icchet sukham ātmanaḥ / vairasaṁsargasaṁsakto duḥkhān na parimucyate //
30.02.uv-kg30#720: gźan la sdug bsṅal bskyed pa yis || gaṅ źig bdag ni bde ’dod pa || dgra daṅ mi ’bral ’grogs pa daṅ || de ni sdug bsṅal las mi ’grol ||

30.03.S10udanav_u:uv_30.3_0-1: sukhakāmāni bhūtāni yo daṇḍena vihiṁsati / ātmanaḥ sukham eṣāṇaḥ sa vai na labhate sukham //
30.03.uv-kg30#721: bde ba ’dod phyir ’byuṅ po la || gaṅ źig ’tshe źiṅ chad pas gcod || bdag gi bde ba ’dod pa de || pha rol du ni bde mi ’gyur ||

30.04.S10udanav_u:uv_30.4_0-1: sukhakāmāni bhūtāni yo daṇḍena na hiṁsati / ātmanaḥ sukham eṣānaḥ sa pretya labhate sukham //
30.04.uv-kg30#722: gaṅ źig bde ba ’dod pa dag || ’byuṅ po la ni mi ’tshe źiṅ || chad pas mi gcod bde ’dod pa || de dag pha rol bde ba ’thob ||

30.05.S10udanav_u:uv_30.5_0-1: dharmaṁ caret sucaritaṁ nainaṁ duścaritaṁ caret / dharmacārī sukhaṁ śete hy asmiṁ loke paratra ca //
30.05.uv-kg30#723: chos spyod legs par spyad bya źiṅ || ñes par spyad pa de mi spyad || ’jig rten ’di daṅ pha rol du || chos spyad pas ni.i bde ba ’thob ||

30.06.S10udanav_u:uv_30.6_0-1: dharmaḥ sadā rakṣati dharmacāriṇaṁ chatraṁ mahadvarṣakāle yathaiva / eṣānuśaṁso dharme sucīrṇe na durgatiṁ gacchati dharmacārī //
30.06.uv-kg30#725: yaṅs pa’i gadugasakyisa dbyar ka ltar || chos spyod chos kyis bsruṅ bar bya || chos spyod ṅan ’gror mi ’gro ba || chosala legs spyod phan yon de’o || (bag med mi yis chos min spyad na ni || ’gro ba gaṅ yaṅ ruṅ ba ṅan ’gror ’gro || ’di na sbrul nag rked nas bzuṅ ba ltar || chos min spyod pa de dag rlag par ’gyur || chos daṅ chos min gñi ga yi || rnam smin ’dra bar mi ’gyur te || chos ma yin pas dmyal bar ’gro || chos kyis bade’agro thob par byed ||)

30.07.S10udanav_u:uv_30.7_0-1: dharmaḥ sadā rakṣati dharmacāriṇaṁ dharmaḥ sucīrṇaḥ sukham ādadhāti eṣānuśaṁso dharme sucīrṇe na durgatiṁ gacchati dharmacārī //
30.07.uv-kg30#724: chos la legs spyad bde sgyed pas || chos spyod chos kyis bsruṅ bar bya || chos spyod ṅan ’gror mi ’gro ba || chos la legs spyod phan yon de’o ||

30.08.S10udanav_u:uv_30.8_0-1: alpāpi santo bahavo jayanti susaṁvidhāne na saṁvidhānam / alpam api cec chraddadhāno dadāti tenaivāsau bhavati sukhī paratra //
30.08.uv-kg30#727: śin tu legs par chas pa gcig pus kyaṅ || legs par ma chas ’phyes las rgyal byed ltar || gal te dad bskyed chuṅ du byin pas kyaṅ || des ni de dag gźan du bde bar ’gyur ||

30.09.S10udanav_u:uv_30.9_0-1: dānaṁ ca yuddhaṁ ca samānam āhur naite guṇāḥ kāpuruṣeva santi / saṁgrāmaveleva hi dānavelā tulyaṁ bhavet kāraṇasaṁgraheṇa //
30.09.uv-kg30#726: sbyin pa byed pa’i dus daṅ g-yul ’byed dus || rgyu yis yoṅs su bzuṅ bar ’dra bas na || sbyin pa byed daṅ g-yul ’gyed ’dra źes gsuṅs || yon tan de gñis mi ṅan rten mi byed ||

30.1.S10udanav_u:uv_30.10_0-1: ayaṁ hi pratyūhaśatāni jitvā mātsaryam ākramya ca śatrubhūtam / śurād dhi taṁ śūrataraṁ vadāmi dadāti yo dānam asaktacittaḥ //
30.1.uv-kg30#728: ’di na lan brgyar g-yul zlog dpa’ bo bas || ser sna dgrar gyur zil gyis mnan nas su || gaṅ źig chags med sems kyis sbyin byed pa || de dag ches dpa’ yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

30.11.S10udanav_u:uv_30.11_0-1: sukho vipākaḥ puṇyānām abhiprāyaḥ samṛdhyate / kṣipraṁ ca paramāṁ śāntiṁ nirvṛtiṁ so 'dhigacchati //
30.11.uv-kg30#729: bsod nams rnam smin bde ba ste || mṅon par bsams pa ’byor bar byed || myur du źi ba dam pa yi || mya ṅan ’das pa thob par ’gyur ||

30.12.S10udanav_u:uv_30.12_0-1: parato hy upasargāṁś ca devatā mārakāyikāḥ / antarāyaṁ na śaktiṣṭāḥ kṛtapuṇyasya kartu vai //
30.12.uv-kg30#730: bsod nams byed pa rnams la ni || gźan las byuṅ ba’i gnod pa daṅ || lha daṅ bdud kyi ris rnams kyis || bar chad bya bar mi nus so || (gal te sdug bsṅal zad bya’i phyir || ’phags daṅ śes rab gtoṅ ldan la || de yis ’bad rtsol byas na ni || lhag mthoṅ gis ni reg par ’gyur ||)

30.13.S10udanav_u:uv_30.13_0-1: dharmaprītiḥ sukhaṁ śete viprasannena cetasā / āryapravedite dharme ramate paṇḍitaḥ smṛtaḥ //
30.13.uv-kg30#731: sems ni rab tu rnam daṅ bas || chos la dga’ byed bde ba ’thob || ’phags pas gsuṅs pa’i chos dag la || mkhas pa rtag tu dga’ bar byed ||

30.14.S10udanav_u:uv_30.14_0-1: yeṣāṁ dharmarataṁ cittam anupādāya nirvṛtim /smṛtyupasthānanirataṁ bodhyaṅgeṣu ca saptasu //
30.14.uv-kg30#732: gaṅ dag sems ni bstam gtan dga’ || gaṅ źig skye med dga’ ba daṅ || dran pa ñe bar gźag bźi daṅ || byaṅ chub yan lag bdun daṅ ||

30.17.S10udanav_u:uv_30.17_0-1: kṣemaprāptā hi sukhitā dṛṣṭadharmābhinirvṛtāḥ / sarvavairabhayātītās tīrṇā loke viṣaktikām //
30.17.uv-kg30#734: de dag ri daṅ nags tshal na|| bde bar ’chag par byed pa daṅ || de dag bde ’thob bde bar ni || mthoṅ ba’i chos la mya ṅan ’da’ || ’khon daṅ ’jigs pa kun ’das śiṅ || ’jig rten yul gyi srid las rgal ||

30.18.S10udanav_u:uv_30.18_0-1: sukho vivekas tuṣṭasya śrutadharmasya paśyataḥ / avyāvadhyaḥ sukhaṁ loke prāṇabhūteṣu saṁyamaḥ //
30.18.uv-kg30#735: chos thos pa daṅ mthoṅ ba daṅ || dben par dga’ ba bde ba ste|| ’jig rten srog chags ’byuṅ po la || ’tshe med yaṅ dag sdom ba bde ||

30.19.S10udanav_u:uv_30.19_0-1: sukhaṁ virāgatā loke kāmānāṁ samatikramaḥ /asmimānasya vinaya etad vai paramaṁ sukham //
30.19.uv-kg30#736: ’dod pa rnams las rab ’das śiṅ || ’jig rten ’dod chags bral ba bde || ṅa’o sñam pa’i ṅa rgyal dag || btul ba de dag mchog tu bde ||

30.2.S10udanav_u:uv_30.20_0-1: sukhaṁ yāvaj jarā śīlaṁ sukhaṁ śraddhā pratiṣṭhitā / sukhaṁ cārtharatā vācā pāpasyākaraṇaṁ sukham //
30.2.uv-kg30#737: rgas khar tshul khrims ldan pa bde || dad la rab tu gnas pa bde || don ldan tshig la dga’ ba bde || sdig pa mi byed pa dag bde ||

30.21.S10udanav_u:uv_30.21_0-1: sukhaṁ mātṛvyatā loke sukhaṁ caiva pitṛvyatā / sukhaṁ śrāmaṇyatā loke tathā brāhmaṇyatā sukhaṁ //
30.21.uv-kg30#738: ’jig rten na ni phar ’dzin bde || de bźin mar yaṅ ’dzin pa bde || ’jig rten dge sbyoṅ ’dzin pa bde || de bźin bram zer ’dzin pa bde ||

30.22.S10udanav_u:uv_30.22_0-1: sukhaṁ buddhasya cotpādaḥ sukhaṁ dharmasya deśanā / sukhaṁ saṁghasya sāmagrī samagrāṇāṁ tapaḥ sukham //
30.22.uv-kg30#739: saṅs rgyas rnams ni ’byuṅ ba bde || de bźin chos rnams bstan pa bde || dge ’dun rnams ni ’thun pa bde || ’thun pa rnams kyi dka’ thub bde ||

30.23.S10udanav_u:uv_30.23_0-1: śīlavantaḥ sukhaṁ dṛṣṭuṁ sukhaṁ dṛṣṭuṁ bahuśrutāḥ / arhantaś ca sukhaṁ dṛṣṭuṁ vipramuktapunarbhavāḥ //
30.23.uv-kg30#740: tshul khrims ldan pa mthoṅ ba bde || maṅ du thos pa mthoṅ ba bde || yaṅ srid rnam par grol ba yi || dgra bcom pa dag mthoṅ ba bde ||

30.24.S10udanav_u:uv_30.24_0-1: sukhā nadī sūpatīrthā sukhaṁ dharmajino jinaḥ / prajñālābhaḥ sukho nityam asmimānakṣayaḥ sukham //
30.24.uv-kg30#741: ’jug ṅogs bde ba’i chu kluṅ bde || chos kyis rgyal ba’i skye bo bde || śes rab thob par gyur pa bde || ṅa’o ṅa rgyal zad pa bde ||

30.25.S10udanav_u:uv_30.25_0-1: sukhaṁ darśanam āryāṇāṁ saṁvāso 'pi sadā sukham / adarśanena bālānāṁ nityam eva sukhī bhavet //
30.25.uv-kg30#742: ’phags pa rnams ni mthoṅ ba bde || dam pa dag daṅ ’grogs pa bde || byis pa rnams ni ma mthoṅ na || rtag tu bde ba ñid du ’gyur ||

30.27.S10udanav_u:uv_30.27_0-1: durlabhaḥ puruṣo jātyo nāsau sarvatra jāyate / yatrāsau jāyate vīras tat kulaṁ sukham edhate //
30.27.uv-kg30#744: skyes bu caṅ śes dkon pa ste || de dag kun du ’byuṅ ma yin || brtan pa rnams daṅ ’grogs pa dag || gñen daṅ phrad pa lta bur bde || gaṅ du brtan pa de skyes pa || de yi rigs kyis bde ba ’thob ||

30.3.S10udanav_u:uv_30.30_0-1: mātrāsukhaparityāgād yaḥ paśyed vipulaṁ sukham / tyajen mātrāsukhaṁ dhīraḥ saṁpaśyaṁ vipulaṁ sukham //
30.3.uv-kg30#747: gaṅ źig bde ba yaṅs ’dod ciṅ || bde ba chuṅ du gtor ’dod pa’i || brtan pas bde chuṅ spaṅ byas na || bde ba yaṅs pa legs par mthoṅ ||

30.31.S10udanav_u:uv_30.31_0-1: yac ca kāmasukhaṁ loke yac cāpi divijaṁ sukham / tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaitat kalāṁ nārghati ṣoḍaśīm //
30.31.uv-kg30#748: ’jig rten ’dod bde gaṅ yin daṅ || lha yul bde ba gaṅ yin pas || sred pa zad pa’i bde ba de’i || bcu drug char yaṅ mi phod do ||

30.32.S10udanav_u:uv_30.32_0-1: nikṣipya hi guruṁ bhāraṁ nādadyād bhāram eva tu / bhārādānaṁ paraṁ duḥkhaṁ bhāranikṣepaṇaṁ sukham //
30.32.uv-kg30#749: khur gyis sdug bsṅal blaṅs pas na || khur bor na ni bde bar ’gyur || lci ba’i khur dag ṅes bor na || phyi nas gźan dag len mi ’gyur ||

30.33.S10udanav_u:uv_30.33_0-1: sarvaṭṛṣṇāṁ viprahāya sarvasaṁyojanakṣayāt / sarvopadhiṁ parijñāya nāgacchanti punarbhavam //
30.33.uv-kg30#750: kun sbyor thams cad zad bya’i phyir || sred pa thams cad rab tu spoṅs || phuṅ po thams cad yoṅs śes na || srid pa phyi mar ’gro ba med ||

30.34.S10udanav_u:uv_30.34_0-1: artheṣu jāteṣu sukhaṁ sahāyāḥ puṇyaṁ sukhaṁ jīvitasaṁkṣayeṣu / tuṣṭiḥ sukhā yā tv itaretareṇa sarvasya duḥkhasya sukho nirodhaḥ //
30.34.uv-kg30#751: don rnams bkrun pa la ni grogs ldan bde || srog dag rab tu gtugs la bsod nams bde || ṅan ṅon tsam gyis legs par chog śes bde || sdug bsṅal thams cad ṅes par nub pa bde ||

30.35.S10udanav_u:uv_30.35_0-1: ayoghanahatasyaiva jvalato jātavedasaḥ / anupūrvopaśāntasya yathā na jñāyate gatiḥ //
30.35.uv-kg30#752: ’di na me ni ’bar ba la || lcags kyi tho bas brgyab pa yis || rim gyis ñe bar źi ’gyur te || ji ltar soṅ ba mi śes ltar ||

30.36.S10udanav_u:uv_30.36_0-1: evaṁ samyagvimuktānāṁ kāmapaṅkaughatāriṇām / prajñāpayituṁ gatir nāsti prāptānām acalaṁ sukham //
30.36.uv-kg30#753: ’dod pa’i ’dam rdzab chu rgal ciṅ || go ’phaṅ mi g-yo thob pa daṅ || legs par ram par grol rnams kyi || ’gro ba gdags su med pa yin ||

30.37.S10udanav_u:uv_30.37_0-1: yasyāntarato na santi kopā itthaṁbhāvagataṁ ca yo nivṛttaḥ / akhilaṁ taṁ sukhinaṁ sadā viśokaṁ devā nānubhavanti darśanena //
30.37.uv-kg30#754: gaṅ źig khoṅ na ’khrugs pa med pa daṅ || gaṅ źig sred daṅ sred min las log pa || de dag ’jigs bral ba de źiṅ mya ṅan med || lhas kyaṅ blta źiṅ bas ma du med par ’gyur ||

30.38.S10udanav_u:uv_30.38_0-1: sukhaṁ hi yasyeha na kiñcanaṁ syāt svākhyātadharmasya bahuśrutasya / sakiñcanaṁ paśya vihanyamānaṁ janaṁ janeṣu pratibaddhacittam //
30.38.uv-kg30#755: ’di na gaṅ dag chos maṅ thos pa daṅ || rtogs śiṅ ci yaṅ med pa kye re bde || skye bo skye bo’i lus la rab chags śiṅ || chuṅ zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos ||

30.42.S10udanav_u:uv_30.42_0-1: sarvaṁ paravaśaṁ duḥkhaṁ sarvam ātmavaśaṁ sukham / sādhāraṇe vihanyante yogā hi duratikramāḥ //
30.42.uv-kg30#759: gźan gyi dbaṅ gyur kun sdug ste|| raṅ dbaṅ yod pa thams cadabade || sbyor ba śin tu spaṅ dka’ ba || thun moṅ gyur pas brlag par zad ||

30.43.S10udanav_u:uv_30.43_0-1: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo hy utsukeṣu tv anutsukāḥ / utsukeṣu manuṣyeṣu viharāmo hy anutsukāḥ //
30.43.uv-kg30#760: źen par gyur pa’i mi naṅ na || źen pa med par gnas pa daṅ || źen pa’i naṅ na ma źen pa || kye ma’o źin tu bde bar ’tsho ||

30.44.S10udanav_u:uv_30.44_0-1: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo yeṣāṁ no nāsti kiñcanam / mithilāyāṁ dahyamānāyāṁ na no dahyati kiñcanam //
30.44.uv-kg30#765: mi thi la dag rab bsregs kyaṅ || ṅa la ci yaṅ tshig pa med || ṅa la gaṅ dag ci med pas || kye ma’o śin tu bde bar ’tsho ||

30.45.S10udanav_u:uv_30.45_0-1: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo hy ātureṣu tv anāturāḥ / ātureṣu manuṣyeṣu viharāmo hy anāturāḥ //
30.45.uv-kg30#761: nad kyis thebs pa’i mi naṅ na || nad med par ni gnas pa daṅ || nad pa’i naṅ na nad med pa || kye ma’o śin tu bde bar ’tsho ||

30.46.S10udanav_u:uv_30.46_0-1: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo hiṁsakeṣu tv ahiṁsakāḥ / hiṁsakeṣu manuṣyeṣu viharāmo hy ahiṁsakāḥ //
30.46.uv-kg30#762: ’tshe ba can gyi mi naṅ na || ’tshe ba med par gnas pa daṅ || ’tshe ba’i naṅ na ’tshe med pa || kye ma’o śin tu bde bar ’tsho ||

30.47.S10udanav_u:uv_30.47_0-1: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo vairikeṣu tv avairikāḥ / vairikeṣu manuṣyeṣu viharāmo hy avairikāḥ //
30.47.uv-kg30#764: śa kho na can gyi mi naṅ na || śa kho na med par gnas pa daṅ || śa kho na can naṅ ’khon med pa || kye ma’o śin tu bde bar ’tsho ||

30.48.S10udanav_u:uv_30.48_0-1: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo heṭhakeṣu tv aheṭhakāḥ / heṭhakeṣu manuṣyeṣu viharāmo hy aheṭhakāḥ //
30.48.uv-kg30#763: gnod sems ca gyi mi naṅ na || gnod sems med par gnas pa daṅ || gnod sems can naṅ gnod med pa || kye ma’o śin tu bde bar ’tsho ||

30.51.S10udanav_u:uv_30.51_0-1: grāme araṇye sukhaduḥkhaspṛṣṭo naivātmano no parato dadhāti / sparśāḥ spṛśanti hy upadhiṁ pratītya niraupadhiṁ kiṁ sparśāḥ spṛśeyuḥ //
30.51.uv-kg30#768: len pa’i rkyen gyis phrad ciṅ reg ’gyur gyi || len med ci daṅ phrad reg med pas || bdag daṅ gźan gyis bskyed pa’i bde sdug gis || dgon pa’am groṅ du reg par mi ’gyur ro ||

30.52.S10udanav_u:uv_30.52_0-1: sāpatrapāḥ satpuruṣā bhavanti na kāmahetor lapayanti santaḥ / spṛṣṭā hi duḥkena tathā sukhena noccāvacāḥ satpuruṣā bhavanti //
30.52.uv-kg30#769: ’jig rten ’din bde daṅ sdug bsṅal gyis || skyes bu dam pa mtho dman mi ’gyur źiṅ || brtan rnams ’dod pa’i rgyu yis mi ’khyab bar || skyes bu dam pa kun du ’gro bar byed ||

31.01.S10udanav_u:uv_31.1_0-1: durnigrahasya laghuno yatrakāmanipātinaḥ / cittasya damanaṁ sādhu cittaṁ dāntaṁ sukhāvaham //
31.01.uv-kg31#770: || gzuṅ bar dka’ źiṅ yaṅ ba daṅ || gaṅ du dga’ bar ’gro ba yi || sems dul ba ni legs pa ste || sems dul ba yis bde ba ’dren ||

31.02.S10udanav_u:uv_31.2_0-1: vārijo vā sthale kṣipta okād oghāt samuddhṛtaḥ / parispandati vai cittaṁ māradheyaṁ prahātavai //
31.02.uv-kg31#771: bdud kyi gźi dag spoṅ pa na || chu bo’i gnas nas rab bton te || thaṅ la bor ba’i ña lta bur || bdag gi sems ni yoṅs su g-yo ||

31.03.S10udanav_u:uv_31.3_0-1: pṛthag vidhāvate cittaṁ sūryasyeva hi raśmayaḥ /tat paṇḍito vārayati hy aṅkuśenaiva kuñjaram //
31.03.uv-kg31#772: ñi ma las ni ’od zer ltar || bdag gi sems ni so sor rgyug || de dag mkhas pas ṅes bzlog ste || lcags kyu yis ni glaṅ chen bźin ||

31.04.S10udanav_u:uv_31.4_0-1: bhrūṇadheyam idaṁ cittaṁ niḥsāram anidarśanam / sadainam anuśāsāmi mā me 'narthāya niścaret //
31.04.uv-kg31#773: ṅa la don med spyod pa daṅ || bltar med sñiṅ po med pa de || rtag tu gdul bar bya ba’i phyir || sems de la ni ṅa smra’o ||

31.05.S10udanav_u:uv_31.5_0-1: idaṁ purā cittam acāri cārikāṁ yenecchakaṁ yena kāmaṁ yatheṣṭam /tat saṁnigṛhṇāmi hi yoniśas tv idaṁ nāgaṁ prabhinnaṁ hi yathāṅkuśena //
31.05.uv-kg31#774: sems ’di sṅon chad ji ltar ’dod pa daṅ || dga’ dgur spyod ciṅ rgyu bar byed pa dag || glaṅ chen myos la mi yis lcags kyu ltar || de ni tshul bźin bya bas de bzuṅ ṅo ||

31.06.S10udanav_u:uv_31.6_0-1: anekaṁ jātisaṁsāraṁ saṁdhāvitvā punaḥ punaḥ / gṛhakārakaiṣamāṇas tvaṁ duḥkhā jātiḥ punah punaḥ //
31.06.uv-kg31#775: khaṅ khyim byed pa ’di yis ni || yaṅ yaṅ skye ba’i sdug bsṅal can || skye ba’i ’khor ba du ma źig || da ltar phan cad khyod kyis phyuṅ ||

31.07.S10udanav_u:uv_31.7_0-1: gṛhakāraka dṛṣṭo 'si na punar gehaṁ kariṣyasi / sarve te pārśukā bhagnā gṛhakūṭaṁ visaṁskṛtam / visaṁskāragate citte ihaiva kṣayam adhyagāḥ //
31.07.uv-kg31#776: khaṅ khyim byed pa khyod mthoṅ bas || khyim gyi gduṅ chen rnam bcom la || phyam rnams thams cad bcag nas su || phyin cad khyim byed mi gźug go || sems ni ’du byed daṅ phral nas || ’di ñid la ni zad par ’dod ||

31.08.uv31#31.8A: dūraṁgamam ekacaram aśarīraṁ guhāśayam / ye cittaṁ damayiṣyanti vimokṣyante mahābhayāt //
31.08.uv-kg31#778: gaṅ źig lus med phug na gnas || gcig pu rgyu źiṅ riṅ ’gro ba’i || sems de ’dul bar byed pa ni || ’jigs pa che las thar bar ’gyur ||

31.09.S10udanav_u:uv_31.9_0-1: na dveṣī dveṣiṇaḥ kuryād vairī vā vairiṇo hitam / mithyāpraṇihitaṁ cittaṁ yat kuryād ātmanātmanaḥ //
31.09.uv-kg31#779: log pa’i smon ldan sems gaṅ gis || bdag ñid sdug bsṅal byed ’gyur ba’i || de ltar ’khon gyis ’khon can daṅ || dgra bos dgra la’aṅ byed mi ’gyur ||

31.1.S10udanav_u:uv_31.10_0-1: na taṁ mātā pitā vāpi kuryāj jñātis tathāparaḥ / samyakpraṇihitaṁ cittaṁ yat kuryād dhitam ātmanaḥ //
31.1.uv-kg31#780: yaṅ dag smon ldan sems gaṅ gis || bdag ñid bde bar byed ’gyur ba || de ltar pha daṅ ma dag daṅ || gñen gźan gyis kyaṅ byed mi ’gyur ||

31.11.S10udanav_u:uv_31.11_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ ducchannaṁ vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati / evaṁ hy abhāvitaṁ cittaṁ rāgaḥ samatibhindati //
31.11.uv-kg31#781: ji ltar khoṅ steṅ g-yogs ñes na || char pa yoṅs su ’dzag pa ltar || de bźin sems ni ma bsgoms pa || ’dod chags rnams kyis yoṅs su bcom ||

31.12.S10udanav_u:uv_31.12_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ ducchannaṁ vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati / evaṁ hy abhāvitaṁ cittaṁ dveṣaḥ samatibhindati //
31.12.uv-kg31#783: ji ltar khaṅ steṅ g-yogs ñes na || char pa yoṅs su ’dzag pa ltar || de bźin sems ni ma bsgoms pa || źe sdaṅ rnams kyis yoṅs su bcom ||

31.14.S10udanav_u:uv_31.14_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ ducchannaṁ vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati / evaṁ hy abhāvitaṁ cittaṁ mānaḥ samatibhindati //
31.14.uv-kg31#787: ji ltar khaṅ steṅ g-yogs ñes na || char ba yoṅs su ’dzag pa ltar || de bźin sems ni ma bsgoms pa || ṅa rgyal rnams kyis yoṅs su bcom ||

31.15.S10udanav_u:uv_31.15_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ ducchannaṁ vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati / evaṁ hy abhāvitaṁ cittaṁ lobhaḥ samatibhindati //

31.16.S10udanav_u:uv_31.16_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ ducchannaṁ vṛṣṭiḥ samatibhindati / evaṁ hy abhāvitaṁ cittaṁ tṛṣṇā samatibhindati //
31.16.uv-kg31#791: ji ltar khaṅ steṅ g-yogs ñes na || char pa yoṅs su ’dzag pa ltar || de bźin sems ni ma bsgoms pa || sred pa rnams kyis yoṅs su bcom ||

31.17.S10udanav_u:uv_31.17_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ succhannaṁ vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati / evaṁ subhāvitaṁ cittaṁ rāgo na vyatibhindati //
31.17.uv-kg31#782: ji ltar khaṅ steṅ g-yogs legs na || char pa rnam par mi ’dzag pa || de bźin legs par bsgoms pa’i sems || ’dod chags rnams kyis yoṅ mi choms ||

31.18.S10udanav_u:uv_31.18_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ succhannaṁ vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati / evaṁ subhāvitaṁ cittaṁ dveṣo na vyatibhindati //
31.18.uv-kg31#784: ji ltar khaṅ steṅ g-yogs legs na || char pa rnam par mi ’dzag pa || de bźin legs par bsgoms pa’i sems || źe sdaṅ rnams kyis yoṅ mi choms ||

31.19.S10udanav_u:uv_31.19_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ succhannaṁ vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati / evaṁ subhāvitaṁ cittaṁ moho na vyatibhindati //
31.19.uv-kg31#786: ji ltar khaṅ steṅ g-yogs legs na || char pa rnam par mi ’dzag pa || de bźin legs par bsgoms pa’i sems || gti mug rnams kyis yoṅ mi choms ||

31.2.S10udanav_u:uv_31.20_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ succhannaṁ vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati / evaṁ subhāvitaṁ cittaṁ māno na vyatibhindati //
31.2.uv-kg31#788: ji ltar khaṅ steṅ g-yogs legs na || char pa rnam par mi ’dzag pa || de bźin legs par bsgoms pa’i sems || ṅa rgyal rnams kyis yoṅ mi choms ||

31.21.S10udanav_u:uv_31.21_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ succhannaṁ vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati / evaṁ subhāvitaṁ cittaṁ lobho na vyatibhindati //
31.21.uv-kg31#790: ji ltar khaṅ steṅ g-yogs legs na || char pa rnam par mi ’dzag pa || de bźin legs par bsgoms pa’i sems || chags pa rnams kyis yoṅ mi choms ||

31.22.S10udanav_u:uv_31.22_0-1: yathā hy agāraṁ succhannaṁ vṛṣṭir na vyatibhindati / evaṁ subhāvitaṁ cittaṁ tṛṣṇā na vyatibhindati //
31.22.uv-kg31#792: ji ltar khaṅ steṅ g-yogs legs na || char pa rnam par mi ’dzag pa || de bźin legs par bsgoms pa’i sems || sred pa rnams kyis yoṅ mi choms ||

31.23.S10udanav_u:uv_31.23_0-1: manaḥpūrvaṅgamā dharmā manaḥśreṣṭhā manojavāḥ / manasā hi praduṣṭena bhāṣate vā karoti vā / tatas taṁ duḥkham anveti cakraṁ vā vahataḥ padam //
31.23.uv-kg31#793: chos kyi sṅon du yid ’gro ste || yid mgyogs yid ni gtso bo yin || gal te yid rab gdug pa yis || smras sam yaṅ na byas kyaṅ ruṅ || de yis de ni sdug bsṅal ’thob || ’khor los mgo bo bcad pa bźin ||

31.24.S10udanav_u:uv_31.24_0-1: manaḥpūrvaṅgamā dharmā manaḥśreṣṭhā manojavāḥ / manasā hi prasannena bhāṣate vā karoti vā / tatas taṁ sukham anveti cchāyā vā hy anugāminī //
31.24.uv-kg31#794: chos kyi sṅon du yid ’gro ste || yid mgyogs yid ni gtso bo yin || gal te yid rab daṅ ba yis || smras sam yaṅ na byas kyaṅ ruṅ || de yis de ni bde ba ’thob || grib ma rjes su ’braṅ ba bźin ||

31.25.S10udanav_u:uv_31.25_0-1: nāprasannena cittena duṣṭena kṣubhitena vā / dharmo hi śakyam ājñātuṁ saṁrambhabahulena vā //
31.25.uv-kg31#796: sdaṅ ba’am yaṅ na ’khrug pa’am || dad pa med pa’i sems dag gis || rdzogs saṅs rgyas kyis bstan pa yi || dam chos kun śes mi nus so ||

31.26.S10udanav_u:uv_31.26_0-1: vinīya yas tu saṁrambham aprasādaṁ ca cetasā / āghātaṁ caiva niḥsṛjya prajānīyāt subhāṣitam //
31.26.uv-kg31#797: gaṅ gis bag med sems daṅ ni || khro ba rnam par btul ba daṅ || ’di na gnod sems rab spaṅs pa || des ni legs par bśad pa śes ||

31.27.S10udanav_u:uv_31.27_0-1: na pratyanīkasāreṇa suvijñeyaṁ subhāṣitam / upakliṣṭena cittena saṁrambhabahulena vā //
31.27.uv-kg31#795: brtsad pa ched cher ’dzin pa daṅ || sems ni ñon moṅs gyur pa yis || glags skabs tshol bar byed pa yis || legs bśad legs par mi śes so ||

31.28.S10udanav_u:uv_31.28_0-1: anavasthitacittasya saddharmam avijānataḥ / pāriplavaprasādasya prajñā na paripūryate //
31.28.uv-kg31#798: sems kyi brtan pa med pa yis || dam chos rnam par śes mi ’gyur || dad pa ’gyur ldog byed pa yi || śes rab yoṅs su rdzogs mi ’gyur ||

31.29.S10udanav_u:uv_31.29_0-1: srotāṁsi yasya ṣaṭtiṁśan manaḥprasravaṇāni hi / vahanti nityaṁ durdṛṣṭeḥ saṁkalpair gredhaniḥśritaiḥ //
31.29.uv-kg31#799: kun rtog la chums rten pa yi || lta ṅan sum cu rtsa drug gi || chu bo’i rgyun ni gaṅ yin pa || yid kyi rgyun las rab tu ’bab ||

31.3.S10udanav_u:uv_31.30_0-1: ratim anusṛtam indriyānugaṁ puruṣaṁ cittavaśānuvartakam / yaśa iha hi jahāti sarvadā drumam iva śīrṇaphalaṁ yathāṇḍajaḥ //
31.3.uv-kg31#800: dga’ sems dbaṅ po phal pa daṅ || sems kyi rjes ’braṅ źan pa yi || mi de’i grags ’grib ’bras lhags pa’i || ljon śiṅ la ni bya bźin no ||

31.31.S10udanav_u:uv_31.31_0-1: ātāpī vihara tvam apramatto mā te kāmaguṇo matheta cittam / mā lohaguḍāṁ gileḥ pramattaḥ krandaṁ vai narakeṣu pacyamānaḥ //
31.31.uv-kg31#801: sems khyod phuṅ khrol ’dod la dga’ ma byed || brtson sems bag yod pa la gnas par gyis || bag med byas pas dmyal bar btsos pa daṅ || lcags goṅ mid pas khyod ni ma ṅu śig ||

31.32.S10udanav_u:uv_31.32_0-1: utthānakāleṣu nihīnavīryo vācā balī tv ālasiko nirāśaḥ / sadaiva saṁkalpahataḥ kusīdo jñānasya mārgaṁ satataṁ na vetti //
31.32.uv-kg31#802: ldaṅ ba’i dus tshe ’dug par byed pa daṅ || laṅ tsho stobs ldan mi ’bad khyim ’dug daṅ || bsam pa rdzogs tshe le lo byed pa yi || mi yi śes rab lam rtogs mi ’gyur ro ||

31.33.S10udanav_u:uv_31.33_0-1: sthūlāṁ vitarkān atha vāpi sūkṣmāṁ samudgatāṁ mānasasaṁplavārtham / vitarkayaṁ vai satataṁ vitarkān etāṁ sadā dhāvati bhrāntacittaḥ //
31.33.uv-kg31#803: phran tshegs rnam rtogs źib mor rnam rtog pas || naṅ na gnas pa’i yid ni g-yen yaṅ spyod || yid kyi rnam rtog de dag ma śes na || ’khrug sems yaṅ daṅ yaṅ du rgyug par byed ||

31.34.S10udanav_u:uv_31.34_0-1: etāṁs tu vidvāṁ manaso vitarkān ātāpavāṁ saṁvaravāṁ smṛtātmā / jahāty aśeṣān apunarbhavāya samāhito dhyānarataḥ sumedhāḥ //
31.34.uv-kg31#804: gaṅ źig dran ldan rgyan ’byed brtson pa daṅ || rnam par rtog la mkhas pas de śes na || naṅ na gnas pa’i yid ni g-yan spyo ba || thams cad ma lus blo yis rab tu spoṅ ||

31.35.S10udanav_u:uv_31.35_0-1: kumbhopamaṁ kāyam imaṁ viditvā nagaropamaṁ cittam adhiṣṭhitaṁ ca / yudhyeta māraṁ prajñāyudhena jitaṁ ca rakṣed aniveśanaḥ syāt //
31.35.uv-kg31#805: lus ’di bum pa ’dra bar rtogs byas śiṅ || groṅ khyer ’dra ba’i sems kyis sran btsugs nas || śes rab mtshon gyis bdud daṅ g-yul sprad de || btul nas gnas med par ni bsruṅ bar bya ||

31.36.S10udanav_u:uv_31.36_0-1: phenopamaṁ kāyam imaṁ viditvā nagaropamaṁ cittam adhiṣṭhitaṁ ca / yudhyeta māraṁ prajñāyudhena jitaṁ ca rakṣed aniveśanaḥ syāt //
31.36.uv-kg31#807: lus ’di dbu ba ’dra bar rtogs byas śiṅ || groṅ khyer ’dri ba’i sems kyis sran btsugs nas || śes rab mtshon gyis bdud daṅ g-yul sprad de || btul nas gnas med par ni bsruṅ bar bya ||

31.37.S10udanav_u:uv_31.37_0-1: kumbhopamaṁ lokam imaṁ viditvā nagaropamaṁ cittam adhiṣṭhitaṁ ca / yudhyeta māraṁ prajñāyudhena jitaṁ ca rakṣed aniveśanaḥ syāt //
31.37.uv-kg31#806: ’jig rten ’di dag bum pa ’drar rtogs śiṅ || de bźin chos rnams smig rgyu ’drar śes nas || śes rab mtshon gyis bdud daṅ g-yul sprad de || btul nas gnas med parani bsruṅ bar bya ||

31.38.S10udanav_u:uv_31.38_0-1: phenopamaṁ lokam imaṁ viditvā nagaropamaṁ cittam adhiṣṭhitaṁ ca / yudhyeta māraṁ prajñāyudhena jitaṁ ca rakṣed aniveśanaḥ syāt //
31.38.uv-kg31#808: ’jig rten ’di dag dbu ba ’drar rtogs śiṅ || groṅ khyer ’dra ba’i sems kyis sran btsugs nas || śes rab mtshon gyis bdud daṅ g-yul sprad de || btul nas gnas med par ni bsruṅ bar bya ||

31.39.S10udanav_u:uv_31.39_0-1: saṁbodhyaṅgeṣu yeṣāṁs tu samyak cittaṁ subhāvitam / ādānaṁ pratiniḥsṛjya cānupādāyam āśritāḥ /kṣīṇāsravā vāntadoṣās te loke parinirvṛtāḥ //
31.39.uv-kg31#809: gaṅ gis byaṅ chub yan lag bdun || sems kyis legs par bsgoms pa daṅ || gaṅ źig len la mi dga’ źiṅ || len pa rab tu spaṅs pa daṅ || zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de || ’jig rten dag na mya ṅan ’das ||

31.4.S10udanav_u:uv_31.40_0-1: svacittam anurakṣaṁ vai svavālaṁ camarī yathā / bhūteṣu ca dayāpannaḥ sukhān na parihīyate //
31.4.uv-kg31#810: gaṅ źig g-yag rṅa’i rtse mo ltar || raṅ gi sems ni rjes sruṅ źiṅ || ’byuṅ po rnams la brtser ldan pa || de yi bde ba yoṅ mi ñams ||

31.41.S10udanav_u:uv_31.41_0-1: etaṁ nāgasya nāgena tv īṣādantasya hastinaḥ / sameti cittaṁ cittena yad eko ramate vane //
31.41.uv-kg31#811: gaṅ phyir glaṅ po’i glaṅ po che || mche ba bzaṅ po’i glaṅ chen daṅ || sems daṅ sems ni mñam pas na || de phyir gcig pu nags su dgyes ||

31.42.uv31#31.42B: avyāpannena cittena yo bhūtāny anukampate / maitraḥ sa sarvabhūteṣu vairaṁ tasya na kena cit //
31.42.uv-kg31#812: gaṅ gi yid la gnod med ciṅ || ’byuṅ po kun la brtse ba daṅ || ’byuṅ po rnams la byams byed pa || de la nams kyaṅ ’khon mi ’byuṅ ||

31.43.S10udanav_u:uv_31.43_0-1: ekam api cet prāṇam aduṣṭacitto maitrāyate kuśalaṁ tena hi syāt / sarvāṁs tu satvāṁ manasānukampaṁ prabhūtam āryaḥ prakaroti puṇyam //
31.43.uv-kg31#815: gal te gaṅ źig srog chags ’ga’ la’aṅ sdaṅ med sems || byams par byed na de yis de ni dge ba yin || sems can thams cad la ni yid kyis brtse byas na || bsod nams phal chen ’phags pas rab tu bsgrub par ’gyur ||

31.44.S10udanav_u:uv_31.44_0-1: yo hy udagreṇa cittena tv adīnena sadā naraḥ / bhāvayet kuśalāṁ dharmāṁ yogakṣemasya prāptaye //
31.44.uv-kg31#816: mi gaṅ dga’ ba’i sems daṅ ni || źum pa med pa’i yod kyis su || dge ba’i chos la sgom byed pa || grub pa daṅ ni bde ba ’thob ||

31.45.S10udanav_u:uv_31.45_0-1: śāntam asya mano bhavati śāntā vāk kāyakarma ca / samyagājñāvimuktasya hy upaśāntasya bhikṣuṇaḥ //
31.45.uv-kg31#817: yaṅ dag śes pas rnam grol źiṅ || skyo ba ñe bar źi gyur pa || de yis yid ni źi gyur ciṅ || lus daṅ ṅag gi las kyaṅ źi ||

31.46.S10udanav_u:uv_31.46_0-1: pañcāṅgikena tūryeṇa na ratir bhavati tādṛśī / yādṛśy ekāgracittasya samyag dharmāṁ vipaśyataḥ //
31.46.uv-kg31#818: ji ltar rtse gcig sems kyis no || chos rnams legs par mthoṅ ba ltar || sil sñan yan lag lṅa pas kyaṅ || de ltar dga’ bar byed mi ’gyur ||

31.47.S10udanav_u:uv_31.47_0-1: sukhaṁ svapanti munayo na te śocanti māmikām / yeṣāṁ dhyānarataṁ cittaṁ kāmas teṣāṁ na vidyate //
31.47.uv-kg31#819: gaṅ yid tiṅ ’dzin la dga’ ba || de dag ’dod pas rtse mi byed || gaṅ źig cuṅ zad gduṅ med pa’i || skyob pa bde bar la bar ’gyur ||

31.48.S10udanav_u:uv_31.48_0-1: sukhaṁ modanti munayo na te śocanti māmikām / yeṣāṁ dhyānarataṁ cittaṁ vartmas teṣāṁ na vidyate //
31.48.uv-kg31#820: gaṅ yid tiṅ ’dzin la dga’ ba || de dag ’dod pas rtse na mi byed || gaṅ źig cuṅ zad gduṅ med pa’i || thub pa kye ma’o dga’ bar ’gyur ||

31.49.S10udanav_u:uv_31.49_0-1: yasya śailopamaṁ cittaṁ sthitaṁ nānuprakampate / viraktaṁ rajanīyebhyaḥ kopanīye na kupyate / yasyaivaṁ bhāvitaṁ cittaṁ kutas taṁ duḥkham eṣyati //
31.49.uv-kg31#821: gaṅ gi sems ni brag lta bur || rab tu g-yo ba med ’dug pa || chags pa’i gnas la mi chags te || khro ba’i gnas la ’khrug med par || gaṅ yid de ltar gyur pa de || sdug bsṅal thob par ga la ’gyur ||

31.5.S10udanav_u:uv_31.50_0-1: nopavādī nopaghātī prātimokṣe ca saṁvaraḥ / mātrajñatā ca bhakteṣu prāntaṁ ca śayanāsanam / adhicitte samāyoga etad buddhasya śāsanam //
31.5.uv-kg31#822: skur pa mi gdab gnod mi bya || so sor thar pas bsdam par bya || zas kyi tshod kyaṅ śes par bya || bas mtha’ dgon par gnas bya źiṅ || lhag pa’i sems la rnal ’byor bya || ’di ni saṅs rgyas bstan pa yin ||

31.51.S10udanav_u:uv_31.51_0-1: cittanimittasya kovidaḥ pravivekasya rasaṁ prajānakaḥ / dhyāyī nipakaḥ pratismṛto vetti prītisukhaṁ nirāmiṣam //
31.51.uv-kg31#823: sems kyi rtags la mkhas pa daṅ || rab tu dben pa’i ro rñed daṅ || rab draṅ sems pa’i ’grus skyoṅ can || zaṅ ziṅ med pa’i dga’ ba myoṅ ||

31.52.S10udanav_u:uv_31.52_0-1: manaś ca yo rakṣati bhāṣitaṁ ca ceṣṭe ca kāyasya sadaiva yuktaḥ / sa prāpya śokaṁ hi na duḥkhitaḥ syāt satyasthitaḥ satyavidaḥ sumedhāḥ //
31.52.uv-kg31#824: gaṅ źig yid gźuṅs dben dga’ dben gnas pas || rtag tu raṅ gi lus kyis spyod lam daṅ || smra daṅ yid ni sruṅ bar byed pa de || mya ṅan spoṅ źiṅ sdug bsṅal ’thob mi ’gyur ||

31.53.S10udanav_u:uv_31.53_0-1: arakṣitena cittena mithyādṛṣṭihatena ca / stīnamiddhābhibhūtena vaśaṁ mṛtyor nigacchati //
31.53.uv-kg31#825: ma bsruṅs pa yi sems dag ni || log par lta bas bcom pa daṅ || gñid daṅ rmugs pas zil non pa || bdud kyi dbaṅ du ’gro bar ’gyur ||

31.54.S10udanav_u:uv_31.54_0-1: tasmād rakṣitacittaḥ syāt samyaksaṁkalpagocaraḥ / samyagdṛṣṭipuraskāro jñātvā caivodayavyayam / stīnamiddhābhibhūr bhikṣuḥ sarvadurgatayo jahet //
31.54.uv-kg31#826: de bas sems ni bsruṅ byas te || yaṅ dag lta bas mdun bdar ciṅ || yaṅ dag kun rtog spyod yul can || yaṅ dag skye daṅ ’jig pa śes || gñid daṅ rmugs pa zil gnon pa’i || dge sloṅ sdug bsṅal zad pa ’thob ||

31.55.S10udanav_u:uv_31.55_0-1: cittasya hi saṁyamaḥ sukhaṁ cittaṁ rakṣata mā pramadyata / cittena hi vañcitā prajā hy ekatyā narakeṣu pacyate //
31.55.uv-kg31#827: bag yod sems ni bsruṅ ba daṅ || sems dul yaṅ dag sdom pa bde || skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag || gcig tu sems can dmyal bar ’tshed ||

31.56.S10udanav_u:uv_31.56_0-1: cittasya hi saṁyamaḥ sukhaṁ cittaṁ rakṣata mā pramadyata / cittena hi vañcitā prajā hy ekatyā tīryakṣu pacyate //
31.56.uv-kg31#828: bag yod sems ni bsruṅ ba daṅ || sems dul yaṅ dag sdom pa bde || skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag || gcig tu dud ’gro rnams su ’tshed ||

31.57.S10udanav_u:uv_31.57_0-1: cittasya hi saṁyamaḥ sukhaṁ cittaṁ rakṣata mā pramadyata / cittena hi vañcitā prajā hy ekatyā preteṣu pacyate //
31.57.uv-kg31#829: bag yod sems ni bsruṅ ba daṅ ||sems dul yaṅ dag sdom pa bde || skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag || gcig tu yi dgas rnams su ’tshed ||

31.58.S10udanav_u:uv_31.58_0-1: cittasya hi saṁyamaḥ sukhaṁ cittaṁ rakṣata mā pramadyata / citte tu surakṣite prajā hy ekatyā manujeṣu modate //
31.58.uv-kg31#830: bag yod sems ni bsruṅ ba daṅ || sems dul yaṅ dag sdom pa bde || skye dgu sems ni bsruṅ ba dag || gcig tu mi yi naṅ du dga’ ||

31.59.S10udanav_u:uv_31.59_0-1: cittasya hi saṁyamaḥ sukhaṁ cittaṁ rakṣata mā pramadyata / citte tu surakṣite prajā hy ekatyā svargeṣu modate //
31.59.uv-kg31#831: bag yod sems ni bsruṅ ba daṅ || sems dul yaṅ dag sdom pa bde || skye dgu sems ni bsruṅ ba dag || gcig tu mtho ris rnams su dga’ ||

31.6.S10udanav_u:uv_31.60_0-1: cittasya hi saṁyamaḥ sukhaṁ cittaṁ rakṣata mā pramadyata / citte tu surakṣite prajā hy ekatyā nirvāṇam āpnute //
31.6.uv-kg31#832: bag yod sems ni bsruṅ ba daṅ || sems dul yaṅ dag sdom pa bde || skye dgu sems ni bsruṅ ba dag || gcig tu mya ṅan ’das pa ’thob ||

32.01.S10udanav_u:uv_32.1_0-1: piṇḍacārikāya bhikṣave hy ātmabharāya nānyapoṣiṇe / devāḥ spṛhayanti tāyine hy upaśāntāya sadā smṛtātmane //
32.01.uv-kg32#833: || dge sloṅ bsod sñoms byed pa bdag raṅ tsam || ’graṅs bar byed kyi gźan dag mi gso ba || rtag tu ñer źi dran daṅ ldan pa yi || skyob pa de la lha rnams dga’ bar byed ||

32.02.S10udanav_u:uv_32.2_0-1: piṇḍapātikāya bhikṣave hy ātmabharāya nānyapoṣiṇe / devāḥ spṛhayanti tāyine na tu satkārayaśo 'bhikāṅkṣiṇe //
32.02.uv-kg32#834: dge sloṅ bsod sñoms byed pa bdag raṅ tsam || ’graṅs par byed kyi gźan dag mi gso ba || skyob pa de la lha rnams dga’ byed kyi || bkur sti nor daṅ grags ’dod rnams la min ||

32.03.S10udanav_u:uv_32.3_0-1: sarvakarmajahasya bhikṣuṇo dhunvānasya puraskṛtaṁ rajaḥ / amamasya sadā sthitātmano hy artho nāsti janasya lāpanam //
32.03.uv-kg32#835: dge sloṅ ’dod pa kun spaṅs śiṅ || mdun na gnas pa’i rdul bsal ba || bdag med thub pa brten pa yis || gźan la smra bar bya mi dgos ||

32.04.S10udanav_u:uv_32.4_0-1: tudanti vācābhir asaṁyatā janāḥ śarair hi saṁgrāmagataṁ yathā gajam / śrutvā tu vācāṁ paruṣām udīritām adhivāsayed bhikṣur aduṣṭacittaḥ //
32.04.uv-kg32#836: skye bo ma bsdams tshig gis gnod byed pa || mi bzad rjod pa’i tshig de thos gyur kyaṅ || dge sloṅ sdaṅ sems bral la ci mi sñam || g-yul ṅor glaṅ chen mda’ yis bsnun pa bźin || (skye bo ma bsdams tshig gis gnod beyada pa || mi bzad rjod pa’i tshig de thos gyur kyaṅ || dge sloṅ yid legs bźag la ji mi sñam || g-yul ṅor glaṅ chen mda’ yis bsnun pa bźin ||)

32.05.S10udanav_u:uv_32.5_0-1: yas tv alpajīvī laghur ātmakāmo yatendriyaḥ sarvagatiḥ pramuktaḥ / anokasārī hy amamo nirāśaḥ kāmaṁjahaś caikacaraḥ sa bhikṣuḥ //
32.05.uv-kg32#837: bzo yis mi ’tsho yaṅ źiṅ bdag la dga’ || dbaṅ po dul źiṅ kun las rnam grol źiṅ || khyim la ma chags bag med ’dod sred spaṅs || gcig pu spyod byed de ni dge sloṅ yin ||

32.06.S10udanav_u:uv_32.6_0-1: mātraṁ bhajeta pratirūpaṁ śuddhājīvo bhavet sadā / pratisaṁstāravṛttiḥ syād ācārakuśalo bhavet /tataḥ prāmodyabahulaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet //
32.06.uv-kg32#838: ’tsho gtsaṅ sñom las med pa yi || grogs po ’thun pa bsten bya źiṅ || so sor bgo bśa’ bya ba daṅ || spyod yul cho ga mkhas par bya || spyod yul cho ga mkhas pa yis || sdug bsṅal zad pa thob par ’gyur ||

32.07.S10udanav_u:uv_32.7_0-1: hastasaṁyataḥ pādasaṁyato vācāsaṁyataḥ sarvasaṁyataḥ / ādhyātmarataḥ samāhito hy ekaḥ saṁtuṣito hi yaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ //
32.07.uv-kg32#839: lag pa legs bsdams rkaṅ pa legs bsdams daṅ || tshig rnams legs bsdams dbaṅ po legs bsdams śiṅ || gcig pu naṅ du mñam par ’jog la dga’ || chos śes de ni dge sloṅ yin źes gsuṅ ||

32.08.S10udanav_u:uv_32.8_0-1: dharmārāmo dharmarato dharmam evānucintayan / dharmaṁ cānusmaraṁ bhikṣur dharmān na parihīyate //
32.08.uv-kg32#840: dge sloṅ chos la kun dga’ źiṅ || chos dga’ chos la sems pa daṅ || chos la rjes su dran pa dag || chos las yoṅs su ñams mi ’gyur ||

32.09.S10udanav_u:uv_32.9_0-1: śunyāgāraṁ praviṣṭasya prahitātmasya bhikṣuṇaḥ / amānuṣā ratir bhavati samyag dharmāṁ vipaśyataḥ //
32.09.uv-kg32#841: dge sloṅ khaṅ stoṅ źugs nas su || naṅ la lta bar byed pa daṅ || chos rnams legs par mthoṅ ba dag || lha yi dga’ daṅ ldan par ’gyur ||

32.1.S10udanav_u:uv_32.10_0-1: yato yataḥ saṁpṛśati skandhānām udayavyayam / prāmodyaṁ labhate tatra prītyā sukham analpakam /tataḥ prāmodyabahulaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet //
32.1.uv-kg32#842: ji lta ji ltar phuṅ po la || skye daṅ ’jig par legs rtogs pa || de lta de ltar de yis ni || dga’ daṅ mgu ba ñid kyaṅ ’thob || dge sloṅ dga’ ba maṅ po yis || sdug bsṅal zad pa thob par ’gyur ||

32.11.S10udanav_u:uv_32.11_0-1: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate / evaṁ rāgakṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
32.11.uv-kg32#843: ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag || rluṅ gis rab tu mi g-yos ltar || de bźin dge sloṅ ’dod chags dag || zad pa kun tu rab mi g-yo ||

32.12.S10udanav_u:uv_32.12_0-1: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate / evaṁ dveṣakṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
32.12.uv-kg32#844: ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag || rluṅ gis rab tu mi g-yos ltar|| de bźin dge sloṅ źe sdaṅ dag || zad pa kun tu rab mi g-yo ||

32.13.S10udanav_u:uv_32.13_0-1: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate / evaṁ mohakṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
32.13.uv-kg32#845: ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag || rluṅ gis rab tu mi g-yos ltar || de bźin dge sloṅ gti mug dag || zad pa kun tu rab mi g-yo ||

32.14.S10udanav_u:uv_32.14_0-1: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate / evaṁ mānakṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
32.14.uv-kg32#846: ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag || rluṅ gis rab tu mi g-yos ltar || de bźin dge sloṅ ṅa rgyal dag || zad pa kun du rab mi g-yo ||

32.15.S10udanav_u:uv_32.15_0-1: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate / evaṁ lobhakṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
32.15.uv-kg32#847: ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag || rluṅ gis rab tu mi g-yos ltar || de bźin dge sloṅ chags pa dag || zad pa ku tu rab mi g-yo ||

32.16.S10udanav_u:uv_32.16_0-1: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate / evaṁ tṛṣṇākṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate //
32.16.uv-kg32#848: ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag || rluṅ gis rab tu mi g-yos ltar || de bźin dge sloṅ sred pa dag || zad pa kun du rab mi g-yo ||

32.17.S10udanav_u:uv_32.17_0-1: yasya saṁnicayo nāsti yasya nāsti mamāyitam / asantaṁ śocate naiva sa vai bhikṣur nirucyate //
32.17.uv-kg32#849: gaṅ la kun du sogs med ciṅ || gaṅ la bdag gir byed med pa || gaṅ dag med na’aṅ mi gduṅ ba || de ni dge sloṅ źes brjod do ||

32.18.S10udanav_u:uv_32.18_0-1: bhikṣur na tāvatā bhavati yāvatā bhikṣate parān / veśmāṁ dharmāṁ samādāya bhikṣur bhavati na tāvatā //
32.18.uv-kg32#850: re źig gźan la sloṅ ba tsam || ji ga dge sloṅ min pa sñam || groṅ pa’i chos ni ’dzin byed pa || ji ga dge sloṅ min pa sñam ||

32.2.S10udanav_u:uv_32.20_0-1: maitrāvihārī yo bhikṣuḥ prasanno buddhaśāsane / adhigacchet padaṁ śāntam asecanakadarśanam //
32.2.uv-kg32#852: dge sloṅ gaṅ źig byams gnas śiṅ || saṅs rgyas bstan la rab daṅ ba || des ni blta bas mi ṅoms pa’i|| źi ba’i go ’phaṅ thob par ’gyur ||

32.22.S10udanav_u:uv_32.22_0-1: maitrāvihārī yo bhikṣuḥ prasanno buddhaśāsane / abhavyaḥ parihāṇāya nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike //
32.22.uv-kg32#854: dge sloṅ gaṅ źig byams gnas śiṅ || saṅs rgyas bstan la rab daṅ bas || mya ṅan ’das daṅ ñe ba’i phyir || yoṅs su ñams ’gyur mi srid do ||

32.23.S10udanav_u:uv_32.23_0-1: udagracittaḥ sumanā hy abhibhūya priyāpriyam / prāmodyabahulo bhikṣur duḥkhakṣayam avāpnuyāt //
32.23.uv-kg32#855: sems dga’ yid ni bzaṅ ba daṅ || dga’ daṅ mi dga’ zil gnon pa’i || dge sloṅ dga’ ba maṅ po yis || sdug bsṅal zad pa thob par ’gyur ||

32.24.uv-kg32#856: lus źiṅ ṅag ni źi ba daṅ || sems źi legs par mñam źag ciṅ || ’jig rten zaṅ ziṅ spaṅs pa yi || dge sloṅ ñer źi yin źes brjod || (tiṅ ’dzin med la śes rab med || śes rab med la tiṅ ’dzin med || śes rab tiṅ ’dzin ldan pa de || dge sloṅ yin źes brjod par bya ||)

32.25.S10udanav_u:uv_32.25_0-1: nāsty aprajñasya vai dhyānaṁ prajñā nādhyāyato 'sti ca / yasya dhyānaṁ tathā prajñā sa vai nirvāṇasāntike //
32.25.uv-kg32#857: tiṅ ’dzin med la śes rab med || śes rab med la tiṅ ’dzin med || śes rab tiṅ ’dzin ldan pa de || ma ṅan ’das daṅ ñe ba ñid ||

32.26.S10udanav_u:uv_32.26_0-1: tasmād dhyānaṁ tathā prajñām anuyujyeta paṇḍitaḥ / tasyāyam ādir bhavati tathā prājñasya bhikṣuṇaḥ //
32.26.uv-kg32#858: de bas tiṅ ’dzin śes rab la || mkhas pa rnams kyis ’jug bya ste || de bźin śes rab dge sloṅ de’i || daṅ por bya ba ’di yin no ||

32.27.S10udanav_u:uv_32.27_0-1: saṁtuṣṭir indriyair guptiḥ prātimokṣe ca saṁvaraḥ / mātrajñatā ca bhakteṣu prāntaṁ ca śayanāsanam / adhicitte samāyogaṁ yasyāsau bhikṣur ucyate //
32.27.uv-kg32#859: dge sloṅ yaṅ dag sdom spyod pas || chog śes dbaṅ po bsdam bya źiṅ || so sor thar pas bsdam par bya || zas kyi tshod kyaṅ śes par bya || bas mtha’ dgon par gnas bya źiṅ || lhag pa’i sems la rnal ’byor bya || ’di ni saṅs rgyas bstan pa yin ||

32.28.S10udanav_u:uv_32.28_0-1: yasya kāyena vācā ca manasā ca na duṣkṛtam / kalyāṇaśīlam āhus taṁ hrīmantaṁ bhikṣum uttamam //
32.28.uv-kg32#860: gaṅ gi lus daṅ ṅag daṅ ni || yid la ñes byas med gyur pa || de ni dge ba’i tshul khrims can || ṅo tsha’i yid ldan dge sloṅ yin ||

32.29.S10udanav_u:uv_32.29_0-1: dharmāḥ subhāvitā yasya saptasaṁbodhapakṣikāḥ / kalyāṇadharmam āhus taṁ sadā bhikṣuṁ samāhitam //
32.29.uv-kg32#861: gaṅ gis rdzogs pa’i byaṅ chub kyi || phyogs kyi chos bdun legs bsgoms pa || de ni dge ba’i chos can de || mñam bźag dge sloṅ yin źes gsuṅ ||

32.3.S10udanav_u:uv_32.30_0-1: ihaiva yaḥ prajānāti duḥkhasya kṣayam ātmanaḥ / kalyāṇaprajñam āhus taṁ sadā śīlam anāsravam //
32.3.uv-kg32#862: ’di na gaṅ źig bdag ñid kyi || sdug bsṅal zad pa rab śes la || dge źiṅ śes rab ldan pa de || zag med dge sloṅ yin źes gsuṅ ||

32.31.S10udanav_u:uv_32.31_0-1: na śīlavratamātreṇa bahuśrutyena vā punaḥ / tathā samādhilābhena viviktaśayanena vā //
32.31.uv-kg32#863: zag pa zad pa ma thob na || tshul khrims brtul źugs tsam dag gam || yaṅ na thos pa maṅ po ’am || dben pa dag tu gnas kyaṅ ruṅ || tiṅ ’dzin thob par gyur kyaṅ ṅal || gdeṅ drod chod pa’i dge sloṅ min ||

32.34.S10udanav_u:uv_32.34_0-1: loko 'yam anyathābhūto bhavasakto bhave rataḥ /bhavābhinandī satataṁ bhavān na parimucyate //
32.34.uv-kg32#865: ji lta ji ltar bsam byas pa || de lta de ltar gźan du ’gyur || gźan du ’gyur ba’i ’jig rten ’di || srid pa la chags srid la dga’ || srid la mṅon chags srid la dga’ || srid pa ñid la mṅon par dga’ ||

32.35.S10udanav_u:uv_32.35_0-1: yan nandate sa hi bhavo duḥkhasya sa bibheti ca / uṣyate bhavahānāya brahmacaryaṁ mamāntike //
32.35.uv-kg32#866: dga’ bya gaṅ yin de sdug bsṅal || skyi g-ya’ gaṅ yin de bde bas || srid pa rab tu spaṅ ba’i phyir || ’di na tshaṅs par spyod pa ste ||

32.36.S10udanav_u:uv_32.36_0-1: ye bhavena bhavasyaiva prāhur niḥsaraṇaṁ sadā / aniḥsṛtāṁ bhavā sarvāṁs tāṁ vadāmi sadā-v-aham //
32.36.uv-kg32#867: dge sbyoṅ bram ze ji sñed pa || srid pas srid las ṅes ’byuṅ zer || de dag thams cad srid pa las || ṅes ’byuṅ min źes brjod par bya || (dge sbyoṅ bram ze ji sñed pa || srid pas srid las ṅes ’byuṅ zer || de dag thams cad srid pa las || rnam grol min źes brjod par bya ||)

32.37.S10udanav_u:uv_32.37_0-1: pratītya duḥkham upadhiṁ bhavaty upadhisaṁbhavam / kṣayāt sarvopadhīnāṁ tu nāsti duḥkhasya saṁbhavaḥ //
32.37.uv-kg32#868: len pa’i rkyen las sdug bsṅal byuṅ || sdug bsṅal las ni len pa byuṅ || len pa thams cad yoṅs zad na || sdug bsṅal rab tu ’byuṅ ba med ||

32.38.S10udanav_u:uv_32.38_0-1: anityā hi bhavāḥ sarve duḥkhā vipariṇāminaḥ / paśyataḥ prajñayā sarve kṣīyante nābhinanditāḥ //
32.38.uv-kg32#869: len pa thams cad na srid pa’i rnam pa ji sñed yod pa de dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa | sdug bsṅal ba | yoṅs su ’gyur ba’i chos can yin no źes de ltar de dag la yaṅ dge ba’i śes rab kyis ji lta ba bźin du mthoṅ na | srid pa’i sred pa rab tu spoṅ bar ’gyur źiṅ || srid pa med pas mṅon par mi dga’ bar ’gyur ro ||

32.39.S10udanav_u:uv_32.39_0-1: nirvṛtasya sadā bhikṣor āyatyām upaśāmyate / abhibhūto bhavaḥ sarvo duḥkhāntaḥ sa nirucyate //
32.39.uv-kg32#870: de ltar mya ṅan las ’das pa’i dge sloṅ skyob pa ni gźan du len pa med ciṅ yaṅ srid med par ’gyur te | bdud zil gyis non pa daṅ | g-yul las rgyal ba daṅ || srid pa thams cad las rab tu ’das pa ’di lta bu ’di ni sdug bsṅal gyi mtha’ yin no ||

32.4.S10udanav_u:uv_32.40_0-1: sadopaśāntacittasya vastucchinnasya bhikṣuṇaḥ / vikṣīṇo jātisaṁsāro mukto 'sau mārabandhanāt //
32.4.uv-kg32#872: dge sloṅ dṅos po bcad pa daṅ || ñe bar źi źiṅ sems źi ba || de ni bdud kyi ’chiṅ las grol || skye ba’i ’khor ba rnam par spaṅs ||

32.54.uv-kg32#883: gaṅ źig gśe ba daṅ ni gsod pa daṅ || ’chiṅ daṅ groṅ gi tsher ma thul ba daṅ || gaṅ źig ri bo bźin gnas mi bkri źiṅ || sdug bdes mi g-yo de ni dge sloṅ yin ||

32.55.S10udanav_u:uv_32.55_0-1: yo nātyasaraṁ na cātyalīyaṁ jñātvā vitatham imaṁ hi sarvalokam / sa tu bhikṣur idaṁ jahāty apāraṁ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṁ purāṇam //
