32.79.uv-kg32#901: rims nad bcas pa ’ga’ med mi dge ba’i || rtsa ba legs par druṅs phyuṅ dge sloṅ gaṅ || de ni pha rol min pa’i pha rol po || spoṅ ste sbrul rgas pags rñiṅ rje ba bźin ||

32.8.S10udanav_u:uv_32.80_0-1: yasyānuśayā na santi ke cin mūlaṁ cākuśalasya yasya naṣṭam / sa tu bhikṣur idaṁ jahāty apāraṁ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṁ purāṇam //
32.8.uv-kg32#902: bag la ñal ba ’ga’ med mi dge ba’i || rtsa ba legs par druṅs phyuṅ dge sloṅ gaṅ || de ni pha rol min pa’i pha rol po || spoṅ ste sbrul rgas pags rñiṅ rje ba bźin ||

32.81.S10udanav_u:uv_32.81_0-1: sa bhikṣur yasya śīlāni sa dhyāyī yatra śunyatā / sa yogī yatra sātatyaṁ tat sukhaṁ yatra nirvṛtiḥ //
32.81.uv-kg32#903: khrims ldan gaṅ yin dge sloṅ de || stoṅ ñid gaṅ ldan bsam gtan de || rtag tu byed gaṅ rnal ’byor de || mya ṅan ’das gaṅ bde ba de ||

33.01.S10udanav_u:uv_33.1_0-1: na nagnacaryā na jaṭā na paṅkā no 'nāśanaṁ sthaṇḍilaśāyikā vā / na rajomalaṁ notkuṭukaprahāṇaṁ śodheta martyaṁ hy avitīrṇakāṅkṣam //
33.01.uv-kg33#906: gcer bur spyod pas ma yin ral pas ma yin rdzab kyis min || kha zas mi za ba yis ma yin thaṅ la ñal ba ’am || rdul daṅ dri mas ma yin cog pur ’dug la ’bad pa yis || mi rnams dag par mi ’gyur som ñi rnams las rgal mi ’gyur ||

33.02.S10udanav_u:uv_33.2_0-1: alaṁkṛtaś cāpi careta dharmaṁ kṣānto dāṇṭo niyato brahmacārī / sarveṣu bhūteṣu nidhāya daṇḍaṁ sa brahmaṇaḥ sa śramaṇaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ //
33.02.uv-kg33#905: || gaṅ źig brgyan kyaṅ chos spyod dul ba daṅ || źi źiṅ yaṅ dag sdom la tshaṅs par spyod || ’byuṅ po ku la chad pas mi gcod de || bram ze dge sbyoṅ de yin dge sloṅ de ||

33.03.S10udanav_u:uv_33.3_0-1: bhaveṣv eva hi sajyanta eke śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ / antareṇa viṣīdanti hy aprāpyaivāsravakṣayam //
33.03.uv-kg33#907: dge sbyoṅ bram ze gaṅ yaṅ ruṅ || de dag ñid la chags byed pa || zag pa zad pa ma thob par || bar mdor ni rnam par ñams || (dge sbyoṅ bram ze gaṅ yaṅ ruṅ || de dag ñid la chags byed pa || tshor ba zad pa ma thob par || bar ma dor ni rnam par ñams ||)

33.04.S10udanav_u:uv_33.4_0-1: bhaveṣv eva hi sajyanta eke śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ / vigṛhya vivadantīme bālā hy ekāntadarśinaḥ //
33.04.uv-kg33#908: dge sbyoṅ bram ze gaṅ yaṅ ruṅ || de dag ñid la chags byed ciṅ || byis pa mtha’ gcig la lta ba || bar ma dor ni rnam par ñams || (dge sbyoṅ bram ze gaṅ yaṅ ruṅ || de dag ñid la chags byed pa || byis pa’i skye bo blo ṅan rnams || bar ma dor ni rnam par ñams ||)

33.05.S10udanav_u:uv_33.5_0-1: bhaveṣv eva hi sajyanta eke śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ / antareṇa viṣīdanti hy aprāpyaivottamaṁ padam //
33.05.uv-kg33#909: dge sbyoṅ bram ze gaṅ yaṅ ruṅ || de dag ñid la chags byed pa || go ’phaṅ dam pa ma thob par || bar ma dor ni rnam par ñams ||

33.06.uv33#33.6A: kiṁ te jaṭābhir durbuddhe kiṁ cāpy ajinaśāṭibhiḥ /abhyantaraṁ te kaluṣaṁ bāhyakaṁ parimārjasi //
33.06.uv-kg33#911: blo ṅan khyod kyi ral pa ni || khyod kyi g-yaṅ gźi gyon pa ci || khyod naṅ dri ma ldan bźin du || phyi rol legs par byi dor byed ||

33.07.S10udanav_u:uv_33.7_0-1: na jaṭābhir na gotreṇa na jātyā brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ / yasya satyaṁ ca dharmaṁ ca sa śucir brāhmaṇaḥ sa ca //
33.07.uv-kg33#912: rigs kyis bram zer ’gyur ma yin || ral pas ma yin rus kyis min || gaṅ źig bden pa’i chos ldan pa || gtsaṅ ma de yin bram ze yin ||

33.08.S10udanav_u:uv_33.8_0-1: na jaṭābhir na gotreṇa na jātyā brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ / yas tu vāhayate pāpāny aṇusthūlāni sarvaśaḥ / vāhitatvāt tu pāpānāṁ brāhmaṇo vai nirucyate //
33.08.uv-kg33#913: rigs kyis bram zer ’gyur ma yin || ral pas ma yin rus kyis min || gaṅ źig sdig pa che chuṅ rnams || thams cad spoṅ bar byed pa dag || sdig pa rnams ni spaṅs phyir de || bram ze yin źes ṅes par brjod ||

33.09.S10udanav_u:uv_33.9_0-1: na muṇḍitena śramaṇo na bhoḥkāreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ / yasya satyaṁ ca dharmaṁ ca brāhmaṇaḥ śramaṇaḥ sa ca //
33.09.uv-kg33#914: mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyoṅ min || oṃ źes zer ba bram ze min || gaṅ źig dge ba’i chos ldan pa || gtsaṅ ma de yin bram ze de ||

33.1.S10udanav_u:uv_33.10_0-1: na muṇḍitena śramaṇo na bhoḥkāreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ / yas tu vāhayate pāpāny aṇusthūlāni sarvaśaḥ / vāhitatvāt tu pāpānāṁ brāhmaṇaḥ śramaṇaḥ sa ca //
33.1.uv-kg33#915: mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyoṅ min || oṃ źes zer ba bram ze min || gaṅ źig sdig pa che chuṅ rnams || thams cad spoṅ bar byed pa dag || sdig pa rnams ni spaṅs phyir de || dge sbyoṅ bram ze de yin no ||

33.12.S10udanav_u:uv_33.12_0-1: pravāhya pāpakāṁ dharmāṁ ye caranti sadā smṛtāḥ / kṣīṇasaṁyojanā buddhā brāhmaṇās te prakīrtitāḥ //
33.12.uv-kg33#917: gaṅ źig sdig chos rab spaṅs śiṅ || rtag tu dran ldan spyod byed pa || kun sbyor zad pa’i saṅs rgyas de || ’jig rten dag na bram ze yin ||

33.13.S10udanav_u:uv_33.13_0-1: yo brāhmaṇo vāhitapāpadharmo niṣkautilyo niṣkaṣāyaḥ sthitātmā / vedāntagaś coṣitabrahmacaryaḥ kālenāsau brahmavādaṁ vadeta //
33.13.uv-kg33#918: bram ze gaṅ źig sdig pa’i chos spaṅs śiṅ || bdag ñid tshul ’chos med ciṅ rñog med gnas || rig byed mthar phyin tshaṅs par spyod pa spyad || dus su smra byed de ni tshaṅs pa smra ||

33.14.S10udanav_u:uv_33.14_0-1: yasmiṁ na māyā vasate na māno yo vītalobho hy amamo nirāśaḥ / praṇunnadoṣo hy abhinirvṛtātmā sa brāhmaṇaḥ sa śramaṇaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ //
33.14.uv-kg33#919: gaṅ źig sgyu la mi gnas ṅa rgyal med || gaṅ źig chags med bdag med re ba med || ’khrug bcom bdag ñid mya ṅan ’das phyogs de || bram ze dge sbyoṅ de yin dge sloṅ de ||

33.15.S10udanav_u:uv_33.15_0-1: bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ nāhaṁ yonijaṁ mātṛsaṁbhavam / bhovādī nāma sa bhavati sa ced bhavati sakiñcanaḥ / akiñcanam anādānaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.15.uv-kg33#920: gaṅ źig ma yi mṅal skyes nas || gal te ’dzin pa daṅ bcas na || de miṅ bu źes smra bar bstan || bram ze yin par ṅa mi smra || yoṅs su ’dzin med len med de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.16.S10udanav_u:uv_33.16_0-1: yasya kāyena vācā ca manasā ca na duṣkṛtam / susaṁvṛtaṁ tṛbhiḥ sthānair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.16.uv-kg33#921: gaṅ źig lus daṅ ṅag daṅ ni || yid kyis ñes byas mi byed ciṅ || gaṅ źig gnas gsum legs bsdams te || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.17.S10udanav_u:uv_33.17_0-1: yo 'karkaśāṁ vijñapanīṁ giraṁ nityaṁ prabhāṣate / yayā nābhiṣajet kaś cid bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.17.uv-kg33#922: gaṅ gi tshig ṅag mi rtsub ciṅ || go byed yid ’oṅ smra ba daṅ || gaṅ gis ñon moṅs mi skyed de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.18.S10udanav_u:uv_33.18_0-1: ākrośāṁ vadhabandhāṁś ca yo 'praduṣṭas titīkṣate / kṣāntivratabalopetaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.18.uv-kg33#923: gaṅ źig gsod ’chiṅ gśe ba daṅ || sdaṅ ba’i mi la bzod byed de || bzod pa’i brtul źugs stobs tshogs can || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.19.S10udanav_u:uv_33.19_0-1: akrodhanaṁ vratavantaṁ śīlavantaṁ bahuśrutam / dāntam antimaśārīraṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.19.uv-kg33#924: khro ba med ciṅ tshul khrims can || brtul źugs ldan źiṅ sems khral med || dul źiṅ lus mthar gas pa de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.2.S10udanav_u:uv_33.20_0-1: asaṁsṛṣṭaṁ gṛhasthebhir anagārais tathobhayam / anokasāriṇaṁ tuṣṭaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.2.uv-kg33#925: gaṅ źig rab byuṅ khyim pa daṅ || de bźin gñis kar mi ’dre źiṅ || ’dod chuṅ khyim nas ma byuṅ de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.21.S10udanav_u:uv_33.21_0-1: āgataṁ nābhinandanti prakramantaṁ na śocati / saṅgāt saṁgrāmajin mukto bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.21.uv-kg33#926: ma ’oṅs pa la mṅon mi dga’ || ’das pa rnams la gduṅ med pa || ’khrig pa’i sbyor bral g-yul rgyal de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.23.S10udanav_u:uv_33.23_0-1: ananyapoṣī hy ājñātā dāntaḥ sāre pratiṣṭitaḥ /kṣīṇāsravo vāntadoṣo yaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
33.23.uv-kg33#928: gaṅ źig ’dod chuṅ gźan mi gso || dul źiṅ sñiṅ por rab gnas la || zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.24.S10udanav_u:uv_33.24_0-1: yasya pāram apāraṁ ca pārāpāraṁ na vidyate / pāragaṁ sarvadharmāṇāṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.24.uv-kg33#929: gaṅ źig pha rol tshu rol daṅ || pha rol tshu rol gñis med ciṅ || chos rnams kun gyi mthar phyin te || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.25.S10udanav_u:uv_33.25_0-1: yas tu dīrghaṁ tathā hrasvam aṇusthūlaṁ śubhāśubham / loke na kiṁ cid ādatte bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.25.uv-kg33#931: gaṅ źig thuṅ daṅ riṅ ba daṅ || phra sgrom dge daṅ mi dge daṅ || ’jig rten cuṅ zad mi len de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.26.S10udanav_u:uv_33.26_0-1: yasya pāram apāraṁ ca pārāpāraṁ na vidyate / asaktaṁ triṣu lokeṣu bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.26.uv-kg33#930: gaṅ źig pha rol tshu rol daṅ || pha rol tshu rol gñis med ciṅ || gaṅ źig gnas gsum ma chags de || bram za yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.27.S10udanav_u:uv_33.27_0-1: ihaiva yaḥ prajānāti duḥkhasya kṣayam ātmanaḥ / vītarāgaṁ visaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.27.uv-kg33#932: gaṅ źig ’di ñid rab śes śiṅ || raṅ gi sdug bsṅal zad pa daṅ || ’dod chags bral źiṅ mi ldan de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.29.S10udanav_u:uv_33.29_0-1: yas tu puṇyaṁ ca pāpaṁ cāpy ubhau saṅgāv upatyagāt / saṅgātigaṁ visaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.29.uv-kg33#934: gaṅ źig dge daṅ sdig pa’i las || chags gaṅ yin de rab ’das śiṅ || chags las rab ’das rnam bral de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.3.S10udanav_u:uv_33.30_0-1: vāri puṣkarapatreṇevārāgreṇeva sarṣapaḥ /na lipyate yo hi kāmair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.3.uv-kg33#937: pad ma’i ’dab la chu ltar daṅ || smyuṅ bu’i rtse la yuṅs kar ltar || gaṅ źig ’dod la mi gnas de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so || (pad ma’i ’dab la chu ltar daṅ || smyuṅ bu’i rtse la yuṅs kar ltar || srid la dga’ ba yoṅs spaṅs de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||)

33.31.uv33#33.31C: candro vā vimalaḥ śuddho viprasanno hy anāvilaḥ / nandībhavaparikṣīṇaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.31.uv-kg33#940: zla ba dag ciṅ dri med la || skyon bral rab tu daṅ bltar || srid la dga’ ba yoṅs spaṅs de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.32.S10udanav_u:uv_33.32_0-1: dhyāyinaṁ vītarajasaṁ kṛtakṛtyam anāsravam / kṣīṇāsravaṁ visaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.32.uv-kg33#944: gaṅ źig ’dug nas rdul bral ba || sems śiṅ zag zad bya ba byas || dul źiṅ yul mthar gnas pa de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.33.S10udanav_u:uv_33.33_0-1: gambhīrabuddhiṁ medhāḍhyam mārgāmārgeṣu kovidam / uttamārtham anuprāptaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.33.uv-kg33#945: śes rab zab ciṅ yid gźuṅs la || lam daṅ lam min rnams la mkhas || gaṅ źig don mchog rjes thob de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.34.S10udanav_u:uv_33.34_0-1: yas tu kaś cin manuṣyeṣu bhaikṣācaryeṇa jīvati / amamo 'hiṁsako nityaṁ dhṛtimāṁ brahmacaryavān / ājñāya dharmaṁ deśayati bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.34.uv-kg33#946: mi ni gaṅ yaṅ ruṅ ba dag || sloṅs mo tsam gyis ’tsho ba daṅ || bdag med su la’aṅ gnod mi byed || brtan ldan tshaṅs par spyod pa can || kun śes spyad phyir chos ston de || bram ze yin bar ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.35.S10udanav_u:uv_33.35_0-1: sarvakāmāṁ viprahāya yo 'nagāraḥ parivrajet / kāmāsravavisaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.35.uv-kg33#947: gaṅ źig ’dod pa legs spaṅs śiṅ || khyim med par ni rab byuṅ ste || ’dod pa’i zag pa yoṅs zad de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.36.S10udanav_u:uv_33.36_0-1: nikṣiptadaṇḍaṁ bhūteṣu traseṣu sthāvareṣu ca / yo na hanti hi bhūtāni bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.36.uv-kg33#948: ’gro ba daṅ ni gnas pa yi || ’byuṅ po chad pas mi gcod ciṅ || gsod med gsod du mi ’jug de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.37.S10udanav_u:uv_33.37_0-1: ākāśam iva paṅkena rajasā candramā iva /na lipyate yo hi kāmair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.37.uv-kg33#942: ’dam rdzas kyis ni mkhal ltar daṅ || rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar || gaṅ źig ’dod pas mi gos te || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.38.uv33#33.38A: ākāśam iva paṅkena rajasā candramā iva / nandībhavaparikṣīṇaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.38.uv-kg33#943: ’dam rdzab kyis ni mkha’ ltar daṅ || rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar || srid la dga’ ba yoṅs spaṅs de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.39.S10udanav_u:uv_33.39_0-1: aviruddho viruddheṣu tv āttadaṇḍeṣu nirvṛtaḥ /hitānukampī bhūteṣu bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.39.uv-kg33#949: gaṅ źig mi ’thun ’thun byed ciṅ || chad pas gcod pa daṅ du len || ’byuṅ po rnams la brtse phan de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.4.S10udanav_u:uv_33.40_0-1: yasya rāgaś ca doṣaś ca māno mrakṣaś ca śātitaḥ /na lipyate yaś ca doṣair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.4.uv-kg33#950: smyuṅ bu’i rtse la yuṅs kar ltar || gaṅ źig ’dod chags źe sdaṅ daṅ || ṅa rgyal ’chab pa ’joms pa de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.41.S10udanav_u:uv_33.41_0-1: ya imāṁ parikhāṁ durgāṁ saṁsāraugham upatyagāt / tīrṇaḥ pāragato dhyāyī hy aneyo niṣkathaṁkathaḥ / nirvṛtaś cānupādāya bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.41.uv-kg33#952: yid ñid kyis ni mi bkri źiṅ || gaṅ źig len pa las log de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.42.S10udanav_u:uv_33.42_0-1: na vidyate yasya tṛṣṇā cāsmiṁ loke pare 'pi ca / tṛṣṇābhavaparikṣīṇaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.42.uv-kg33#953: gaṅ źig ’jig rten ’di daṅ ni || pha rol na yaṅ sred med ciṅ || srid pa’i sred pa yoṅs zad de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.43.S10udanav_u:uv_33.43_0-1: na vidyate yasya cāśā hy asmiṁ loke pare 'pi ca / nirāśiṣaṁ visaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.43.uv-kg33#954: gaṅ źig ’jig rten ’di daṅ ni || pha rol la yaṅs chags med ciṅ || chags med rnam par bral bde || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.44.S10udanav_u:uv_33.44_0-1: hitvā ratiṁ cāratiṁ ca śītībhūto niraupadhiḥ / sarvalokābhibhūr dhīro bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.44.uv-kg33#955: dga’ daṅ mi dga’ spaṅs pa daṅ || bsil bar ’gyur ciṅ zag pa med || ’jig rten kun zil gnon brtan de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.45.S10udanav_u:uv_33.45_0-1: hitvā mānuṣyakāṁ kāmāṁ divyāṁ kāmān upatyagāt / sarvalokavisaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.45.uv-kg33#956: mi yi sbyor ba spaṅs nas su || lha yi sbyor ba rab ’das śiṅ || sbyor ba kun daṅ rnam bral de || bram ze yin par gsuṅs so ||

33.47.S10udanav_u:uv_33.47_0-1: pūrvenivāsaṁ yo vetti svargāpāyāṁś ca paśyati / atha jātikṣayaṁ prāpto hy abhijñāvyavasito muniḥ / duḥkhasyāntaṁ prajānāti bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.47.uv-kg33#959: gaṅ gis sṅon gyi gnas rtogs śiṅ || mtho ris ṅan soṅ mthoṅ ba daṅ || de nas skye ba zad thob pa’i || thub pa mṅon śes la brtson pa || sdug bsṅal tha mar rab śes de || bram the yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.48.S10udanav_u:uv_33.48_0-1: cyutiṁ yo vetti satvānām upapattiṁ ca sarvaśaḥ / asaktaḥ sugato buddho bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.48.uv-kg33#961: gaṅ gis sems can ’chi ’pho daṅ || skye ba thams cad rtogs gyur pa || thogs med spyan ldan saṅs rgyas de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.49.S10udanav_u:uv_33.49_0-1: sarvasaṁyojanātīto yo vai na paritasyate / asaktaḥ sugato buddho bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.49.uv-kg33#962: gaṅ źig kun sbyor kun ’das śiṅ || yoṅs su gduṅ ba med pa daṅ || dga’ med dran ldan ston pa de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.5.S10udanav_u:uv_33.50_0-1: ṛṣabhaṁ pravaraṁ nāgaṁ maharṣiṁ vijitāvinam / aneyaṁ snātakaṁ buddhaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam // [i] ṛṣabhaḥ pravaro nāgo maharṣir vijitāvinaḥ / yo 'neyaḥ snātako buddho brāhmaṇaṁ taṁ bravīmy aham // [ii]
33.5.uv-kg33#963: thub pa rnam rgyal draṅ soṅ che || khyu mchog rab mchog glaṅ po che || bkrir med khrus byas saṅs rgyas de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.51.S10udanav_u:uv_33.51_0-1: sarvābhibhūṁ bhavātītam oghatīrṇam anāsravam / pāraṁ gataṁ visaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam // [i] sarvābhibhūr bhavātīta oghatīrṇo vināyakaḥ / pārago hi visaṁyukto brāhmaṇaṁ taṁ bravīmy aham // [ii]
33.51.uv-kg33#964: gaṅ źig srid ’das kun zil gnon || chu bo las rgal rnam par ’dren || rnam grol pha rol phyin pa de || bram ze yin par gas gsuṅs so ||

33.52.S10udanav_u:uv_33.52_0-1: gatābhidhyaṁ vītajalpaṁ pāpacittavivarjitam /dhyāyinaṁ vītarajasaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam // [i] nābhidhyāyen nābhijalpet pāpakānāṁ vivarjayet / āsīno virajā dhyāyī brāhmaṇaṁ taṁ bravīmy aham // [ii]
33.52.uv-kg33#965: sdig can rnam par mi sems śiṅ || mi sgom smra bar mi byed par || ’dug nas rdul bral sems pa de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.53.S10udanav_u:uv_33.53_0-1: pāṁsukūladharaṁ bhikṣuṁ kāmeṣu niravekṣiṇaṁ / dhyāyantaṁ vṛkṣamūlasthaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam // [i] pāṁsukūladharo hrīmāṁ kāmeṣu niravekṣakaḥ / niṣaṇṇo vṛkṣamūle yo brāhmaṇaṁ taṁ bravīmy aham // [ii]
33.53.uv-kg33#966: gaṅ źig phyag dar khrod ’chaṅ źiṅ || ṅo tsha śes śiṅ ’dod mi lta || śiṅ druṅ dag tu gnas pa de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so||

33.54.S10udanav_u:uv_33.54_0-1: yasyālayo nāsti sadā yo jñātā niṣkathaṁkathaḥ / amṛtaṁ caiva yaḥ prāpto bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam //
33.54.uv-kg33#968: gaṅ la chuṅ zad gnas med ciṅ || ’du śes yid gñis zug rṅu med || ’chi med go ’phaṅ thob pa de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.56.S10udanav_u:uv_33.56_0-1: yeṣāṁ ca bhāvito mārgaḥ āryo hy aṣṭāṅgikaḥ śivaḥ / sarvaduḥkhaprahāṇāya lokeṣu brāhmaṇā hi te
33.56.uv-kg33#967: gaṅ źig sdug bsṅal kun spaṅs phyir || źi ba ’phags lam yan lag brgyad || draṅ pa sgom par byed pa de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.57.S10udanav_u:uv_33.57_0-1: arūpiṇaṁ sadā cittam asāram anidarśanam / damayitvā hy abhijñāya ye caranti sadā smṛtāḥ / kṣīṇasaṁyojanā buddhā lokeṣu brāhmaṇā hi te // [i] arūpam anidarśanam anantam asudarśanam / sūkṣmaṁ padam abhijñāya ye caranti sadā smṛtāḥ / kṣīṇasaṁyojanā buddhās te loke brāhmaṇā iha // [ii]
33.57.uv-kg33#970: gaṅ źig gzugs med bltar med mtha’ yas la || śin tu bltar med phra źiṅ gźi mṅon rtogs || rtag dran kun sbyor zad rgyu saṅs rgyas pa || ’jig rten ’di na de ni bram ze yin ||

33.58.S10udanav_u:uv_33.58_0-1: chitvā naddhrīṁ varatrāṁ ca saṁtānaṁ duratikramam / utkṣiptaparikhaṁ buddhaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam // [i] chitvā naddhrīṁ varatrāṁ ye saṁtānaṁ duratikramam / utkṣiptaparikhā buddhās te loke brāhmaṇā iha // [ii]
33.58.uv-kg33#971: gaṅ gis sog mig ’chiṅ gtubs te || chiṅs ma rgyaṅ thag bcad nas su || yoṅs su gduṅ spaṅs saṅs rgyas de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.59.S10udanav_u:uv_33.59_0-1: chitvā naddhrīṁ varatrāṁ ca icchālobhaṁ ca pāpakam /tṛṣṇāṁ samūlām āvṛhya bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam // [i] chitvā naddhrīṁ varatrāṁ ye icchālobhaṁ ca pāpakam / samūlāṁ coddhṛtās tṛṣṇāṁ te loke brāhmaṇā iha // [ii]
33.59.uv-kg33#972: gaṅ gis rñed ’dod sdig can daṅ || sog mig chiṅ sam gtubs gyur ciṅ || sred pa rtsar bcas druṅs phyuṅ de || bram ze yin par ṅas gsuṅs so ||

33.6.S10udanav_u:uv_33.60_0-1: chindi srotaḥ parākramya kāmāṁ praṇuda brāhmaṇa / saṁskārāṇāṁ kṣayaṁ jñātvā hy akṛtajño bhaviṣyasi // [i] chindi srotaḥ parākramya kāmāṁ sarvāṁ praṇuda ca / saṁskārāṇāṁ kṣayaṁ jñātvā brāhmaṇo yāti hānighaḥ // [ii]
33.6.uv-kg33#973: brtson par chu bo’i rgyun bcad ciṅ || ’dod pa thams cad rab bcom daṅ || ’du byed rnams kyi zad śes pa || sdig med gaṅ yin bram ze yin ||

33.63.S10udanav_u:uv_33.63_0-1: na brāhmaṇasya praharen na ca muñceta brāhmaṇaḥ / dhig brāhmaṇasya hantāraṁ dhik taṁ yaś ca pramuñcati //
33.63.uv-kg33#976: gaṅ źig bram ze rdeg pa blun || skrod par byed pa de ṅan pas || bram ze rnams la brdeg mi bya || bram ze bskrad par mi bya’o ||

33.64.S10udanav_u:uv_33.64_0-1: yasya dharmaṁ vijānīyād vṛddasya daharasya vā / satkṛtyainaṁ namasyeta hy agnihotram iva dvijaḥ //
33.64.uv-kg33#977: gaṅ źig chos rnams rnam śes na || rgan nam yaṅ na gźon yaṅ ruṅ || de la bkur źiṅ phyag bya ste || bram ze gtsaṅ mas me bźin no ||

33.65.S10udanav_u:uv_33.65_0-1: yasya dharmaṁ vijānīyād vṛddasya daharasya vā / satkṛtyainaṁ paricared agnihotram iva dvijaḥ //
33.65.uv-kg33#978: gaṅ źig chos rnams rnams śes na || rgan nam yaṅ na gźon yaṅ ruṅ || de la bkur źiṅ bsñen bkur te || bram ze gtsaṅ mas me bźin no ||

33.66.S10udanav_u:uv_33.66_0-1: yasya dharmaṁ vijānīyāt samyaksaṁbuddhadeśitam / satkṛtyainaṁ namasyeta hy agnihotram iva dvijaḥ //
33.66.uv-kg33#979: gaṅ źig rdzogs pa’i saṅs rgyas kyis || bstan pa’i chos rnams rnam śes na || de la bkur źiṅ phyag bya ste || bram ze gtsaṅ mas me bźin no ||

33.67.S10udanav_u:uv_33.67_0-1: yasya dharmaṁ vijānīyāt samyaksaṁbuddhadeśitam /satkṛtyainaṁ paricared agnihotram iva dvijaḥ //
33.67.uv-kg33#980: gaṅ źig rdzogs pa’i saṅs rgyas kyis || bstan pa’i chos rnams rnam śes na || de la bkur źiṅ bsten bkur te || bram ze gtsaṅ mas me bźin no ||

33.68.S10udanav_u:uv_33.68_0-1: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet / atha caikaḥ piśācīṁ ca bakkulaṁ cātivartate //
33.68.uv-kg33#981: gaṅ tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi || pha rol phyin par gyur pa na || de tshe śa za ba ku la || gcig po las kyaṅ śin tu ’das ||

33.69.S10udanav_u:uv_33.69_0-1: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet / athāsya vedanāḥ sarve astaṁ gacchanti paśyataḥ //
33.69.uv-kg33#982: gaṅ tshe brama ze chos rams kyi || pha rol phyin par gyur pa na || de tshe des mthoṅ tshor ba rnams || thams cad nub pa ñid du ’gyur ||

33.7.S10udanav_u:uv_33.70_0-1: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet / athāsya pratyayāḥ sarve astaṁ gacchanti paśyataḥ //
33.7.uv-kg33#984: gaṅ tshe bram che chos rnams kyi || pha rol phyin par gyur pa na || de tshe de yis mthoṅ bas na || rkyen rnams thams cad nub par gyur ||

33.71.S10udanav_u:uv_33.71_0-1: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet / athāsya cāsravāḥ sarve astaṁ gacchanti paśyataḥ //
33.71.uv-kg33#983: gaṅ tshe bram che chos rnams kyi || pha rol phyin par gyur pa na || de tshe de yis mthoṅ bas na || zag pa thams cad nub par gyur ||

33.72.S10udanav_u:uv_33.72_0-1: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet / athāsya sarvasaṁyogā astaṁ gacchanti paśyataḥ //
33.72.uv-kg33#985: gaṅ tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi || pha rol phyin par gyur pa na || de tshe de yis mthoṅ bas na || kun sbyor thams cad nub par gyur ||

33.73.S10udanav_u:uv_33.73_0-1: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet / atha jātijarāṁ caiva maraṇaṁ cātivartate //
33.73.uv-kg33#986: gaṅ tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi || pha rol phyin par gyur pa na || de tshe skye daṅ rga ba daṅ || ’chi ba rnams las śin tu ’das ||

33.75.S10udanav_u:uv_33.75_0-1: na brāhmaṇasyedṛśam asti kiṁ cid yathā priyebhyo manaso niṣedhaḥ /yathā yathā hy asya mano nivartate tathā tathā saṁvṛtam eti duḥkham //
33.75.uv-kg33#989: ji ltar mi sdug pa las yid ldog pa || de ’dra bram ze rnams la cuṅ zad med || ji lta ji ltar de yi yid ldog pa || de lta de ltar kun rdzob bden par mdzad ||

33.76.S10udanav_u:uv_33.76_0-1: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya / athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā prajānāti sahetuduḥkham //
33.76.uv-kg33#991: gaṅ tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na || gaṅ gis sdug bsṅal rgyur bcas rab śes pa || chos ’di rnams las rab tu ’byuṅ ’gyur te || de tshe de yi som ñi ma lus spoṅ ||

33.77.S10udanav_u:uv_33.77_0-1: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya / athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā prajānāti sahetudharmam //
33.77.uv-kg33#990: gaṅ tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na || gaṅ gis chos rnams rgyur bcas rab śes pa || chos ’di rnams las rab tu ’byuṅ ’gyur te || de tshe de yi som ñi ma lus spoṅ ||

33.78.S10udanav_u:uv_33.78_0-1: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya / athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā kṣayaṁ pratyayānām upaiti //
33.78.uv-kg33#993: gaṅ tshe bram ze brtson pas ’bad pa na || gaṅ gis rkyen rnams zad pa ’thob ’gyur ba || chos ’di rnams las rab tu ’byuṅ ’gyur te || de tshe de yi som ñi ma lus spoṅ ||

33.79.S10udanav_u:uv_33.79_0-1: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya / athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā kṣayaṁ vedanānām upaiti //
33.79.uv-kg33#992: gaṅ tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na || gaṅ gis tshor ba zad pa ’thob ’gyur ba || chos ’di rnams las rab tu ’byuṅ ’gyur te || de tshe de yi som ñi ma luṅ spoṅ ||

33.8.S10udanav_u:uv_33.80_0-1: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya / athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā kṣayaṁ hy āsravāṇām upaiti //
33.8.uv-kg33#994: gaṅ tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na || gaṅ gis zag pa zad pa ’thob ’gyur ba || chos ’di rnams las rab tu ’byuṅ ’gyur te || de tshe de yi som ñi ma lus spoṅ ||

33.83.S10udanav_u:uv_33.83_0-1: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya / vidhūpayaṁs tiṣṭhati mārasainyaṁ buddho hi saṁyojanavipramukta iti //
33.83.uv-kg33#996: gaṅ tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na || blo yis kun sbyor rnams las rab grol te || bdud sde rnam par bsal nas ’dug ’gyur ba || chos ’di rnams las rab tu ’byuṅ bar ’gyur ||
